VITAMIN B12
an educational installment
Vitamin B12 : What is it ?
Vitamin B12 , also called cobalamin , is important to good health .
It helps maintain healthy nerve and red blood cells , and is also needed to make DNA , the genetic material in all cells . Vitamin B12 is bound to the protein in food .
What foods provide vitamin B12 ?
Beef liver , fish , eggs , and milk , among others .
What is the health risk of too much vitamin B12 ?
Vitamin B12 has a very low potential for toxicity .
Vegetarians who do not eat meats , fish , eggs , milk or milk products are at high risk of developing a vitamin B12 deficiency !
Individuals with stomach and small intestinal disorders may not absorb enough vitamin B12 from food to maintain healthy body stores .

Sept . 6th , 1999 : " A new series of fossilized dinosaur tracks was discovered today near Drumheller , in Alberta , Canada . The tracks appear to be those of a fully grown
Tyrannosaurus Rex
but paleontologists are confused as to the origin of what appear to be fossilized wood fragments contained within , and scattered just beneath the footprint record .
These remarkable tracks are joined by those of an adult Utahraptor who apparently stopped and
stood face to face with the T - Rex ( one almost wants to speculate that the two were engaged in sparkling conversation ) before returning the way he came . . .
The tracks seem well - travelled , as if these two dinosaurs met on a daily basis . " - Reuters News Service

LECTURE NOTES COMICS
TODAY'S LECTURE : DISCRETE MATH
Pay attention , now !
if you do not like math then skip this comic ( seriously )
The circuit satisfiability problem is determining if there are some inputs that make the outputs of a circuit " true " !
A closely related problem is the formula satisfiability problem , SAP , which can be mapped one - to - one , and in linear time , to the circuit satisfiability problem .
So what does this mean ?
If we can solve SAT problems in f ( n ) time , then circuit - SAT can be solved in 0 ( n ) + f ( n ) time !
But circuit - SAT can not be solved quickly .
Indeed . Therefore , SAT is as " hard " as circuit - SAT .
Similarly hard problems are " Clique " , " Vertex - Cover " and the Travelling Salesman Problem .
Solving these problems ( P ) can be accomplished in polynomial time !
Verifying solutions ( NP ) can also be done in polynomial time !
The question is . . . does P = NP ?

A Hiftory of Dinofaurs
Being a Survey of the Fielde , tolde with equal parts Flourish and Paedogogy , epitomized by a plain and familiar Manner , without and unnecessary Mixture of useless Curiosities and needless Repetitions .
[ Price 6d . ]
Dinosaurs , or Man - Lizards , to - day knowne as G - d's Mistake , had assum'd Domain over all the Worlde , including the dark Lands of China - Men .
By no means Fit for their Purpose as Kings and Queens , the Dinosaurs spread Fear and Incontenience , along with several similar Inconve - niencies , which neither can be Described nor Understood without having first seen one of the Faersome beasts for oneself ; thy Stars are indeed Fortunate , for in to - day's Moderne Age , the only such Animale thy shall see is in a rare Wood - Cut or handsel Picture - Book , where thou art Protected from the joyn'd Devourment and Digestione by the Fictionality of the Beast in question .
The plague of their Times , the Dinosaur was known for taking Plaesure in rendering one's abode or Self flatten'd .
This being the Case , there was great room to Fear , for many chylds would not survive the certain Mis - chief done them by the Tyranno - saurus Rex , Utahed - Raptor , & c .
The stern voice of Science tells us that these Monstrosi - ties , once having exhausted the Novelty of Death - giving , simply took it as a Matter - of - Course , and paid it little Attenshon , likely dedicating the remainder of their Facu - lities towards some Conversation and Jokery .
Being thus provided with a Compleat exposi - tion of the Dinosaurs , take care , gentle Reader , that you do not deviate from the strait and Upright path set before you by our Father , lest you find thyself in the same Posi - tion as these Beasts , and there be no roome for you on the Ark .
MDCCXLIX

DENOUEMENT :
I was a fool !
I have discovered a new philosophy for life that appeals to my own sense of self - worth !
Egoism !
In egoism , all your actions are motivated by a desire to make things easy for one person : yourself ! For instance , I crush this house because it's in my way . My actions are justified , thanks to egoism !
But what about yourself ? You're only here because your parents selflessly decided to have children . Your very existence is against egoism .
They probably realized what a great dinosaur I'd be and figured it would be in their own interests to creat me !
What the hell ?
First off , I don't know why you need egoism to justify the destruction you're going to wreak ANYWAY . Second off , egoism doesn't account for charity , unless you reduce it to 'good will in the bank' , saved for some future benefit . That in turn doesn't account for charity seen in lesser animals , who aren't cognizant of such self - centered account - keeping . In conclusion : it's untenable .
" In conclusion : it's untenable " ? YOU MUST BE A LOT OF FUN AT PARTIES !

Actually . . . I have been dabbling in genetics and was wondering what a group of alleles is called .
It depends on what alleles you're talking about . In the same gene , they're called an " allelic series " but in different genes , a set of alleles is known as a " haplotype " .

It has come to my attention that I have different interests than I did when I was a child . In many significant ways , we are two different people .
So the questions is :
Who am I ?
Since an individual can " evolve " over time , what makes them a person at all ? Is there no connection between myself as a child and myself now , besides the fact that we share a ( now post - pubescent ) body ?
What is the point about worrying about the Self if the Self is in a constant state of change ?
Why should we bother assigning an identity to what is essentially one frame of a constantly - changing motion picture .
T - Rex !
I think you are overanalyzing this . People change , that is part of life . Just because we're in a state of gradual evolution doesn't mean we have no identity ; indeed , that identity is probably what's guiding the evolution .

UNDERSTANDING ETHICAL RELATIVISM
I stomp this house because I feel it would be a good idea to do so ! Do not judge me , Dromiceiomimus !
But I believe it is wrong ! Which of us is right ?
That is the beauty of relativism : we both are !
Ethical relativism is the best philosophy ever !
Oh really ? !
It can be argued that in every rational person ( the definition of 'rational' is a touchy subject I won't discuss here ) there are certain properties common to all . The problem ( well , one problem ) with relativism is how it nihilistically privileges the experience of the individual above all else , making every ethical decision the right ethical decision : who would not like to have his or her beliefs guaranteed to be as correct as anybody else's ? But this is done at the cost of ignoring our shared qualities , turning away from the fact that despite different languages and cultures ( and continents and skin colours ) we all believe some of the same things . With that striking fundamental truth removed , the baby - rapers and the saints stand side by side , equals in righteousness .
But your first assumption is flawed ! I doubt you can find even one universal constant ; even your revealing example of baby - rape is practiced by some ! Granted , these people are considered " monsters " , but isn't that just a case of the majority condemning a minority ? I don't mean to justify baby - rape , but only to point out that it's unlikely you can come up with even one belief that is universal !
LESSONS IN HUMILITY
A COMIC
It occurs to me . . .
I am indeed god at stomping on things !
In fact , I would venture that I am the best at such endeavours !
I disagree !
There are probably others , whom you may never meet , but who have even greater skill than you !
You - you're right ! I can never be assured of my own superiority , even in this modest arena !
For me , this has been a lesson in humility !
Today is a good day I think for public displays of affection !
Everyone else seems to think so , at least !
Hey Dromiceiomimus , care to witness a public display of affection ? I seem to see them all the time whenever I go out walking !
No thanks ! Besides , there's nobody else here . . . how would you show me one ? Were you just going to make out with yourself ?
Wouldn't be the first time !
Eww !
T - Rex , is what I hear true ? Are you going around making out with yourself ? !
No !
That was a joke ! Besides , how would I even do that ? I'd just sit there , kissing my own arm ?
Ha , I don't know . It just sounded like something you'd be up to .
Sorry to disappoint ! Anyway , I'm going to go finish my walk .
SHORTLY . . .
Eww ! Gross !
QUIT MAKING OUT , YOU TWO !
STERN RELIGIOUS COMICS
That girl with the brown hair certainly is a " dish " !
Hey buddy , do you know who that girl with the brown hair is ? I'd really like to ask her out on a date . She is a very good - looking young woman !
I think you're too late , friend ! She's been steady with Matt for months now !
Darn it ! Why does Matt have all the luck ?
I'm jealous of him because he gets to spend time with a girl that I like .
Slow down , fella !
You should be happy for him ! He has found happiness in a relationship with a woman he respects , and they don't do anything they might regret before they get married !
You're right ! I had lost my way .
Thanks , friend !
" But each one is tempted when he is carried away and enticed by his own lusts . Then when lust has conceived , it gives birth to sin ; and when sin is accomplished , it brings forth death . " James 1 : 14 - 15

SCIENCE VS RELIGION : round one
So the Utahraptor's playing Science to my Religion , eh ?
This means war !
Science will wither in the face of my sense of community and sharing !
How can Science hope to compete with my gifts of enlightenment and hope ? I bring nothing less than inner peace !
But your " gift " of inner peace comes at the cost of closing your eyes to the world around you !
What ? !
You achieve peace only through a sort of " giving up " of your own free will , by either deciding that the world is as God intended , or , alternatively , that He will be the one to fix it , using you as his " tools " ! Isn't this mere escapism , a hiding from the burden of personal responsibility ?
Oh my God !
Science has all the answers AGAIN !

How can Science hope to compete with my gifts of enlightenment and hope ? I bring nothing less than inner peace !
But your " gift " of inner peace comes at the cost of closing your eyes to the world around you !
What ? !
You achieve peace only through a sort of " giving up " of your own free will , by either deciding that the world is as God intended , or , alternatively , that He will be the one to fix it , using you as his " tools " ! Isn't this mere escapism , a hiding from the burden of personal responsibility ?

Yes ! That's exactly why we have religion !
So why are we here ?

TWENTY YEARS LATER . . .

Where do babies come from ?
An excellent course of inquiry !

You want to know where babies come from ?
I do !
Are you sure ? It's pretty . . . biological .

SHORTLY . . .
MOM did that ?
I was thinking about my grade - school days last night , and I realized I couldn't remember most of the people who were in my classes !
I've forgotten pretty much everyone who didn't go on to the same school as I did !
This has raised some pretty profound questions for me . First off , it seems evident that I have finite space in my brain , and things are getting erased .
The problem is , I don't have any control - conscious at least - over what gets deleted and what stays .
And you're concerned because you don't know who you are if you can't even trust your memories , right ?
Right . I'd say a good part of who a person is comes from their experiences - but if they are forgotten , where does that leave the person ?
I suppose this comes down to whether or not you believe there is some essential part of you , something more than the sum of your experiences .
There's only one way to find out ! It seems that , once again , I will have to contract . . .
AMNESIA !
TO BE CONTINUED . . .
If I want to know for sure who I am , I have to find out if I'm the same person when I don't have all my memories . I need to contract amnesia !
Time for a severe non - penetrative blow to the head !

Hmmm .

A MAN WALKS INTO A BAR explained
many jokes begin with this line . It is called the " set - up " , and is analogous to establishing - shots in films or first paragraphs in essays .
It alerts the audience that what follows is likely to be a short story with a humorous climax !
What is the attraction to this structure of humor ? Why are there so many jokes about men walking into bars ?
Part of the attraction to this structure may be its possibilities : most anything can happen in a bar , especially if this bar is contained within the wild and wooly world of the verbal jest .
What about the joke , " A man walks into a bar . . . ouch ! " ?
Good question !
The joke assumes some sophistication on the part of the audience , an expectation gleamed from previous jokes that the bar is a drinking establishment .
Go on !
The " ouch " is startling . How could entering a bar hurt ? It forces us to now re - evaluate our most basic assumptions .
We must ask ourselves , " What if the bar were a bar proper , and by walking into it the man actually , physically walked into it ? "
It is this confusion on the part of the listener that is responsible for the humor !
I feel odd . . as if my amnesia is wearing off !
Uncanny ! All my memories are flooding back in a torrent of life and history !
I remember this tiny house and car ! I liked to stomp on them regularly ! Like so !
And I remember you , Dromiceiomimus !
Do I ever !
And I remember this tiny woman ! I remember I liked to stomp on her !
You do it every day !
{ { bolded } } Personally , I wish you'd stop .
Holy ! How'd you do that thing with your voice just now ? !
Seriously , it makes me feel like doing whatever you say !
Today is a good day I think for going for - oh shoot !
I forgot about my dentist's appointment !
Damn damn damn . I can't call now and reschedule because I'll have to admit that I forgot entirely .
Then I'll probably have to explain that I had amnesia and the dentist will think I'm crazy .
You seem to have a lot of respect for dentists !
I do indeed !
But DID YOU KNOW that dentists only clean your teeth and hang out with you because you pay them to ?
He's not really your friend , T - Rex !

T - REX IN : DIFFERENT WAYS TO SAY " NO "
I have compiled a list of different ways to say " no " !
One way is to shake , or nod , your head , depending on which culture you're in .
Another good way is to suck in air through your teeth . This indicates a severe problem with whatever is being proposed !
Violence can also be an effective way of saying " no " !
For instance , I find stomping to be unambiguous .
Listing ways of saying " no " ?
You " know " it !
Ho ho !
Was this entire conversation an excuse for that crappy pun ?
How did he " know " ?
I have taken the aesthetics and beliefs of the romanticism movement and adopted them for my own !
I now emphasize my own subjective experience as visionary and transcendental !
I no longer value piety or virtue , or constancy ( or consistency ) , or even the search for scientific truth ! I only value my own capacity for experience !
As a consequence , my own actions can no longer be judged by any public idea of right or wrong ! As experience is amoral , even my own conscience cannot judge my actions , and I am free from reproach and judgment !
But T - Rex , this is nothing more than deifying the ego , defiant of conventional morality !
You've chosen for yourself a philosophy that justifies everything you do as good , simply because you did it ! Now tell me , how is that a useful moral and ethical system ?

Today is a good day , I think , for a guest comic .
I'm in a comic ! ?
It appears that by informing me of my current existence within a medium of entertainment , the guest comic author has already broken the so - called " fourth wall " .
Why should that matter ? Your existence now is in no way different than it was before .
but as a character in a comic , I am required to be a source of entertainment . This is a demand that I have up to now been unaware of . Thus I must provide the reader with some semblance of comedic banter . . . perhaps a pun using the phrase " breaking the fourth wall " and my current action of crushing many walls .
I believe that particular point would have been better off remaining a subtle irony .
Since I do not have a joke readily available , I will just have to resort to entertainment through violence .
But you don't NEED to come up with a joke or rely on entertaining violence !
How so ?
As a character in a comic , you have no true free will of your own . Nor do you think at all ! It is the author that will com up with the joke .
But what if he forgets to come up with a funny punchline ? If I have no free will , does that mean that I will be forced to just take up space in the last caption and say nothing at all ?
If the author is a lazy bum , yes .
I don't see a punchline !
Just say " who the hell goes to Cornwall "
Seriously , who does that ?
I know ! Seriously !

like squashing this cat .

YES !

I have noticed that eating different foods has different physiological effects on myself . There must be some 'balanced diet' that maximizes the agreeable effects of such nourishment !
With this in mind , I have created . . . the Nutrinomicon !
The Nutrinomicon divides foods into four different 'groups . ' These 'groups' have prescribed allowances per day .
By following the nutritional regime of the Nutrinomicon , you can be assured of a fine diet !
Your " Nutrinomicon " is nothing more than a Food Guide , repackaged !
What ?
All the major governments have published Food Guides , which do exactly what your Nutrinomicon purports to do : divide food into groups , and describe how much of each group is allowable for a balanced diet .
I have to admit , your name is cooler , though .
But - I stayed up all night working on the celebrated and unmentionable Nutrinomicon .
I even skipped dinner , which is ironic , because I was working on a guide to nutrition !
FILMIC TECHNIQUES COMICS
Oh boy !
I believe I'll offer some advice on employing everyday filmic techniques !
To begin : when filming , you always want to say on one side of the action . This is because if you suddenly start filming from the OPPOSITE side of the action , it will appear to be reversed !
Observe :
Notice how I appear to be stomping in the opposite direction !

T - REX IN : COMPUTATIONAL LINGUISTICS
Computational linguistics is the study of computer - based language processing !
A major area of computational linguistics is that of " ambiguity resolution " . It turns out that many things people say in a language - English , for example - can have more than one meaning !
Consider the phrase " fruit flies like a banana " . Is it describing the taste of fruit flies , or rather flying fruit ? How can a computer hope to figure this out ?
Many have focused on statistical modelling of language , but this approach is approximate .
I agree !
What do YOU know about computational linguistics ?
Ever read a little paper called " Non - Statistical Models for Unsupervised Prepositional Phrase Attachment " ?
That was me !
It was some of my earliest work on head word tuples !
Shit man , you know more about this than I do !
You know what ? You should be the one doing the talking here !
I received an invitation via the post last night ! A very exclusive invitation . . .
. . . to a wedding !
Who's getting married ?
A friend of mine ! She's getting married to a woman she met four years ago !
Wow !

Sure !
Awesome ! I've never been to a wedding before , much less a lesbian wedding ! This is exciting !
I know ! We'll get to see them KISS !
That's not what I meant !
Whatever , man ! I bet I won't be the only one taking a picture !

I love lesbian weddings !
This marriage has gotten me thinking about monogamy .
I did some research !
I found a book called " The Ethical Slut " !
Basically it gives advice for having loving polygamous relationships . A lot of it makes sense ! Like say your girlfriend has a best friend , and they go out one night . You're happy for her , right ? You love her , you want her to be happy . So why should that change when you add sex to it ? The book also posits that an artificial 'economy of scarcity' in sex leads to jealousy and possessiveness .
You're saying that because sex is 'rare' , it has increased value , and is therefore treasured unreasonably ?
Yeah !
That's what the book says , anyway . It's not anti - monogamy , but it is pro - polygamy .
But don't you find that these things don't work in real life ? I know I want my partner to be happy , but I also want all of his or her kisses .
Artificial economy of scarcity , my friend ! Like diamonds !
Why are you so interested in this , anyway ?
Who knows !

THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN WHAT IS TRANSMITTED AND WHAT IS RECEIVED an allegorical comic and comic allegory
Hello , Dromiceiomimus !
Hello , T - Rex !
Why yes , I am super - sexy today !
T - Rex , stop it ! You can't just go around putting words in people's mouths !
Says you !
Where there is lexical or syntactic ambiguity , you could argue that you are free to choose a preferred meaning - granted - but you cannot arbitrarily transform someone's words into what you want ! That process undermines the very foundation of language , as words are robbed of any fixed meaning , rendering communication arbitrary and pointless !
That will be my epitaph , then !
" Here lies T - Rex , who undermined the very foundation of language " !
Awesome !
I have been thinking about what the Utahraptor said yesterday , and by extension the ambiguity allowable in language !
Take the Bible , for instance !
There's a text passed down for hundreds of generations , translated , re - written , re - edited .
Even if you don't assume that it's the word of God , the difference in meaning between what was written THEN and what you read NOW must be staggering !
It's often said that the only way to be immortal is through your words and ideas !
I agree !
But the Bible shows us that language is mutable ! So what's the solution ? How can I ensure that the ideas I have in my head when I communicate are the same as those you get in yours when you hear me ?
I propose a rigorously defined language without syntactic or lexical ambiguity !
But how would we write puns in such a language ?
Eh ?
Or delightfully sexy double entendres ?

& # 8226 ; Wear something that will identify you and make you easy - to - remember ! I recommend a " crazy " scarf or a large disfiguring scar .

CHICK PEAS IN COCONUT MILK
CUT AND SAVE !
Tonight is a good night I think for having Chick Peas in Coconut Milk for dinner !
I believe I will combine in a saucepan 2 cups of canned chickpeas , drained ; 1 tomato , chopped ; 4 whole cloves ; 2 - 3 cloves of garlic , minced ; and 1 1 / 2 cups coconut milk !
But aren't you forget about 1 1 / 2 teaspoons of turmeric and about a half a teaspoon of salt ?
Indeed I am ! The turmeric gives the dish its distinctive yellow colour .
Then you bring it all to a boil , reduce heat and let it simer for 20 minutes !
How did you know ?
I make this dish all the time ! It's great when served over rice , and feeds 2 - 3 people !
It does , indeed , old friend !
Any final comments , T - Rex ?
Only that if you want the food to be less watery , let it simmer longer - for up to 30 minutes !

COMPRESSED ORIGIN STORY COMICS
Today's origin story : THE PHRASE " BALLS TO THE WALL "
Many people assume the origin of this phrase has to do with testicles !
In fact , it's quite the opposite . The phrase originated with pilots of fighter planes !
The " balls " in question referred to the knobs on top of the plane's throttle control . When the throttle was at full , the " balls " would be " to the wall " of the cockpit !
And that's the origin of the phrase " balls to the wall " .
You are incorrect ! The phrase comes from olde - fashioned steam - powered trains !
What ?
It's true ! Basically , the engines had two weighted balls , attached to a vertical shaft that was connected to the engine . As the engine speed increased , these two balls would be raised higher because of centrifugal force ! At top speed , they would be parallel to the ground , nearly touching the " walls " of the shaft !
Hence , " balls to the wall " ! Man !
That's sweet !
COMPRESSED ORIGIN STORY COMICS
Today's origin story : YOUR SENSE OF DISENCHANTMENT
Your sense of disenchantment comes from a realization that the world is not as you believed !
People lie and get away with it . Murders go unsolved ! There are people who only interact with you because they think it might be profitable for them .
You were raised on fairy tales , where there were no moral grey areas , where good and bad were clear , where there was never any real doubt over which side would win in the end !
Each lurid death reported in the paper akes you a little more cynical : a little more dead inside .
Wait !
What if this sense of disenchantment came not from a flawed world , but rather a growing realization that they themselves are flawed ? Nothing's more depressing than realizing that you can't live up to your hopes , that you'll never live out your dreams , that you probably let those you care about down , everyday !
Holy !

" Garden path " sentences are those that trick you into thinking that they will mean one thing , but then as you read more of the sentence , that meaning is shown to be false !
For instance : " The horse raced past the barn fell " !
Why , that sentence is senseless !
Aha , my friend , so it would seem ! But it actually refers to a horse , which at some point in the past was raced past a barn , and now that same horse has fallen over !
That sentence is stupid !

OBJECTIVISM COMICS
Everyone ( including me ) is an end in himself : not a means to an end for others !
This means I should exist for my own sake , neither sacrificing myself to others , nor sacrificing others to myself ! The pursuit of my own rational self interest , and happiness , is the highest moral purpose of my life !
If I must deal with others , it should be as TRADERS , in a pure capitalist system . No charity ! No sympathy ! Just business , an exchange of value for value .
But where does love fit into this system of Objectivism , T - Rex ?
What do you mean ?
Well if everything is viewed as a business arrangement between traders without charity , then how can you have love ? Love is selfless .
Nope ! Love is selfISH . You see value in someone , and they see value in you ! You want access to this value , so you arrange a spiritual exchange .
Hey , that rhymes !
LOGICAL FALLACY COMICS PRESENTS :
" THE MIDDLE GROUND "
This fallacy is when you assume that since a position is between two extremes , it must be right !
It seems to occur because often , this IS the case . For instance , eating a moderate amount of food is better than eating to excess , or eating not at all .
However , just because a case is between two extremes does not make it automatically correct ! It must be JUSTIFIED .
Well , what's an example where the middle ground is not correct ?
Easy !
Say you think I should go on a trip around the world , while I assure you that I can't afford it and that I should stay home . From that , we would conclude that I should go on a trip exactly half - way around the world , where I'd probably run out of money and get stuck !
Sounds good to me !
Luckily , we have arrived to that conclusion via a fallacy so I will be making no such trip !
I was asked by a friend of mine how he could tell his sweetheart that he loves her in a new , exciting way ! He's worried that he's said the same old thing too often , and that it's getting stale .
I assured him that there are infinitely - many ways to say " I love you " !
For instance , you could say " I love you " , but you could also say " I really love you " ! Or , for that matter : " I really really love you ! "
Therefore , since you can have an arbitrary number of 'really's , there are an infinite number of ways to say " I love you " .
That's not very helpful , is it ? You're just adding the same adverb over and over again !
So ?
So , no woman would sit around while you said " really really really really " for two hours . Anyway , after the third 'really' you move from " emphatic " to " damn creepy " !
Well that explains why that woman at the supermarket never replied to my letters !
Also they were anonymous !
Last night it occured to me that an evening at the theatre would be a delightful distraction !
However , when I arrived , they were out of tickets !

DINOSAUR COMICS PRESENTS :
" ONE PAGE FROM 'ON THE ORIGIN OF SPECIES' BY CHARLES DARWIN "
Any variation which is not inherited is unimportant for us .
But the number and diversity of inheritable deviations of structure , both those of slight and those of considerable physiological importance , is endless . Dr . Prosper Lucas's treatise , in two large volumes , is the fullest and the best on this subject .
No breeder doubts how strong is the tendency to inheritance : like produces like is his fundamental belief .
Doubts have been thrown on this principle by theoretical writers alone .
When a deviation appears not unfrequently , and we see it in the father and child , we cannot tell whether it may not be due to the same original cause acting on
both ; but when amongst individuals , apparently exposed to the same conditions , any very rare deviation , due to some extraordinary combination of circumstances , appears in the parent - - say , once amongst several million individuals - - and it reappears in the child , the mere doctrine of chances almost compels us to a -

NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS
New Year's Resolutions are used to make changes in your life !
Classically , one would make private resolutions and endeavour to carry these out over the new , unblemished year . However , this tradition has changed over time !
People now choose to announce their resolutions , perhaps in the hopes of making their pledges more likely to be fulfilled . Worse , in some families members make resolutions for each other : a recipe for fighting and snide , sarcastic suggestions !
Hey , that sounds like a great idea , T - Rex ! Let's make resolutions for each other !
Huh ?
Weren't you listening ? This will only lead to conflict !
No , it'll be great ! Do me first .
No !
Come on !
I've got one for you !
Y - you have one prepared ?
You jerk ! You brought a list !
WHY DO WE DRIVE ON A PARKWAY AND PARK ON A DRIVEWAY ?
Because the words have two different origins .

HOW TO WIN ARGUMENTS
Winning arguments is easy !
The secret is to convince your opponent that arguing with you isn't worthwhile ! When they abandon the argument / friendship , you win !
It's really that easy !
I feel your technique isn't one for winning arguments ; rather , it's one for losing friendships !
No !
I SPECIFICALLY specified that it's for winning arguments / friendships .
First : Annoying your opponent doesn't mean you've won . Second : You can't " win " a friendship . It's not a competition . There are no winners or losers .
Hmm . . . sounds to me like somebody lost their last few friendships !
WHAT'S THE CUTEST PHRASE YOU CAN COME UP WITH ?
That's easy !
" Happy machine ! "
Now granted , it's not the cutest phrase if you just look at it . But if you think about what a happy machine would do - what it would look like , you end up with something that is just so cute !
A happy machine !
So - what ? It's a machine that is happy ? A happy robot ?
No !
It's a machine to create happiness . A happy machine !
That - that IS pretty cute !
But what happens if the happy machine fails ? If it breaks into pieces ?
Oh noo !

Ma ma ma ma matey / Don't you forget my number ! "

THE DIFFERENCES BETWEEN ADULTS AND CHILDREN COMICS ( note that if you already have a full grasp on such differences , this comic will probably be of no help to you )
The differences between adults and children are many !
For example : while adults are by definition fully grown , children are much smaller ! Adults have more life experiences than children , who may have very little ! Adults , legally , are fully - recognized people , while children are not ! They do not have the same rights .
Yes , there are many differences between adults and children !
Hey , T - Rex !
What is it , Utahraptor ?
I was just babysitting my adult neighbor . But then I realized : wait , you don't babysit adults ! You only babysit CHILDREN !
How embarrassing !
Oh , I know it !
Well , to be fair , that IS one of the differences between adults and children !

SOON
Dromiceiomimus , I would like to reward you for being my friend ! What would yo like ?
T - Rex , I didn't become your friend because of the chance of a reward ! I'm not sure this is a good idea : people might find it insulting !
Is that true ? Could others take my offer of prizes to be an insult ?
Easily !
Here's why : it implies that being your friend is somehow deserving of recompense . You insult yourself , but you also insult us , because if we were truly your friends , we wouldn't want prizes ! The fact that you are offering them implies you think we'd take them , which implies that you think our friendship is insincere !
Good God , you're right ! Let me make this up to you . We'll go to the movies !
That'll be fun , eh ?
My treat !

PHILOSOPHY COMICS II
T - Rex ! Science tells us everything is relative !
This means that there is no such thing as truth ! Your idea of what is right could be just as good as mine !
You misrepresent the science . All vantage points are relative , however , this does not mean that all THINGS are relative . That would be absurd .
But please , continue to take simplified scientific results and apply them naively to philosophical thought !
fin
With new understandings coming from the field of Science , we no longer have to give God all the credit for creating the Universe !
It's great !
In the past , we did not have a very good understanding of our world , and so attributing storms and such to God made sense .
But NOW , we understand things ! We don't need a God to make hurricanes and babies for us . We can make them in a lab !
In effect , WE ( and by 'we' I mean 'dinosaurs' ) have become the all - powerful Gods of old !
I'm afraid your reasoning is flawed T - Rex ! Fatally flawed !
I don't see how !
Well , say when you're a kid your father builds the house you live in . You'd give him the credit , right ? And say that you're older and NOW , you understand how to build a house . Can you then conclude that your father didn't build your childhood home ?
The answer is " no " , T - Rex !
Well I still have plenty more proof that God doesn't exist ! Remember all those emails I sent Him back in December ?
They BOUNCED !

IDENTITY THEORY COMICS
The identity theory is that all states of the mind are identical to all states of the brain !
This means that for every perception , every emotion , even for every thought that I have , there is a corresponding state in my brain to match .
My sense of self itself is nothing more than the physical state of the chemicals and neurons in my stately skull !
Your theory has appeal , T - Rex !
It does ?
Sure ! It seems rational , plus it gives up hope that we could design a computer with a consciousness and - dare I dread - a soul !
But it's not that simple !
Sure it is ! If you're hung up about consciousness , consider it to be emergent behavior !
Dude , I don't even know what that is !
I've had a great idea ! I'm going to convince one of my friends that I have a magical ring . But the catch is , the ring only works if you are pure of heart !
So , this friend of mine will undergo a regime of self - improvement !
However , when they finally have bettered themselves and are " pure of heart " , they will realize that there was no magic ring : the magic was in them , all along !
But & # 8211 ; that doesn't really make sense .
Sure it does ! It's a magic ring !

Oh & # 8211 ; thanks , but never - mind . I had one of those before , and it turns out the magic was in me , all along .

RECIPE COMICS
today's recipe
VEGETABLES FOR BACHELORS
CUT AND SAVE !
Eating vegetables can be a pain for today's breed of young , cool , somehow single men !
The trick , Dromiceiomimus , is NOT to make vegetables fun . Nothing makes vegetables fun except using them as weapons ( carrot swords , etc ) .
The TRICK is to put all the vegetables into one easy - to - make , delicious dish !
How do you do it ?
Well , I'm glad you asked !
You chop up two potatoes , two tomatoes , and one onion , and throw them all in a pot !
Then , you add about 3 cups of spinach , and 1 / 2 cup of water , and maybe a few chopped - up chili peppers if you like your vegetables like you like your women ( spicy ) .
Cover and cook over medium heat until the potatoes are soft !
Awesome ! Okay , once more , from the top !
This is going to be the best talent show ever !
LOGICAL FALLACY COMICS PRESENTS : " THE GAMBLER'S FALLACY "
The gambler's fallacy is when one assumes that a deviation from what occurs in the long term . . .
. . . will be corrected in the short term !
This is most often seen when people play games of chance . They'll assume that , say , since they've had such bad luck with rolls of the dice recently , they are somehow " due " for a good roll !
However , in most cases things are independent . The results of the previous roll has no bearing on the current roll !
And just how is this a logical fallacy , T - Rex ? It sounds more like basic probability !
Well . . .
" Well . . . "
Whatever !
LOGICAL FALLACY COMICS PRESENTS : " THE GAMBLER'S FALLACY "
The gambler's fallacy is when one assumes that a deviation from what occurs in the long term . . .
. . . will be corrected in the short term !
This is most often seen when people play games of chance . They'll assume that , say , since they've had such bad luck with rolls of the dice recently , they are somehow " due " for a good roll !
However , in most cases things are independent . The results of the previous roll has no bearing on the current roll !
And just how is this a logical fallacy , T - Rex ? It sounds more like basic probability !
Well . . .
" Well . . . "
Whatever !

" L'esprit d'escalier " means , literally , " the wit of the staircase " !
( It's French ! )
It refers to when you think of a witty comeback too late , and you've already left the room !

However , it seems for others , thinking of the perfect comeback hours , or even days later , is a more - than - rare occurrence .

" CREDIT CARD FRAUD "
Credit card fraud is a growing problem in today's society !
I believe the fault of this lies in the inherent design flaws of the credit card system . If I give a credit card to someone , that should authorize one purchase , for a specific amount , at that specific time ! Instead , knowing someone's credit card information allows you to make charges to it for any amount , at any time , all over the world !
This certainly is a lot of talk about credit cards ! Aren't there any more pressing issues , T - Rex ?
Like what ?
Oh , like , I don't know . . . WORLD HUNGER ?
But I don't know how to solve that problem ! I do have opinions about the broken credit card infrastructure , however .
It's my blessing and my curse !

A BRIEF HISTORY OF CHARLES BABBAGE AND HIS WONDERFUL CALCULATING ENGINES COMICS
Charles Babbage spent a lot of his time working on mechanical calculating engines !
These were machines that could add and subtract , and later multiply and divide ( through repeated addition and subtraction ) , forecasting in many ways the design of modern - day computers !
Unfortunately the machines , with thousands of tiny gears and cogs , were too complex , beyond his means to fully manufacture at the time ( early 1800s ) .
While some see Babbage as the father of modern computers , he had little actual influence !
Yes , quite right !
This is because many of the innovations in his Analytical Engine , such as conditional branching and a separation of processing and memory , were left to be re - discovered by a new generation of pioneers !
Indeed !
This concludes the brief history of Charles Babbage and his wonderful calculating engines !
It's time to make some changes around here ! Some things have been allowed to slide for too long !

I submit that there are a finite number of songs ! Therefore , the art of writing music is the art of exploring a closed space of possibility .
Consider the following !
There are effective limits on what constitutes music . If we take a week as a very generous upper - bound on the length of one song , then we have a temporal limit . Furthermore , since our ears are not able to distinguish between very similar tones , we do not have a continuum of notes , but rather , a finite set . Therefore , there are only so many songs that can be written !
I am forced to disagree with you , my friend !
Surely not !
I think that you're omitting many dimensions of song . What about the way it's played , the lyrics ? These too can be varied almost indefinitely .
Almost , but there are still effective limits , therefore : finite number of songs !
SHOCK ENDING :
Or are there ?
T - REX AS : " THE COMPUTER SCIENTIST'
Computers store information in binary code , which is a series of 1s and 0s !
In fact , ALL information in a computer - text , video , sound , even PORNOGRAPHIC IMAGES - are stores in the same fashion , as 1s and 0s . Here's the interesting part :
Any series of 1s and 0s can be converted ( quite easily ) into a regular number ! So , for instance , your favorite song is contained - quite literally - in one single , 4 million digit number .
So copyright las is in a state of self - contradiction !
Quit right !
You can't copyright a fact ( like a number ) , but you can copyright a creative work , like a song or a piece of software . But since one can be transformed into another , copueight law is logically INCOHERENT .
That's really cool !
I know !
But , being really cool IS one of the perks of being a computer scientist !
T - REX AS : " THE COMPUTER SCIENTIST "
part 2
Okay , so we covered how everything in a computer is stored in binary code !
And we covered how any series of binary digits ( called bits ) can be transformed into a number . But these numbers are really large ! They take a long time to send to someone . Luckily , it's possible to send any number , and therefore any file of ANY size , using only two
single
bits .
Sure , all you need are sychronized timers ! Send one bit to say 'start counting' and a second to say 'stop ! '
What ?
Yeah ! Then all you have to do is count the amount of time between when you got the 'start' and 'end' bits , and that's your number ! Transform it into binary code , and you've got your file !
Well - yeah !
Ha ha , I knew it ! I am the smartest dude !
Yeah , but there's more to being smart than knowing compression schemes !
No there's not !

T - REX IN : " PRESENTISM "
Presentism is when you interpret the historical past with a view from the present !
Its danger is not just that it is often self - congratulatory , but also that judging historical figures by present - day moral standards is likely not a fruitful line of inquiry . What we see as questionable ( say , sexism ! ) would have seemed completely routine to someone brought up in such a time , and we can't really blame historical figures , I think , for not questioning it !
This seems awfully close to ethical relativism !
Huh ?
Well , aren't you saying we can't judge historical figures in a modern context , because they lived their lives during different times ? But then what's the point of having our advanced modern ideals , if we can't apply them ? I think we SHOULD be able to judge historical figures !
Anyway ! In conclusion , presentism has good points and bad points and is not as interesting as I thought it was !

They think they're so great just because they talk about the future all day long . Ooh , look at me ! I think that the future will have Internet robot nano - maids ! Put me on the news ! " Anyone can call themselves a futurist : it doesn't mean anything !
Argh ! I even hate the TERM " futurist " !

They pus my buttons , is all !
I think it's because most of the predictions are either really dumb or blindingly obvious .
Sounds like you already have your own idea of what the future will be like !
Yeah . . . full of Internet robot nano - maids !
HISTORIOGRAPHY COMICS featuring " Good Ol' T - Rex "
Historiography is the history of history , and includes the study of how history is understood !
We tend to think that history is just a record of what goes on in the past , but this overlooks the fact that two different people can view the same event , and even the same series of events , differently .
For instance ! Is history the story of progress , from savage to cultured Man ? Is it rather the study of Great Men and their Characters ? Perhaps it is the story of cultural challenge and response !
What's with the sexist language , T - Rex ? You're all " great MEN , cultured MEN " !
Sorry !
Most of these theories of history are over 50 years old , and reflect the sexism in the language at the time .
Well , if I were a woman , I think I'd be a little offended

TIME TRAVEL ADVICE COMICS
If you ever find your consciousness ( your self ) sent back in time to a much younger you , there are some changes to be expected ! Remember :
It can be frustrating to live out your life again !
But - there is hope . Small changes compound into large ones , and soon you will be encountering situations that you don't recall .
If you're going to impress by making predictions about the immediate future you should do so early on ! They may become increasingly inaccurate .
It can also be difficult to convince people you've traveled from the future !
Quite so !
This is why ( if you've gone back into your own life far enough ) using words and knowledge that are far beyond your means can help impress upon people the truth of your story .
Be careful though ! Overplay this , and you may become separated from your familiar world !
Anyway !
Enjoy being 6 !

Does " Betty put butter on the bread " mean the same thing as " Betty buttered the bread " ?
I would argue : no !
In the second example , there is an implication that the bread is wholly buttered , while in the first , this is not necessarily the case ! And this applies not just to butter : there are many other examples . For instance , " Gary wrote for many TV shows " leaves open the possibility of a co - author on the scripts , a possibility that " Gary wrote many TV shows " does not !
Wow ! These small changes in semantics ( he meaning of a word or phrase ) are quite interesting !
Yes !
But hard , too .
Agreed .
Thanks to chapter three of Steven Pinker's 1989 book " Learnability and Cognition " , upon which most of this comic was based .

T - REX AND HIS DINOSAUR FRIENDS IN : " OLD PHOTOGRAPHS "
You know those early photographs ? The silent , gloomy , sepia - toned ones ?
They're so sad !
What gets me every time is the faces of people I'll never meet , people long dead , trying not to move as they stare into that early camera lens . . . but what ESPECIALLY always gets me are the faces of the people who did move . This was for some the only time their face would be recorded , and they happened to shift .
That's so sad ! That's profoundly sad !
Is it because those blurred faces remind you that no matter what , the past can never be completely known ?
Kind of ! But I think what affects me the most if the idea of someone coming that close to achieving at least a type of immortality , and then losing it to something as natural and ordinary as glancing away .
Early photography does have its own sense of sad nostalgia , doesn't it ?
It does indeed ! It makes me want to go home and sit , alone and sober , in a darkened room .

TALKING DINOSAURS IN : " THE FALLACY OF BALANCE "
The fallacy of balance occurs when news agencies claim truth by reporting " both sides of the story " !
In most cases , that's not balanced at all !
For instance , if you're doing a story on how the sun is hot ( assuming it's a slow news day ) , you don't spend half the story presenting a guy who thinks the sun is cold ! You ignore the crazy minority .
But often , when science is reported , equal credence is given to the kooks and their kooky theories ! Science is presented as merely an opposing viewpoint .
Wow , I had no idea you were so fascist !
I'm not !
" Hey everyone , look at me ! I'm T - Rex ! My truth is the right truth ! "
That's not me !
There's degrees ! Science is based on repeatable observation !
Sounds like a fine line to me , my friend !

Today I believe in temporal presentism ! Only the objects around me are real . They exist in space , but not in time !
Neither the past nor the future actually exists !
Each moment is unique , and life is but series of moments , connected by our memories ! We speak of events occurring in the past only as a matter of convenience .
So the past is an illusion , eh ?
Yep !

Aha , my friend ! That's only because this present moment is predicated on past moments being as they were .
This is a stupid theory ! It doesn't get you anything !
It does explain why time travel isn't possible ! You can't visit a past or future that doesn't exist !

I sent an email to some dude today , and it came back with a verification message I had to reply to in order to prove I was " legit " !
Stupid whitelist spam protection systems !
Huh ? You don't like spam protection systems ?
Not these ones ! They're inherently flawed , assuming you ever want to hear from someone you don't already know . If two strangers have a whitelist system , then either they can never talk to each other , or they still get spam !
They'll still get spam ?
Of course !
Because if verification emails can get through , then it won't be long until spammers send messages that look enough like them to also get through . There's still a hole ! And if you seal it , you miss real verification emails .
I guess so . Anyway ! Let's go play TOUCH FOOTBALL !

Here are some bad things to say to someone who just broke up with his long - term girlfriend !
" Wasn't she the best ever ? "
" I was always impressed with her wit , her beauty , her intelligence and her sense of humour . "
" It's too bad you never go married , eh ? "
" I had a bit of a crush on her too ! She was a cutie . "
" I bet shew was a good kisser , huh ? "
" Was she a good kisser ? "
" Do you remember kissing her ? "
" Was it nice ? "
" Pretty nice ? " " Are you worried that one day you'll forget what it was like ? "
" Wouldn't that be sad ? "
I concede that , sometimes , it's nice to be polite ! However !
I also believe that it's NOT nice to be insincere . I am in conflict !
This is because there are situations in which being polite implies being insincere . For example , I may think someone looks pretty ridiculous in their fancy new hat , but if they ask me what I think , I'll try to say SOMETHING positive about it ! In order not to hurt their feelings , I am polite in sharing my opinion .
But it's understood that people will try to be polite , so this insincerity is okay !
Huh ?
If everyone knows people are being insincere , then what's the point of polliteness ? We end up in the same place , semantically speaking .
Not really ! Since there is always SOME doubt as to whether someone is just being polite , one can always take something as a compliment !
Hold that thought .

Wooo ! Secrets ! !
Dromiceiomimus , you know how doctors will hit your knee with a hammer to test your reflexes ?
Indeed I do !
WELL ! In some cases the patient will be too aware of what's going on , and the test won't work . In such cases the patient is asked to lock their hands togetehr and pull them in opposite directions . This distraction allows the test to succeed !
I believe this is called the " Jendrassik Maneuver " !
That's a pretty sinister name !
You're telling me ! What's neat about it , though , is that it's AUTOMATIC . Even if you're aware that it's a distraction , the Maneuver still works !
Really ?
Yep ! It's a neurological distraction affecting the pathways between the central nervous system and the motor neurons , dishibiting any tonic ( i . e . : baseline ) inhibitions . DOCTORS , huh ?

I'll let history be the judge of that !

WHAT
Seriously ! It's predicated on history always being a story of progression , with the future assumed to be a better judge of what's right than the present . I'm not sure that's valid ! Plus , I'm certain there's things that have been variously judged to be good and bad at different points in history !

LOGICAL FALLACY COMICS : today's fallacy : " THE STRAW MAN "
The " Straw Man " fallacy isn't so much a fallacy as it is a way of life !
In this fallacy , you present an altered version of your opponent's argument in order to make it appear absurd ! You then tear apart this weaker , ridiculous argument and claim victory . Basically it can be summarized as " make stuff up and attribute it to your opponent " ! Haha ! EXCELLENT .
What ? It's not excellent , T - Rex ! It's bad argument technique !
Maybe !
BUT , it's also a great way to win debates . And if anyone calls you on it , you just say " Come on . Your attack on me is the real straw man fallacy here ; let's be serious . "
But that's wrong ! Oh man , remind me never to debate you on the internet EVER .
Hah ! Hey how did you know I use the internet ?

COMPRESSED THESIS COMICS : today's thesis : " Computational Measures of the Acceptability of Light Verb Constructions "
Light verb constructions ( LVCs ) are constructions like " take a stroll " and " give a smile " !
They are formed by combining a light verb ( such as " take " and " give " ) with a complement ( " stroll " , " smile " ) . Most of the meaning of a ( non - idiomatic ) LVC comes from the complement ( " stroll " and " smile " ) .
Amazing !
I know !
But aren't some LVCs more acceptable than others ?
Yes , this is true !
It would be really nice to be able to measure that computationally .
Sure would ! Hmm , I wonder if statistical measures of association would correlate well with human judgement of construction acceptability ?

So ! Has anyone here ever tried setting goals , and then achieving those goals ?
So , throughout time , people have spent their youth learning , and the time after that applying what they've learned . Not a bad system !
. . . For a first try !
The problem is that we're spending longer and longer studyin . If you do a PhD , you could be 30 years old when you graduate ! And since there's so much to know about the world , people are forced to specialize . Even at 30 , there just isn't enough time to learn it all !
It's a necessary tradeoff ! Millions of people specialize and make tiny contributions to knowledge .
It's true !
But what if it didn't have to be that way ? If we lived forever , we could learn so much ! We could make connections between completely unrelated fields .
This is true , but the older generation would always remain ! If they became stuck in their ways , they might inhibit progress instead of helping .

JOKES EXPLAINED :
Aren't pointers programming tools , T - Rex ?
They are !
They allow one to reference the address of data , instead of the data itself . It's like how knowing someone's phone number lets you get in touch with them personally ! Hence the delightful " indirect reference " pun .
I too think these are pretty awful .
CONCLUSION :
Everyone ! Program harder ! !
let us discus public spaces , such as parks and sidewalks ! Does nobody own them ? Or , are they in fact owned . . . by everybody ?
An interesting distinction , if I do say so myself !
If nobody is seen as owning a public space , then nobody is motivated to care for it , and so care falls to the government . Spaces become bland and inoffensive , due to the nature of governance ! However , if everyone owns them , then everyone can take care of them , and they can become vibrant and challenging .
Challenging how ?
Challenging ARTISTICALLY .
People could put up posters and stuff on telephone poles , along with ads ! And anything that anyone didn't like , they could take down . It would be an anarchic art show or something !
Somehow I don't see this happening .

Today is a good day I think to talk about phlogiston !
That's right ! Phlogiston , bitches !
Phlogiston was proposed as a scientific explanation for combustion ! It was clear that some things burned ( like wood ) , while other things would not burn ( like ash ) . Phlogiston was a colorless , odourless and weightless substance that was contained in things that could burn . When they burned , the phlogiston was released into the air !
That's a pretty crazy theory !
Yeah , but it totally worked for a while !
It explained why if you burned things in a jar , they would go out : the air can only hold so much phlogiston ! But it started to fall apart when people discovered that some things , like magnesium , actually gained mass when burned .
So phlogiston would have to have a negative mass !
Yeah ! That seemed a little TOO krazy . But its actually pretty close to what we now believe , only backwards !
( We believe materials are deoxygenated and become oxygenated when burning ! )
Man ! I know it !
Copyright is intended to prevent others from ripping off your creations ! It used to extend 28 years after you created something , giving you a chance to profit while ensuring good ideas would eventually enter the public domain .
However , lately it's gotten pretty ridiculous !
Copyright extensions have pushed this protection up to the length of your life plus 70 years and beyond - basically , whenever Micky Mouse is due to enter the public domain , copyright law is extended . It's unfair and it restricts creativity !
How does it restrict creativity ?
Well !
With these insanely long copyright laws , there is no new public domain , and our modern culture is owned and put in private hands ! It ensures you can't build on anything that's been created in the past 70 years .
Wow , you really seem to care about copyright laws !
I just think we're approaching a state of perpetual copyright , and that this could interfere with my bhangra remixes of pop songs .
I mean my non - bhangra remixes , of course !

ME TOO MAN
Science is based upon hypotheses , conclusions and theories formed via repeated observations and experiments !
THE PHILOSOPHICAL BASIS OF SCIENCE
This allows us to fashion an empirical and verifiable understanding of the world around us . Theories are said to be correct if they match up with the observed properties of the universe ! However , science makes the tacit assumption that the universe is predictable and orderly and regular , which MAY NOT BE THE CASE .
I ask the question : what if some of the theories and laws of science were merely statistical ?
Explain !
Well , we say the speed of light is about 300 , 000 km / s , because it's been that every time we've measured it . But what if there's a small chance that sometimes , the speed of light can just - change ?
You're questioning the basis of science by postulating a non - deterministic universe .
Yeah man ! In such a universe , science totally fails !
So does life , probably ! It wouldn't matter because we'd all be dead !
Dead WRONG !
About science ?

Huh ?
They're a utopian society , right ? But the term " utopia " is a neo - logistic pun in Greek ! There , depending on how the word is pronounced ( " eu " or " ou " ) , it means EITHER 'good place' OR 'no place' . In English the " u " handles both these sounds , so 'utopia' actually contains both of these meanings !
That's ridiculous ! They didn't phase out of existence for the sake of a pun . You're just using this as an excuse to cram an etymology lesson where it doesn't belong !
Colour me impressed !

Does language alter the way we think ? Sources say : perhaps !
This source says : DEFINITELY YES .
I think it's a subtle but pervasive effect ! If a language doesn't have a word for something , I think I'm less likely to think about whatever it is that word would refer to . For instance , in English we have words for " friends " , but what if we had a single word for the phrase " friends who deserve pie more often " ? I bet I'd consider buying people more pies !
You're saying that if we had words for these things , people would think of them more often ?
Yeah !
Well , I agree , but I think you're confusing cause and effect ! As things become more prominent , they move to become words . Like " electronic mail " becoming " e - mail " and finally " email " - that was due to email becoming more popular , not because people were creating the word in order to MAKE IT more popular . You know ?

JOKES EXPLAINED PRESENTS : " CONFUCIUS SAY "
This vaguely - racist form of comedy relies upon the double - entendre ! It narrates the advice of a man called " Confucius " who delivers many a " bon mot " .
For example : " Confucius say . . . man who run in front of car get tired ! "
Ho ho ! Did you catch the comedy there ? There are two meanings in that phrase ! If you don't get it , don't worry - the key to emulating understanding is often just to repeat the last word or phrase . Fake a laugh , say " Hah ! TIRED . " and you will be SET .
Was there a real - life Confucius , T - Rex , or is he merely a convenient fictional device ?
Well !
As you know , there was in fact a real Confucius . He lived in the 5th century in Ancient China ( then called " China " ) and was and is an incredibly well - respected philosopher !
Indeed !
So yea , you've got to be careful , because the real Confucius said many non - hilarious things .
Phrases like " they who know the truth are not equal to those who love it " are not meant to be laughed at ! SO DON'T EVEN TRY .
To conclude , I hope people needed this joke explained , because otherwise I've been hardcore wasting my time today !
Some larger cities are plagued by advertising trucks : trucks paid to just drive around in the downtown core with giant advertising placards mounted on the back . The hell ? I disagree with this in the strongest way possible !
And generally I'm a seriously easy - going dude !
They're just so WRONG . They're causing unnecessary pollution in an area that already probably has problems with air quality , PLUS , they're congesting the road and making our cities more corporate and less beautiful . They're ugly , and the whole idea is self - centered , and thoughtless , and the worst kind of capitalism .
Oh man , those ad trucks piss ME off too !
Really ? You don't think I'm going overboard ?
Not at all ! It's aggressive advertising that intrudes on our public spaces , and since it adds to congestion on the roads , ACTUALLY MAKES PEOPLE'S LIVES QUANTIFIABLY WORSE . The time lost stuck behind an ad truck can be traced directly to some jerk who thought his message was more important than minutes from your LIFE .
SERIOUSLY GUYS I HATE THOSE AD TRUCKS TOO

My stars , do I ever love documentary films . The best form of filmmaking ?
As I see it , yes !
What I've come to love is the tension between filmmaker and subject , the way editing can so easily be used to slip the filmmaker's politics into the film . The veneer of realism , the claim of legitimacy - ooh ! It's all so GOOD . There's politics in every film , sure , but only documentary makes the claim of truth , and it's THAT claim that makes it all so interesting .
You're still on about documentary film ?
Dude ! It's SO GOOD .
My favourite are the extended takes , where you ask your subject a question , they answer it , and then you hold the camera on them for a good ten seconds afterwards while they glance around and look ridiculous .
It is a great way to subtly undermine your subject without saying a word .
Yep . T - That's what I think !
I -
Um .
Intelligent design ( or ID ) is the idea that while we may begin to understand the universe through science , it is actually created with divine intent . Evolution is not the chaotic product of random mutations , but rather intentional .
Much as a watch implies a watchmaker , so does our universe imply divinity !
Okay ! It's a very nice idea , but it's not science because it's not disprovable : you either believe in intelligent design or you don't , and there's no way to show who's right . That's not science - that's faith !
And whould faith be held to the rigors of the scientific method ?
Of course not !
The issue is that some think ID should be taught in schools as an alternative to evolution , right ?
Right !
But there's nothing in ID ( as I've formulated it ) to say that the two can't exist peacefully . One just doesn't belong in science class , because it's not a science . It belongs in religion class .
Wait - T - Rex , you claim to hear the voice of God ! What does he say about all this ?
I LIKE TO DANCE IN MY UNDERPANTS T - REX
He says - there's some merit to both sides of the issue ?

Is that racist ? ?
Learning a language is hard ! It is especially hard with your first language , when you're a baby who has to figure out an entire grammar and vocabulary just from what people say to you .
It's not just hard : in fact , it may well be impossible !
It turns out that natural languages are so complex that we probably can't figure out all their rules just from hearing words spoken around us , but we CAN approximate these rules and get very close . So the result is we ( as learners ) end up speaking a language we're able to communicate with , wut which is slightly different than those that surround us !
How slight a difference are we talking about here ?
That depends on the learner , I guess !
Rules that are used everyday are going to be more fixed , because there's more of a chance somebody will correct you . But less - frequent parts will be more malleable , which explains why languages evolve so quickly !
Because a language is never passed down , just an approximation of a language .
Yep ! Of course this has changed a little with the advent of grammar books and formal schooling , but it's still there . For example , I might think the word 'tenet' is enraging !
Really ? You think the word 'tenet' is -
Screw you ! !

Oh goodness , cryptography . It's really interesting !
Specifically , trapdoor functions are SUPER interesting ! Times two !
These are functions that are easy to compute but difficult to reverse - engineer - unless you have the secret 'trapdoor' information . For example , the product of two prime numbers ( p and q ) is not hard to figure out if you know their values ( it's just multiplication ! ) , but if all you have is the answer , n , guessing what p and q are can take a really long time .
And yeah , functions like this are a basis of cryptography !
How's that ?
Well , say I send n to you , and you know what the secret value of p is . There's a chance my message might be intercepted by a bad guy . But this dude will only know n , not p !
So I'll be able to figure out q easily , knowing what n and p are , but this guy will be totally stumped !
Yep ! Of course , all this lets us do is communicate a prime number q in secret to each other . But you can probably do even more things with trapdoor functions !
Probably ?
I'm almost certain !
Here is a startling thought : what if the things I believe in are wrong ?
I'm serious ! This is a big concern for me !
It's the reason I've never really attended any political marches - I can only rarely convince myself that I believe in something SO MUCH that those who don't share my beliefs are wrong , and need to be publicly convinced otherwise ! I'm always conscious that I may one day look back on my present - day self and shake my head .
So you're left with paralyzed middle - of - the - road beliefs ?
Not necessarily !
I'm just left with an acute awareness that I could be wrong about some of the things I currently believe in . Not big things , like racism , but little things , like mohawks !
Wait - you believe in racism ?

Is it possible to have too many friends ?
The answer is " Definitely yes ! "
This is because if you were friends with EVERYONE ever in the history of time , you'd have so many people who'd expect you to talk with them on the phone and hang out with them and stuff , and there's only so many hours in a day ! Eventually you'd end up snubbing at least SOME of them , which is bad .
Therefore , yes , it is possible to have too many friends !
You know , talking like this risks backlash , T - Rex !
How so ?
Well , few people worry about having too many friends , and those who feel like they could maybe use some more friends might become resentful . It's not the sort of thing you go looking for sympathy about .

NOT ANYMORE .
When someone says " murder is wrong " , they're clearly making an ethical statement . But what are they actually saying ? Let's totally find out !
Okay , so -
" Murder is wrong ! "
Wait - was I just saying that it is objectively and verifiably true that murder is always wrong ? That's a pretty big statement . Or was I merely saying that it's the societal consensus of most that murder is not such a good idea ? Maybe it's an emotional statement , saying " I'm against murder , personally " . Or MAYBE it's more of an imperative , better phrased as " Don't murder ! "
We've built a whole system around ethics and you're questioning its foundation !
That's right , baby !
I think it's cool that most people will agree that " murder is wrong " , but that they all might have very different ideas of what that actually means . We never really specify !
And we never will ! What's to be gained from arguing fine semantic points of justifying MURDER ?
A better understanding of ethics ? Plus the ability to not feel bad for accidentally " murdering " your friends who shoot down your ideas .

Hey guys ! P -
Pooty pooty ?
HeLa cells are a strain of cancer cells that , unlike regular body cells , can live indefinitely outside the body , grow very quickly , and don't die form old age . They are used in labs worldwide and are in many ways an independent organism !
They also helped in the research that eradicated polio !
So not only are HeLa cells the first observed example of devolution or speciation in human beings ( going from a multi - celled life form to a singe - celled one ) but they're also maybe a first example of immortality : her cells live , but the woman from whom the cells were taken , Henrietta Lacks , died from this cancer in 1951 . That's crazy !
Crazier : there's probably a greater mass of HeLa cells now than there was of Henrietta when she was alive !
Yeah !
The whole thing is so surreal , don't you think ? The woman made a huge contribution to society just by getting sick . And imagine a new species EVOLVING from your body ?
Well , Henrietta never found out . She was never even told that the cells were being cultivated !
And with that , I exhaust all my knowledge of Henrietta and HeLa cells . I am well and truly tapped .
The cells are called " helacyton gartleri " .
AW MAN ! ! I totally knew that one !
Also : learning is not a competition ?

INCORRECT HOMOPHONE COMICS
Two words that are homophones sound the same but mean different things !
For instance : the word " awful " ( really bad ) and the word " offal " ( burchered entrails ) !
To begin : my stomping on this manner is a sorted little affair ! Take soulless in the fact that at leased ewe are knot being chaste as well !

LOGICAL FALLACY COMICS
today's fallacy
BEGGING THE QUESTION
Begging the question is when what you're trying to prove is assumed implicitly in one of your premises !
FOR EXAMPLE : T - Rex is a pretty sweet dude because he's always so friggin' awesome !
This is actually formally valid : if the premise is true and I'm friggin' awesome , then it follows that I'm a pretty sweet dude . However , I've provided no logical support for my " T - Rex is awesome " premise , but only made a conclusion ( T - Rex = pretty sweet ) which relies on the premise being true . I haven't offered any evidence , so I am begging the question !
But " begging the question " is mostly used today to mean " raising the question " !
I know ! IT'S SO WRONG .
Well , I suppose that begs the question , T - Rex : if it's used more often to mean " raises the question " than " a fallacy of presumption " , doesn't that suggest that the definition of the phrase has evolved ?
NO IT DOES NOT . What it suggests is that everybody sucks but me !

Vegetarians are chicks and dudes who don't eat a lot of meat for some reason or whatever !
DIFFERENT TYPES OF VEGETARIANISM
First off , you've got your lacto - ovo vegetarians , who don't eat meat but do eat eggs and milk . There's also lacto vegetarians and ovo vegetarians . Then you've got your vegans , who don't eat meat or ANY animal products , so eggs , honey , milk , and cheese are out , and even leather sometimes . For - for shoes .
And pants ?
My favorite are the freegans !
Where you be vegetarian for free ?
Close ! It's where you don't eat meat unless you're given it for free , like from a dumpster . You prevent meat from going to waste , but you don't support its production .
That sounds close to flexitarians , who only eat meat when being vegetarian would be rude or inconvenient !

FUN FACT : Did you know that if you're in a situation where your messages have a chance of being lost or misunderstood , then you can never fully share information with someone ?
It's totally true , even if all the messages arrive unmolested !
So Dromiceiomimus , imagine I'm sending you a letter that says " hi " . You get it , so now we both know that I said " hi " , but only you know that YOU know that I said " hi " . So you send a letter that says " got it " , which I get - but then I know that you know that I said " hi " , but you don't know that I know that YOU know that I said " hi " . And so on !
We go back and forth sending " I got your 'I got it' " letters forever !
So plausible , T - Rex !
Well , of course we wouldn't ACTUALLY do that , but the point is that we can never know the exact same information , unless it's 100 % guaranteed that the messages aren't lost or garbled . But the mail isn't like this !
Oh man , this is just another one of your dumb postal service conspiracy theories ! !

A singularity refers to a future moment when we create artificial intelligences that are smarter than we are . It's called this because things will be so different , it's impossible to predict past it . Everything will change !
For instance : these smart machines could make even smarter machines !

Our choices seem limited to either becoming something new , or facing irrelevance and obsolescence !

Because too much has changed !

I have been trying , UNSUCCESSFULLY , to write a poem for the past half hour . I am trying to capture the emotion of getting up early in winter , during a heavy snowfall , and going for a walk and coming across a set of traffic lights ( the kind that switch automatically ) controlling traffic that isn't there , traffic that won't be there for hours . EPIPHANY COMICS
Friends are good things to have ! They can help you out when you are sad ( a psychological benefit ) , and can lend you money if you need it ( an economic benefit ) !
It is these positive benefits of having friends that concern me !
I'm pretty sure I like my friends because of the people they are , but what if I'm just kidding myself ? What if I really just like them because they're an economic cushion - someone to bail me out , even literally , if I get into trouble ?
Well - I mean , you'd do the same thing for us , T - Rex .
Exactly ! We hedge our bet by having friends !
There are friendships that go beyond this shared benefit , T - Rex !
How so ?
Okay - what about " best friends forever " , the people in your life who you'll know will stand by you no matter what ?
They are even MORE of an economic benefit ! They are get out of jail free cards , people who you can rely on in any situation .
Wait ! ! My problem's that I'm seeing any positive effect of friendship as income , and thus everyone involved in one as compromised in a conflict of interest . I would only be happy if having friends was awful ! Thanks , rare and brilliant moments of perfect self - awareness !
I learnt a new phrase today !
" Intellectual terrorism ! "
" I first thought it was a ridiculous phrase , both on its own and with all the phrases it suggested , like " emotional terrorism " and " pseudo - intellectual terrorism " . But if ideas are powerful , then maybe you can terrorize someone with them ! Maybe ? Then again , " intellectual terrorism " comes very close to saying that ideas I disagree with or find distasteful are wrong , and worse , damaging and weaponized . Whatever , intellectual terrorism !
How'd you hear a phrase like that ?
In just the way you'd think !
Someone didn't like what they were reading , so they defined its contents as " terrorism " . I think they were serious .
It does sort of suggest that if someone said just the right words to you , you'd become instantly paralyzed with a life - shattering fear .

PLEASE TRY TO FOCUS ON THE TOPIC AT HAND
There are some phrases , usually joined by " and " or " or " , that we always say the same way even though it would make logical sense to say them another way . For example : " I am sick and tired of these phrases ! "
Or am I merely . . . TIRED AND SICK of them ?
Eh , Dromiceiomimus ? Pretty awesome ! By saying the words of these phrases in UNPOPULAR order , I subvert people's expectations AND the bolts and nuts of language itself !

Primitivism is the artistic and cultural idea that prehistorical and tribal societies were , and are , better that modern societies .
Okay guys ! Whatever !
The trouble I have with primitivism is the half - assed way it's always evoked : it's this simplified idea of " primitive " cultures , where some things get highlighted while a lot of detail gets ignored or obliterated completely . All the women were totally topless and all the men wore body paint and hunted with spears ! Life was good in the forest !
Primitivism has this strange semi - positive racism attached to it too .
Semi - positive ?
Yeah ! You exaggerate traits as you often do with racism , but you make them positive things instead of negative . Natives were better because they were all stoic and noble and loved Mother Nature . Okay , great , but what if you're native and you're not like that ?
Comedy ensues !
Whoah , did I say " comedy " ? I meant to say " an encounter with prejudice about model minorities " .

Occam's razor is a principle of simplicity ! It says that one should always choose the simplest explanation for something , when given a choice between competing theories of different complexity .
OCCAM'S RAZOR COMICS
