Dear audio diary : sometimes I worry that the only thing I'm not great at is modesty !
However !
These thoughts are , at best , infrequent
A narrative hook is when you introduce a story with something incredible so your audience will keep reading ! It happens when you're told that in this comic . . . SPIDER - MAN ! WILL ! ! DIE ! ! !
LITERARY TECHNIQUE COMICS
today's technique :
NARRATIVE HOOK
Setting , themes , and basically anything else can ALSO be used as a narrative hook , but they're all pale imitations of Spider - Man's death being announced on the first friggin' page ! Compare and contrast " As the bullet sped towards his eye , Neil wryly observed that things probably couldn't get any worse ! " with " As the bullet sped towards his eye , Neil suddenly remembered that by the end of the chapter , Spider - Man ! Will ! ! Die ! ! ! The bullet sped closer . "
Yeah , but Spider - Man never dies !
That's what makes it such a great hook !
We know that , WORST CASE , Spider - Man will show up in the next issue and say " Hey did anyone miss me ? I thought I was dead , but then I remembered I wasn't ! " And yet we keep coming back for more !
And that's great ?
Yes ! It's why the first sentence of ANY BOOK is improved by adding Spider - Man .
MEANWHILE , IN TUDOR ENGLAND !
Hey Shakespeare , you know what's a better first line for " The Taming of the Shrew " than " I'll pheeze you , in faith " ?
no what
BASICALLY ANYTHING
Turbellaria flatworms are hermaphroditic , with viable male AND female sex organs !
Pretty great , I know !
But because of this , when it comes to reproduction , who's gonna be the mother is up for debate . And it turns out that being pregnant is hard work ! So these worms FIGHT IT OUT , and by " FIGHT IT OUT " I mean they pull out their dagger - like penises and try to stab sperm through the other's flesh .
The loser gets pregnant first ?
The loser gets pregnant first !
And it's called " penis fencing " . Utahraptor , I can't get enough .
In another reality , you could've had a PhD in penis fencing .
Frig , man ! I sentence like that could make a fella feel like he's made some bad decisions !
MEANWHILE , IN ANOTHER REALITY :
Dromiceiomimus , it's called " penis fencing " ! In another reality , I could have a PhD in penis fencing .
But you do , T - Rex !
UM OBVIOUSLY I MEANT A BETTER DEGREE FROM A MORE RESPECTABLE SCHOOL .
Some people think pornography is bad , since when they see it they get offended and say " That's way too explicit . SHEESH ! " With that in mind , I've come up with something special : pornography for them ! But it's also -
Pornography for everyone !
Obviously , you can't control how explicit images are , since they're set . But , you CAN control how explicit text it , since any images there are imagined by the reader . So all you need to do is craft sexy fiction that relies on the reader generating any eroticism in the scene ! That way , they only have themselves to blame if they imagine something they think is way too sexy .
I'd like to see an example !
Of course !
Pat and Alex had some sort of relationship . One time they were expressing it physically - in a remarkable way ! Their location : erotic . Upon seeing it a third party would likely say " How are they . . . wow . Just - wow . "
That's not very erotic .
You criticize only your own imagination !
Did you even NOTICE how I used names that work for both men and women ? It is QUANTUM EROTICA , at once straight , lesbian , gay and other , which only collapses into one sexuality upon being observed by the reader !
Honestly ! Sometimes I wonder how I'm not more famous !
So folks say that Shakespeare was a pretty good writer , right ? Everyone's all , " He's an A + umber one writer dude " ?
Right !
But I think a big part of this is that we're only familiar with his greatest works ! If he'd lived TODAY , he might still have written Hamlet , but he also would have written tons of awful stuff : terrible blog posts , terrible comments on other people's blog posts , and so on . I think with all that crap , his reputation would be far less pristine .
Actually Shakespeare did write some pretty terrible stuff , T - Rex !
What ?
Yeah , but the good stuff is so good that we overlook the bad ! Dude wrote some bad sonnets , and no less than T . S . Eliot referred to his rarely - performed " Titus Andronicus " as " the worst play ever written " .
Hah ! That sounds like a challenge to me ! !

The amount needed to heat one kilogram of water by one degree Celcius . And the suggested diet has a daily calorie level of around 2000 .
So my energy needs are equivalent to slightly heating 2000 litres of water . That's , what - a big bathtub or an extremely tiny pool ?

Celsius is way better than Fahrenheit ! Celsius puts zero at the point where water freezes , and 100 at the point where it boils . That's handy ! Water's EVERYWHERE , man .
If you're ever trapped in the past you can recreate Celsius , no problem !
But Fahrenheit ? FAHRENHEIT is based on the temperature of brine for zero and the temperature of some eponymous dude's armpit for - 96 degrees ? They should've called it " Armpits ! The Temperature Scale " .
Fahrenheit DOES ensure there's no negative numbers when dealing with commonly - encountered temperatures .
Oh , boo hoo ! So does Kelvin , and that's BASICALLY Celsius anyway !
I think all this underscores how arbitrary these systems of measurement are !
What ? How ?
You're always just picking two temperatures and dividing the space between up into arbitrary degrees ! We could just as easily be dealing with the freezing and boiling points of a 50 / 50 mixture of champagne and caviar , say .
. . . Oh My God .
YES .

HONESTLY NOT REALLY SURE WHAT YOU WERE EXPECTING
Folks will occasionally publish a story in which a particularly conspicuous orthographic symbol is missing .
I know a handful of justifications for doing this !
It's fun to scout out any limits in your wording ( artificial or not ) and , in doing so , hit upon an additional , unfamiliar form of communication ! And it's a joy to find that , with this unusual linguistic format now at your disposal , talking with this constraint is just as normal to you now as talking without it was !
It's tricky to sound natural , though .
No doubt !
But do you actually obtain anything by talking in such a way ?
Obviously !
You NOT ONLY gain faculty with odd word inclinations , if that is actually a faculty , but you also gain all sorts of skills : talking skills , thinking quickly skills , and um . . . an opportunity to publish a dictionary for folks with similar fascinations ?
Huh .
I still think that it's not half as striking as if you didn't say a particular word for a bit - say , " frig " ?
Utahraptor ! Do you truly ask that i dismiss my many plans for my tomb to proclaim " THIS MAN SAID 'FRIG' A LOT AND , YOU GUYS , IT WAS SO RAD " ?

Linguistic universals are a small handful of properties that can be universally applied to every natural language on the planet !
For example : every natural language includes the ideas of being " alive " and " dead " !
That's not really surprising , I guess , since every language EVER has been spoken by people who once were alive and are now totes dead . Similarly , every language has concepts of " male " and " female " , which suggests that we , as a people , find naughty bits interesting !
They do define who can procreate .
Um , I KNOW
Are there any more interesting universals ?
Sure !
No natural language uses the " blowing a raspberry fartnoise sound as a phoneme , which is just - it's just - well , it's too bad , Utahraptor .
Really ?
Yes , really ? Someone's name could be FARTNOISE FARTNOISE JUNIOR , and that someone could've been ME .
And that brings us to today's Proof We're Not Living In The Best Of All Possible Worlds !
" None of us are friends with Fartnoise Fartnoise Junior "
Stephen Hawking says the best proof that time travel isn't possible is that we're not overrun by loads of tourists from the future !
Stephen Hawking says a lot of things !
And maybe the reason tourists aren't running around here and now is because they have , um , ALL OF TIME to choose from ? If I could travel through time I wouldn't go back to yesterday , I'd go to the future ! I already know what happened yesterday : I ate a bunch and then I pooped a bunch !
T - Rex !
THE PAST IS UGLY , Dromiceiomimus ! !
You're saying the reason we don't see any time tourism is that we're - boring ?
Yep !

I suppose now you're going to suggest we do something so amazing that the future will HAVE to check us out ?
Nope ! Firstly , Utahraptor , that's an INCREDIBLY tall order !
. . . And secondly ?

Cultural universals , like linguistic universals , are properties that are found in EVERY SINGLE CULTURE EVER !
For example : cultures universally have units of time !
And cultures universally consume food and water , which makes sense because otherwise they'd be dead . And cultures universally have beliefs about death and disease and cultures universally have concepts of both music and dance !
Universally ? Really ?
Yep ! Scientists looked at HISTORY .
Um , that's not actually universal , T - Rex ! " Universal " means EVERYTHING , not just Earth !
What ?
But you're using it to mean " just on Earth , actually , and um , just within the history we remember " . That's RACIST against people from unrecorded history , PLUS it's racist against every other form of life in the entire universe . Basically I'm saying that you are perilously close to being the MOST PREJUDICED RACIST GUY EVER IN TIME .

We say " Let's Party ! ! " all the time , but when we say " Let us Party ! ! " it sounds hella formal !
" Let's " is a crazy contraction , you guys !
Other contractions sound a little formal when uncontracted ( " You will definitely love this " versus , " You'll definitely love this " ) , but " let's " is INSANE ! " Dudes ! Let us now gobble these sausages ! " Are we KINGS AND PRINCES ? In summary and in conclusion , " let's " is contracted so RELIABLY that it seems like a big affectation to use " let us " as separate words .
So let us break that association by no longer contracting it !
Let us see how that goes , Utahraptor !
I think that this has been successful so far . Let us continue this experiment !
Let us ! Incidentally , my favourite Salt - N - Pepa song is " Let Us Talk About Sex " .

ALTERNATE ENDING
Why do we say " rest in peace " ? Is it just -
It comes from Latin !
It's a prayer , " reuiescat in pace " , which also works in English with about the same meaning : rest in peace . It comes from the Christian tradition , which at various points and to various people has held that there is a time of " soul sleep " after death but before judgment .
THE END

HEY T - REX DO YOU BELIEVE MONEY MAKES PEOPLE HAPPIER
Let's discuss !
I think it's clear that at some income levels , money DOES buy happiness !
If you can't afford to eat or buy diapers for your child and then you can , that money will make you happy and have obviously bought you happiness !
On the other hand , some lottery winners are less happy a few years after winning than they were before !
Mo' money CAN , apparently , indeed lead to mo' problems .
So let us say money can buy happiness , assuming it's not received all at once .
But billionaires aren't uniformly jolly !
That's true . Okay , so clearly there's a function where money buys happiness with less efficiency as happiness increases .
That implies giving a depressed dude a few bucks will cheer him right up .
Heck , maybe it does ! Let's find a depressed dude and find out !

EPISTEMOLOGY COMICS
If I say " Guys , I know I'm rad " , what am I saying ? What does it actually mean to KNOW something ? Philosophers have struggled with this for ages !
Luckily , the answer is super easy and they should have come up with it sooner !
Knowledge of anything , radness included , comes about if three conditions are met : that this thing is true , that I believe it to be true , and that I have a JUSTIFIED cause for this belief ! Perhaps my justification of radness is that I've been shot out of a cannon onto a motorbike , which is extremely rad . When these three conditions are met , then I've got what's called a Justified True Belief , and that , my friends , is what knowledge is !
Okay , so we're hanging out , and I say " T - Rex , I'm gonna go nap in your bed . "
I say , " Dude , feel free ! "
However , once in your room I startle a sleepy murderer , who without alarming you , quietly murders me , stuffs me in the closet , and then goes back to nappy times - in your bed ! ! A few minutes later you say , " Nice . An orange dude is sleeping in my bed . " Clearly , this is justified , and it may even be true .
But only if the murderer was orange ! Don't you see ? It's sheer luck that this murderer was coloured to make your belief true . Are you really going to call random chance " knowledge " ?
Utahraptor ! !
Please don't get murdered in my bedroom , Utahraptor
A person's activity is often used by law enforcement when pursuing a conviction ! Facebook posts , Twitter updates and Google searches for " how to murder the sucky neighbour " have all been used as evidence of intentful wrongdoing .
I can totally use this to my advantage !
AS SUCH , I've recently done tons of Google searches for " how to avoid breaking laws " , " i love being not guilty " , " how to be an EVEN MORE innocent dude " , and " how to avoid crime because , not unlike Batman himself , I too hate crime " .
There's nothing like a Twitter post that says " Definitely not planniny any crimes ever ! # seriouslyyouguys "
Nothing ! !
Now if I'm ever accused of wrongdoing , any investigation will reveal these posts and my extreme innocence !
Really ?
You're not worried how suspicious it is for someone to be SO CONCERNED with appearing innocent ?
Man , there's nothing illegal about being big into innocence ! Besides , Utahraptor , I'M not the one who looked up " how to frame T - Rex for future criminal activities ? ? " on my home computer .
. . . I looked it up on yours .
But friends forever , right ?
That's binding , right ?

Let us assume that everyone alive today has two biological parents , a mother and a father . I will call this the " No Cloned Chicks " hypothesis !
And let us further assume that everyone's parents had a biological mother and father too !
This seems pretty reasonable . But it can't possibly be the case ! If you take me , I've got two parents . My parents have two parents themselves , so this means that three generations ago , four people are needed to eventually produce me . Another generation back , we're eight people , and five generations ago gives me sixteen ancestors !
And if you go back 1500 years or so , say , fifty - five generations ?
That's exactly the problem !
At fifty - five generations , I've got over TEN QUADRILLION grandparents all running around at the same time ! Man ! There's NO WAY there was room for that .
Ah , but you're assuming everyone's sexing up a totally genetic stranger . If you sex up a relative , any child produced will have fewer grandparents !
. . . Huh ! So the fact that there weren't ten quadrillion people 1500 years ago SCIENTIFICALLY PROVES that some of my ancestors liked sexing it up with their cousins ! !

In the 1300's , the regular chicks and dudes in England were speaking what we'd call " Middle English " , a rapidly developing alternative to the Latin and French used in religion and government .
It was an exciting time to be saying " Forsooth " !
And some of these dudes were big into English being developed as a " real " language , particularly one John Wycliffe , who decided to translate the Bible - one of , if not THE most important book of his time - into casual English . This would allow John's less educated countrymen to read it since , as it'd been written in Latin since the 5th century , currently required either formal education or a priest to interpret it for you !
But when they started translating , they ran onto some problems !
Papal Resistance ?
That , but also a lot of English words they needed didn't exist yet ! So John invented them , and we still use his " behemoth " , " puberty " , and " zeal " . But he also needed a word for intestines " , and the phrase he came up with - FOR THE BIBLE , I REMIND YOU - was " arse ropes " .
Hilarious !
And that brings us to today & # 8217 ; s Proof We & # 8217 ; re Not Living In The Best of All Possible Worlds !

Most detective stories reveal clues to the reader as they progress through the book , allowing them to unravel the mystery with the characters , and , if they're good , figure out the mystery before the detective does !
Not my detective story , you guys ! !
My detective doesn't show all the clues to the reader ! He's always detecting stuff that the reader doesn't know and can't know , and at the end when he figures out the mastery , he arrests the murderer for reasons that we aren't privy to and that no careful reading of the text will ever reveal .
The end !
Sounds pretty boring AND frustrating , T - Rex !
It's not ! I added in some NARRATIVE TENSION too !
AS the story progresses , the narrator increasingly gives up on mystery ever being solved , and instead of describing the actions of the detective , indulges his interest in interior decoration and describes the curtains on the wall .
Riveting !
It is !
I call my tale , " The Stabby Murderer Who Got Detected , Or , Wow Will You Look At These Curtains ? "
Man , they say to write what you know , but I think they're just jealous of my awesome imagination !

LATER :
Pessimists say that by expecting the worst , they're pleasantly surprised when things don't go that badly ! I thought I'd give it a try , but honestly . . .
I don't think pessimists are imagining hard enough
Man , speaking of pessimism , you know who's pessimistic ?
Arthur Friggin' Schopenhauer !
Not only did A . F . S . not believe that this is the best of all possible worlds , he supplied a proof that this is , in fact , the WORST of all possible worlds ! First he assumed that the worst possible world would be sustainable , since if it ended , nobody would be around to suffer . Prolonged suffering across millenia beats instant death !
Clearly !
CLEARLY .
Then he observed that our world is good enough to support life , but just barely !
Life's everywhere , man !
Sure , but one small shift in orbit , a slight change in temperature , and it's a catastrophe on a global scale . There's no wiggle room ; if our fragile world was only a little worse there would be no life on it at all !
Therefore ours is the worst of all possible worlds ?
Yep ! Because any worse and it wouldn't be a world , it would just be an empty planet without suffering , and nature ABHORS an empty planet without suffering .
Anyway !
I believe it was after this proof that A . F . S . added the " Friggin' " to his name !
LITERARY TECHNIQUE COMICS
today's technique : LEITWORTSTIL
Today is a good day I think for leitwortstil !
Leitwortstil is the purposeful repetition of words or phrases in a story , you guys !
For example , a dog might always be described as " that wacky jerk " in a story , to underline what a wacky jerk that dog turned out to be . Or in a collection of stories , the same phrase might appear in each story , which helps tie them together as a whole ! Leitwortstil ALSO happens when a character says the same word over and over and over again .
You mean like a catch phrase ?
Sure !
I'm not sure that counts as leitwortstil , does it ? If it's just someone saying " Gee golly jeepers ! " , and there's no theme or motif associated with it - then it's just there for laughs , isn't it ?
My friend , I believe you are unfortunately TOTES WRONG on this one !

I stubbed my toe ! Frig frig frig frig frig ! . . . Hey , Shakespeare ! I just leitwortstiled " frig " !

Maslow was a dude who put all of our needs and desires into a hierarchy ! The whole idea was that you can't satisfy any desire at the top of the hierarchy until you satisfy those beneath it .
Nice going , Maslow !
At the top is SELF ACTUALIZATION , which sounds pretty great , right ? Except you can't get there unless you've already satisfied the level beneath it , which is esteem . And you don't get esteem - both self and from others - without relationships , and you don't worry about friggin' relationships until your basic safety needs are met . And finally , you don't worry about basic safety if you need to poop !
" You don't worry about basic safety if you need to poop . "
Maslow said it , not me !
Well , he said the gist of it .
He did , did he ?
Okay , no , but he DID come up with the theoretical framework that allows a phrase such as mine to be reasonably constructed in a meaningful context .

Dollars for sale ! DOLLARS FOR SALE !
Dollars for sale , you guys !
Dollars for sale in an auction where everyone pays their highest bid , whether or not they win !
So when you bid 1 cent , Dromiceiomimus - FOR A PERFECTLY LEGITIMATE DOLLAR - you'll be getting a great deal and you'll make a profit of 99 cents ! But watch out , because if Utahraptor outbids you with 2 cents , then you could lose your penny ! Remember you have to pay your high bid either way .
So it's in my interest to outbid him with 3 cents : that way I can at least make a profit of 97 cents !
But then I'll just outbid her with the exact same motivation !
True !
But then - if Dromiceiomimus bids 98 cents , I'll bid 99 . Then she has to decide whether to bid $ 1 : if she doesn't , she loses 98 cents , but if she does , she'll break even . So she does , and I'm left with the choice of either losing my 99 cents , or of bidding $ 1 . 01 and then only losing 1 cent .
So I bid more than the dollar is worth , just to minimize my losses ! And it keeps on going , and we both end up bankrupt ! This is the worst ever auction , and I'm not bidding .
Would you say . . . " The only winning move is not to play ? "

David Hilbert was a mathematician and hotelier who was born in 1892 . He built an infinite hotel , you guys !
THE INFINITE HOTEL
A TRUE STORY
So Hilbert built this infinite hotel that was infinitely big and had infinitely many rooms ; I believe this was a matter of some investment . But build it he did , and soon after a bus with infinity people in it showed up , with each of them wanting a room ! Lucky for Hilbert he had his infinite hotel , so each guest got a room , and the hotel was filled up to capacity . Nice ! But just then another friggin' bus showed up , and it ALSO had infinity people in it !
Nobody builds for TWO infinite buses showing up right after the other !
Turns out they do !
He just told every guest already there to move into the room that was double their current room number . So the guest in room 3 moved into room 6 , and so on ! Thus , only the even - numbered rooms were occupied , and everyone on the new bus could have an odd - numbered room !
Amazing !
Yep ! Anyway !
It's my understanding that he died an infinitely rich man infinity years later
HISTORY'S CHUMPS
History if full of chumps , you guys ! !
Today's historical chump is William H . Mumler ( born 1832 ) , who was a photographer guy who did portraits ! Only he wasn't very good photographer guy because one time he accidentally double - exposed some film , and the resulting image showed the one portrait clearly but also showed a ghostly image of the other portrait !
So he threw away the photo and reminded himself not make that dumb mistake anymore ?
Nope !
Instead he embarked on a career as a SPIRIT PHOTOGRAPHER and made a lot of money duping a lot of people , including Abraham Lincoln's widow . Only , peopleeventually started to notice that his " ghosts " looked an awful lot like living people around town !
Hah ! Whoops !
They ALSO eventually noticed how he was breaking into their houses so he could look at photographs and figure out what his ghosts were supposed to look like . Anyway like everyone else from history he eventually died and now his entire life has been compressed to a short story , the end !

. . . what word ?
The words for " mother " and " father " are really similar , if not identical , across tons of languages ! And the reason isn't because the languages are closely related . It's due to a way more awesome reason !
It's because parents totally assume their babies are talking about them !
It's so amazing : " ma " , " pa " are some of the first and easiest language - like sounds babbling babies make - and what's the word for " mother " in English ? " Mama " ! And it's also " mama " in Dutch , and in Romanian , and in Catalan , Slovak , Quechu , Romanian , Chinese , German , Russian , and MORE . The languages have evolved such that the first language noise a baby makes sounds like it's saying " Hey mom , what's up ? "
And dads make the seam deal too ! " Papa " is in English , Cree , and Hindi !
Neat !
It's kinda awesome that these words are built to flatter new parents .
Man , it's great ! Across language , time , and entire civilizations , we're united by pointing at our babbling babies and saying , " Yes . This child is DEFINITELY talking about me . "

I'm REALLY NOT SURE how that happened
For every action , there is an equal and opposite reaction .
That's Newton's third law o' motion !
And it means that when I slam into a wall and bounce off and hurt myself , I'm not sore because the wall is solid . I'm sore because the wall hits me - LITERALLY hits me ! The wall DECIDES to hit me back with exactly as much force as I hit it with , and I'm the one who gets hurt !
The wall hit you , but " decide " is misleading ! The wall didn't make any decisions .
Man , how do we know ? !
We call it Newton's LAW because all matter in the Universe follows it . But maybe every atom of matter in the universe is imbued with JUST enough consciousness to decide to be a retaliatory dick every chance it gets !
That's magical thinking , T - Rex .
Utahraptor , I can live in a world of immutable scientific laws , or I can live in a world where I need to revenge myself on my kitchen floor because it smashed up a glass I dropped .
Wait , when I put it that way it sounds kinda dumb ! !

It is something I am experimenting with
Let's say you can live in any time period in history . Which period do you choose ?
I choose the future !
Or at least , I did choose the future until I realized that things might not ACTUALLY be better down the road . If I lived 300 years from now , I could be living in a post apocalyptic time where most life has been obliterated by a catastrophic asteroid impact - an impact so large that enough dirt has been thrown into the sky to BLOCK OUT THE SUN , disrupting the entire food chain and causing mass extin -
Anyway , that's a possibility or whatever ! !
So the past is the only safe choice .

LATER :
Professor Science , we can SCIENTIFICALLY PROVE that people are wrong for getting mad at me for saying life is worth like twenty bucks ? It grows in crusty milk , it is like the most free thing ever ! ! . . . PROFESSOR ARE YOU EVEN HOME
You know what ? We totally can put an exact price on life , down to the nearest cent .
In fact , we do it all the time !
Every time we land somewhere on the gradient between safety and expense , we do it . If a new ambulance costs $ 100 , 000 but would likely save at least 100 lives while it was in use , and we decide NOT to buy it , then we're saying those particular lives aren't worth $ 1000 . Ouch ! Sorry , ambulance dudes !
But maybe we don't have the money to buy an ambulance anyway !
Sure ! It's not a perfect measurement .
All I'm saying is we ESTIMATE it all the time . Heck , you do it whenever you're paid hourly and you speed into work ! Divide the extra money you get by being there sooner by the increase chance of death the added speed brings you , and you've just VALUED YOUR OWN LIFE .
. . . I - I guess so !
On the flip side , whenever housecleaners clean a bathroom , they're PAID to kill the bacteria there ! So those tiny lives are worth negative dollars . And there's SO MANY bacteria , Utahraptor !
There are like a decazillion of them I am ALMOST certain
So , um , I spent a few days putting a price on LIFE ITSELF , and now I've got a dollar figure for my own life !
Kinda depressing , you guys !
Well , you can bolster it some , right ? Like , you could add on the price each your organs would fetch on a black market . That'd raise it some !
THAT JUST MAKES IT MORE DEPRESSING ! I don't want to be commodified , Dromiceiomimus . When people said " You can't put a price on life " , they didn't mean it was an impossibility - they meant it in the permissive sense ! They were trying to give me GOOD ADVICE .
Not a fan of your entire life reduced to a single number ? Then don't do it !
Huh ?

If honeybabe made a mistake , I might say " Honeybabe , you made a mistake ! "
Or maybe I'd say " Honeybabe , you blew it ! "
Maybe I'd suggest our honeybabe in question blundered . Did she just slip up , or did she totally botch it ? Maybe it was just an error ? A miscalculation ? An oversight ? A FAILURE ? The words we choose indicate how severe a mistake it was , but ALSO suggest various degrees of culpability , and most of us are pretty finely tuned to their nuances of meaning - even honeybabes !

Surveys are kinda baloney , you guys ! They're kinda phoney baloney to the ultimate max .
And I'm not one to say things like that often ! !
Say there's a survey about applesauce : like most dudes , I don't really have APPLESAUCE OPINIONS , so I'm probably not going to answer a whole survey about it ! But if I were big into applesauce ( or big AGAINST applesauce ) I'd be way more into answering the survey . The result is that surveys overrepresent extreme viewpoints , because the only people completing surveys are those INTERESTED in doing so .
The apathetic ARE typically underrepresented in surveys .
Precisely , my friend !

So all my talk about the entire universe being a big simulation ignored one pretty big question , which is this :
Why simulate an entire universe when you can just simulate one awesome dude ?

Why simulate an entire universe when you can just simulate one awesome dude ?
Let's assume that if we're simulating universes , we're doing it for a reason . Sure , SOME simulations would be the whole universe , but that's complicated and expensive ! Why simulate boring microbes galaxies away if we're just interested in one dude on Earth ? And why simulate this one dude at all , unless you're trying to find out more about his life , get inside his head , perhaps . . . FIND OUT WHERE HE BURIED THE DIAMONDS ? ?
You're proposing simulations be used for historical research !
Exactly !
And since MY consciousness is the only one I can confirm , it means that outside this simulation , in my REAL life , I did something SO RAD that people are still trying to figure it out . You're here to ensure I act like I did before , and perhaps , at the end , to ask me -
WHERE DID YOU BURY THE DIAMONDS ? ?
* gasp *
ALSO , PRECISELY WHEN WILL YOU GIVE ALL YOUR MONEY TO UTAHRAPTOR ? ? FUTURE GENERATIONS ARE STILL , UM , STUMPED .
* gasp *

In the Garden of Eden story , Adam and Eve eat an apple from the tree of knowledge and then they're kicked out of paradise and THE AMAZING ADVENTURE OF NOT LIVING IN A GARDEN BEGINS .
Not in my version , peeps !
In MY version , this isn't an allegory or anything . Instead , it's an ALTERNATE HISTORY where Adam and Eve decide not to eat the apple ! The entire book of Genesis grinds to a halt at the point where Eve says " Dudes , turns out I'm NOT hungry ! "
Then what happens ?
THEN they cordon off the tree of knowledge to prevent any future mistakes , finally burying it in cement Chernobyl - style !
But where'd they get cement ? That's a technology .
They invented it !
They've got nothing else to do there all day , so they invented cement .
So in your story , Adam and Eve hang out in paradise , alone , inventing cement .
YES . It is an amazing tale !
I call it " What If Early Abrahamic Religions Had Not Been Concerned With The Origin of Sin , But Instead Contained A Viable Recipe For Cement " .
WHAT IF , Utahraptor ? ?
If I can't be a bog person , I can be the next best thing !

" . . . It looks like he died being awesome though ! "
So you're in some sort of awesome pose ?
Exactly !

" I was vulnerable to the south pole though . "
" Yeah , I just found that out . "

People who pay for cryonic freezing are super chumps ! All you need to do is go to Antarctica , guys .
You can die there for FREE .
The earth's orbiting around the sun , but our sun is orbiting around the center of the friggin' galaxy !
At a speed of over eight hundred thousand kilometers an hour , no less !
But the galaxy is so big that each orbit takes 250 million years . So every second that passes , we're orbiting to a new part of space hundreds of kilometers away , where NO OTHER LIVING THING ON THE PLANET has ever been !
Well , not exactly . Life here is 4 billion years old , remember , so older forms of life have been here before . 16 times before , actually .
. . . TRUE .
But dinosaurs have only been around for like 160 million years !
Yes !
So , at best , WE'VE only done a little over half an orbit - so we are exploring the universes ! We're going where no dinosaur has gone before !
Sure , I'll give you that . Why make such a big deal about this though ?
Because Utahraptor , it means that today is the first time in history , in ALL OF EXISTENCE , that a dinosaur - me ! - did anything from the exact location in the universe that we're at right now !

I order a drink for the angriest - looking lady in the room !

Who here wants to learn a new language by breakfast ? Any takers ? . . . No ?
What if I told you it was the LANGUAGE OF THE SEA ? ?
Ah yes , seaspeak , otherwise known as the Standard Marine Communication Phrases ! A set of simple English words and phrases , designed to facilitate communication on the open seas between speakers of disparate languages , where otherwise it might be difficult or impossible !
You - - you know it ?
Answer ; yes . Over .
So what's the language like ?
Man , you should be talking to Dromiceiomimus !
But , it's this tiny super - simplified phrase - focused English . And there's only one way to say each thing ! There's no " I dunno dude " , just " No information . " And if you've got a mysterious problem on the open sea , you know how you say that ? " I have problems . "
Adorable !
I KNOW ! I feel like , thanks to " I have problems " , I have unintentionally spoken the language of the sea many a time .
Yarrrr .
COMPRESSED SONG COMICS today's song POKER FACE by LADY GAGA
Lady Gaga analogizes sex to poker ! In the song , I mean !
To hear her tell it , she intends to get her male opponent " hot " , and then she intends to show him " what she's got " . She assures us , the audience , now presumably with one raised eyebrow , that this unnamed protagonist ( adversary ? It is difficult to tell ) is fully unable to read her poker face .
He's unable , he's unable to see past her facade of bluffing !
Fah - fah - fah - facade of bluffing
To proceed : she wants to spend time with him ; she believes they'll present an appearance of aloof disinterest . Russian roulette is different if you remove the gun from the endeavor .
And when it comes to the act of physical love , Lady Gaga becomes bored if it's too tender ! !
In conclusion , Lady Gaga repeats her claim of her facade of bluffing being perfect no less than four times , so it must be true .
Fah - fah - fah - facade of bluffing

House shopping is what you do when you think , " Man , rent is pretty expensive ! Furthermore , I'd like to paint a bum on the wall and not get in trouble . "
So you decide you're in the market for a house !
Now you've done it . Now you're looking to spend HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS on a single object . This is like spending all this money on ? I don't know , a cookie . Only , you can't eat your cookie , and when you're not looking your cookie can BURN DOWN . Oh ! SAY

Seriously , dude ! And normally people who are autotheistic don't really comment on the existence of other religions or gods , just themselves . It's kinda the old " the only consciousness I can be certain of is my own " argument , but , you know , applied to divinity .

In my alternate history story , Apollo 11 reaches the moon on July 19th , 1969 , just as before . Only when they get there . . .
. . . they find the Soviets are already in orbit , waiting for them !
The Soviets have saved time by designing and sending a ROBOT to the moon - and it got there first ! Only , the Americans are able to land their ship faster , so they're still the first ones to set foot on the moon . But the Soviet robot is still there , and its orbit has been adjusted downward , ever downward , so that now it's flying just above the Americans !
But then the Soviets mess up the landing and it crashes into the side of a mountain ?
How'd you know ?
This isn't an alternate history , T - Rex : this is the real - life history of the Luna 15 mission .
. . . Really ?
Yes , really ! Normally you're supposed to research actual history before writing an alternate one !

And they threw a bunch of stuff overboard !
Exactly ! Anything they wouldn't need for the trip back was left on the moon . Cameras ! Scoops ! SPACE BOOTS . And . . .
. . . bags of poop !

THAT WAY , YOU'LL ALWAYS HAVE ACCESS TO FACTS ABOUT GIRAFFES
did you know that ancient Greeks thought giraffes were a mixture of camel and leopard ? Scientists still call giraffes " Giraffa camelopardalis " because everyone's afraid that if we change it , the ancient Greeks will be SO CHEEZED OFF that they'll all come back to life ! ANGRY SKELETON LIFE ! !
I didn't know the factual part of that , no
Giraffes have the lowest sleep needs of any land mammal !
Only about 1 . 9 hours a day !
NICE .
Female giraffes use their hooves to protect their young !

You know what the most common element in the universe is ? Friggin' hydrogen !
But after that , it's totally helium !
And this is why helium balloons are so awesome . Not only are they FUN and FLOATY and COME IN A VARIETY OF COLOURS , but we never have to feel bad about them , because helium is the one resource we'll never run out of !
Uh , T - Rex , that's not exactly true !
Uh , Dromiceiomimus , I'd be really surprised if we somehow used up the second - most common element in the UNIVERSE .
It may be common across the universe , T - Rex , but it's not common here on Earth !
What ?
Helium's so light that once it's in the atmosphere , it actually ends up escaping into space . We get new helium by mining it out of natural gas reserves , but those are decidedly finite !
Man ! ! Kids with helium balloons were the last thing I could enjoy WITHOUT thinking how finite everything is !
You know what's left now ? Rocks ! The only thing I'm sure we'll never run out of is friggin' ROCKS .

I have come up with an excellent way to be happy ! Every time someone says a sentence , I simply add a few words onto it :
" In my opinion , I mean , and I'm probably totally wrong ! "
Oh my goodness , it's been SO GREAT . People with stupid opinions now IMMEDIATELY acknowledge how dumb they are ! Internet fights still have all the swears and name calling , but now they're instantly undermined by my new suffix .
This sounds pretty egocentric , T - Rex ! In my opinion , I mean , and I'm probably totally wrong !
Niiiiice .
But isn't this just reinforcing your own opinions ?
No , man !
People can still disagree with me , but they're now at least saying they don't have any special expertise !

Utahraptor , despite your obvious criticism , I'm still way into my new suffix !

Ancients pondered for years about which came first : the chicken or the egg ? Um , guys !
Clearly the egg came first ! !
There were egg - laying mammals before chickens , so it's really not that mind - bending a conclusion . One example is , I don't know . . . YOUR MOM ? ?
While she does not predate chickens , my mother has laid eggs , yes .
EXACTLY ! Mine too
Okay , so what came first , the chicken or the CHICKEN egg ?
Depends on what a chicken egg is !
If it's an egg laid BY a chicken , then by definition the chicken came first . But if it's an egg that will hatch INTO a chicken , then that can easily be laid by a non - chicken , so eggs win again ! EVOLUTION , BABY .
I guess it's settled then !
I GUESS IT IS .

Aristotle ! Stop wasting your time wondering if chickens or eggs came first !

Aristotle ! I DON'T SPEAK GREEK
FUN FACTS ABOUT . . . ARISTOTLE !
Aristotle is one of the biggest figures in Western philosophy ! Dude basically invented it . Fun !
He also thought the Earth was the literal center of the Universe ! Fun !
But we can't fault him for that , because he also came up with an objective and clearly defined method of accumulating and verifying knowledge whose descendant - the scientific method ! - we're still using today . He also thought that women were a lower form of life , because he found them to be . . . um , physically colder ?
F - Fun !
He also expressed many of the fundamental laws of logic for the very first time !
Fun !
And coming back to women , he argued they weren't fully human , AND he believed that slavery was natural . Fun !
Oh , history . Aren't there ANY figures from 2000 years ago that share all our current modern - day beliefs ?

No worries !

In 1704 , Alexander Selkirk was a sailor who was all , " DUDES , pretty sure this ship is going to sink . " Then later , he was all -
" Pretty sure it's still gonna sink , dudes ! ! "
So at his own request his sailor friends marooned him on a deserted island and sailed away . And it turns out they did sink ! But Alex didn't know that on account of how he was marooned alone for the next FOUR YEARS . He thought he'd be rescued in days , not years !
How'd he survive ?
He ate vegetables and shot feral goats , left behind from earlier voyages !
And when his gunpowder ran out , he hunted with his BARE FRIGGIN' HANDS .
Sounds pretty manly !
Man , he was ultimate manly ! He made clothes out of goat skin , sewing them with a NAIL . When his shoes wore out , he discovered his feet had levelled up so much that he didn't even need 'em anymore . And after he was rescued , he went back out to sea !
What finally killed him ?
He died of yellow fever while at sea . It totally sucks , because if his yellow fever had been as big as a goat instead of microscopic , he would've killed it BY HAND and eaten it .
It sounds gross but I totally think he would've done it ! !
I don't rent my place . Oh no .
I pay my landlord a monthly bribe to ensure the roof over my head doesn't disappear !
And when I'm hungry , you know what I do ? I walk right into a grocery store , steal a cart , fill it up with whatever foods I want , and then I FINANCIALLY COERCE their cashiers to let me leave with the goods ! Other times I barge into a diner , sit myself down , and just TELL whoever comes by what I want cooked for me . And all it costs is a little " hush money " at the end of the meal !

I'm the bad - assingest !

Has my effect on the world been a net positive or a net negative thing ?
Dudes ! I have no idea ! !
How do you measure positive influence ? If I'd invented PEACE it would be easy . But peace was already totally invented when I was born ! Similarly , if I'd invented a machine that only causes pain , then it's easy to see that I'm probably a net drain on the planet .
A device that only causes pain ?
You know , scissors that only work on soft , living flesh or whatever .
Those could be used by doctors !
TRUE . And that's why it's so muddled !

In the 1600s scientists from history were discovering a lot of things about science ! It was an exciting time to be a scientist from history !
But they were also concerned about people stealing their ideas !
So while still working out the particulars , they'd publish the basics of their ideas IN SECRET CODE . Robert Hooke's published his law of elasticity as " ceiiinosssttuv " . And Newton wrote a letter to his chum Leibniz where he was all " 6accdae13eff7i2l9n4o4qrr4s8t12ux " , which uses numbers to represent how often the letters appear , and which , unencoded , is the Latin version of , oh , I don't know , HIS FUNDAMENTAL THEORY OF CALCULUS ? ?
And unbeknownst to him , Leibniz was working on inventing calculus too !
Exactly !
So when Leibniz announced he'd invented calculus , Newton said he'd invented it first ! But if Newton had just told Leibniz about calculus instead of encoding it in the first place , there'd have been no controversy .
It was an exciting time to be a scientist AND an anagramist !
Indeed ! In comparison , being an anagramist today is totally boring , as nobody is encoding fundamental discoveries into word games anymore .
12t10o8e7a6l6n6u5i5s5d5h5y3I3r3fbbwwkcmvg

There's no more " poetesses " or " cartoonistellas " , you guys !
But I'm not sure we should give up on professional suffixes so quickly . Sure , maybe indicating gender is pass ? , but we can still indicate other things !
Like what ?

We think time travel might not be possible - - RIGHT NOW , ANYWAY - - because we don't see any tourists from the future !
But man , what makes us so interesting ?
I propose that it's more reasonable to find events from HISTORY that are objectively interesting , and look for time travellers there !
Only we can't visit these events without being time travellers ourselves .
But we can do the next best thing : look for historical events that WOULD'VE been interesting if only they'd gone slightly differently !
You're looking for examples of historical meddling BY time travellers !
Dude , I'VE ALREADY FOUND ONE .
Jaunuary 30 , 1835 : dude pulls a gun on then - president Jackson and shoots him at point - blank range , but his gun misfires . So dude pulls out his BACKUP gun , and that one misfires TOO . It's incredibly unlikely !
So some future dude went back to a SUCCESSFUL assassination and messed with the guns ?
Precisely ! ! Unfortunately , my theory can only be proven true when this time traveller dude brags about it . So time traveller dudes , please feel free to come back in time and brag to me !
I ask ONLY for futurebux

From now on , when someone calls Dr . Frankenstein's monster " Frankenstein " , I will not correct them !
Attention , world ! YOU WIN !
After years correcting people , I am finally conceding this ground . While it is ENTIRELY FACTUAL that Mary Shelley never gave the monster a name as part of a grand symbol for the poor creature's lack of identity , I guess that was pretty much her bad . She should've called him " Stitchy Fleshface " or " Bubba Unhugga " because it turns out we're ENTIRELY UNWILLING to have reanimated flash walking around without sticking a name on it first .
Well , it is kind of a dickish thing to correct people on !
It's not !
Any REASONABLE person would relish the correction and -
Any REASONABLE person would recognize " Frankenstein " could easily be shorthand for " the Frankenstein creature " , just as " Toyota " stands for the Toyota Motor Corporation .
Oh snap ! Utahraptor , you've not only proven me wrong , but you've proven ALL PAST VERSIONS of me wrong too ! YOU HAVE MADE SOME POWERFUL ENEMIES TODAY !
MOST OF THEM ARE TRAPPED IN THE PAST THOUGH , SO NO WORRIES !
" That " is an amazing word in the English language ! It may be an amazing word in other languages too , but it is DEFINITELY an amazing word in English .
It's one of the few words that you can use as often as you want , and still be grammatical !
FOR EXAMPLE : I could say " That is an [ sic ] rad word " , referring to , perhaps , the word 'syzygy' . But then I could ALSO say " That 'that' is an rad word ! " , referring to the 'that' in my previous sentence ! Then I could go on to say that " That 'That " that " ' is an rad phrase " , and so on , to INFINITY .
And you call that grammatical .
It is . Technically !
Man , you know what I call it ?
" You are a good friend , T - Rex , and I'm really sorry if I'm too critical sometimes " ?

If my friends are not successful , then I've surrounded myself with losers .

T - rex , this is an awfully merchantile way of looking at things . " Success " can take many forms : financial , personal , and so on ! You might be the best in your circle at , say , lacrosse , while - -
- - while someone else might be the best at having really important feelings and then talking about them ; I know . Let's say I measure success as an appropriately weighted average of all possible forms . The issue remains !
I'm not convinced such an average exists !
Suppose it does , though !

T - REX'S MOUTH TASTES LIKE T - REX SPIT
In olden times , printing was accomplished using moveable type , which was really just metal pieces with letters and punctuation on them that you'd arrange to form your words and sentences ! So , setting up a new page was slow and expensive .
You'd have to lay out each character by hand !
BORING !
But folks came up with some ways to speed things up . One was to make a cast of commonly - used words and phrases , so when you needed to say " sexy T - Rex " , you could just grab the piece instead of an " s " , an " e " , an " x " , and so on .
If you had a good set of common phrases , you could really speed things up !
And printers had a name for these pieces of multi - character type , right ?
Yep !
Some called them " cliches " , while others called them " stereotypes " - and that's where our words come from ! The stereotype of the sexy T - Rex is analogous to a piece of metal that reads " sexy T - Rex " in reverse , from printers who saved concepts they encountered often .
Neat !
But I still think you should apologize for your " poop - eating dog " comment though .
NEVER
I've SEEN them do it ! !

Once upon a time there was a brilliant scientist named Mary ! Guys , Mary had her own problems .
She was born with a disease where she only saw in black and white !
Also , she's spent her entire life in single black - and - white room equipped with a black - and - white computer screen . Despite this she's still super successful , and has learnt each and every piece of the physical information there is to learn about the neurophysiology of vision ! She knows EVERYTHING about how colour works , how light interacts with the eye , and so on .
Good work , Mary !

Exactly !
when she first looks up at a beautiful blue sky and actually experiences colour for the first time - does she learn anything new ?

In the 60s the CIA was experimenting with cats . They were making spy cats !
SPY CATS , you guys !
But rather than giving cats adorable little matching suits and attach ? cases , WHICH WOULD HAVE BEEN AWESOME , they instead cut one open , implanted a battery and a microphone , and turned his tail into an antenna .
A primitive cyborg ?
Exactly !
The plan was that the cat could listen in on sensitive conversations completely unnoticed !
Did it work ?
Well , they spent over five years and fifteen million dollars on it , but in the first and only field test Cyborgocat wandered onto the street , got run over by a cab , and was killed instantly .
Ouch .
And then the project was dismantled .
It was a lot of money wasted , HOWEVER the project was named " Operation Acoustic Kitty " , which is ADORABLE . The moral of the story is this : whoever was in charge of naming secret CIA projects in the 60s was doing their job super well !
THE END .

. . . WHO THE HELL WAS I THINKING OF
What day of the week is it ? IT'S NOT IMPORTANT , because all that matters is that today it's time for another . . .
SECRET of the MEDICAL PROFESSION !
Doctors have a difficult job : you come in with symptoms and you expect a diagnosis . And sometimes that's really hard ! Hate to break it to you , Chuckles , but there's always the chance it's all in your head .
There's also the chance your symptoms represent a new and terrible disease unknown to medical science !
And in both these cases a doctor may feel pressured to come up with a reassuring label !
So what do they do ?
They MAKE IT UP !
It's called a wastebasket diagnosis : a disease with symptoms so broad as to be effectively meaningless . But it can do real good ! Having a named disease can lower patient anxiety and even help alleviate symptoms !
Diagnosis as therapy ?
Exactly ! It's like the placebo effect !
. . . in that now that we know about it , IT CAN NEVER HELP US AGAIN

Let's suppose we all have cows ! Ladies and gentlemen : this is totally awesome .
Now we all have cows !
But let's also say we all share a field for them to graze in . The problem is that any field can only support so many cows - - any more and those ladies will gobble the grass faster than it can regrow !
So it's in our shared interest not to overcow the field .
NO OVERCOWING . Yes !
But if I add just ONE extra cow , it's not going to be the end of the world .
Exactly !
But the tragedy is we might ALL rationally conclude " one more cow won't hurt " , which destroys the field ! Worse , we can foresee this situation , and realize our only option left is to get all our cows in the field as quickly as possible , BEFORE it's gone .
That's pretty terrible .
To conclude : this is why I got the heck out of authority - free shared land cow ownership !

Dear audio diary ! Today I learned why we measure lifetimes in years and not in " failed trips to Uranus where only corpses show up at the end " .
It's , um - for the reasons you'd expect , basically .
When you borrow money from someone , they usually charge you interest . I just figured out why !
It's RENT MONEY .
The lender is renting out money , just the same as if they'd rented out a helicopter ! And just like the familiar helicopter rental , I've got to pay money to rent it - usually proportional to the value of the thing borrowed and for how long I've got it .
Also , eventually I've PROBABLY got to return the helicopter .
That's what interest is , T - Rex ! It's rent .
I always thought it was something special !
But the only difference between interest and rent is the interest is paid in the same medium as the thing borrowed , which , in a single word , is KINDACRAZY . It's like renting a helicopter and then paying rent in tiny pieces of helicopter !
You're big into helicopter analogies , huh ?
Utahraptor , how long have we been friends ? !
Your question insults us both

UTAHRAPTOR ! The most salacious of all raptors !

Then prepare for my amazing " Vampire Novel 2000 " !
Ahem . Vampire Novel 2000 ! Vampire Novel 2000 opens up on the first page , where the title of the book is printed . Your eyes caress the words , your lips mouthing them as you read : 'Vampire Novel' . And then , two numbers that are also four , the paradox of repeated digits . 2000 . A number that promise the future . A year , but more than a year : an aesthetic . The future we all remember , now novelized , and also with vampires .

EXCELLENT .
Also mechanics aren't allowed to make mistakes either . And the police . And judges and lawmakers . And corporations . NO MORE MISTAKES , EVERYONE . It's too easy to say " It was a mistake " , and it's way too easy to say " I'm sorry " . From now on we're all going to try something a little bit harder , and we're going to call it " NOT SCREWING UP " .
Mistakes happen , T - Rex ! We don't have absolute control over everything .
Too easy , Utahraptor !
" Mistakes happen " is the effect , and I'm talking about stopping the cause . Just don't allow mistakes to happen in the first place , and OH SNAP , your homespun excusionary aphorisms will no longer apply !
I look forward to seeing you never make a mistake again .

HOW TO PASS FOR A HUMAN BEING
Human beings are complicated , but they're also not really that complicated . It's super easy to pass for one .
. . . which is great , because that's what you'll be doing for the next 13 cycles !
The most important tip is to invest in at least a level 5 exoform : if you're going to pass for any extended period of time , the added comfort is definitely worth it . Be sure to show many human interests , such as in whether or not other humans like you , in images and stories of what other humans are doing or have done , and SOMETIMES , in getting naked and mixing genetic traits through gamete combination .
HOT .
Also , be sure not to blow your cover !
Yes !
You'd risk undoing combined efforts sustained over 14 zetacycles . In an emergency , fake your own death and make it look like you died of something plausible , like " old age , " or " suffocation . "
Yes . On account of how humans respirate !
PRINT THIS COMIC OUT AND PUT IT IN YOUR WALLET ! THAT WAY , WHEN YOU DIE , IT WILL BE TOTALLY AWESOME WHEN THE AUTHORITIES LOOK FOR ID AND FIND THIS COMIC AND * FREAK OUT *

HANDY PHRASES FOR WHEN SOMEONE HAS JUST HAD A BABY
" Oh , how adorable ! "
" To date , that's definitely the best baby I'VE ever seen ! "
" Have you considered naming the baby after me ? It's a great name ! Ha ha , etc . "
" My goodness , he or she has your smile ! "
" Or other identifying trait ! "
" Neaaaaaaaaat ! "
" I envy your fertile loins . "
" They've really demonstrated the value of teamwork . "
" I was never one to believe in love at first sight , but I confess : I love your child . "
" Not romantically , though . "
" No , I will definitely not love your child romantically until it has reached the age of majority and provided explicit consent . "
" Thank you for inviting me to share this moment with you today . "

STUPID DUMB ADVERTISING SLOGAN TECHNIQUES
There are tons of stupid dumb advertising slogan techniques Oh my goodness , they're so terrible . Let's consider a few such as . . .
. . . Style . As in " bakery - style " buns !
This word " style " promises authenticity but delivers the cruelest of approximations . This is the same " style " you'll see in when I offer " enthusiastic - style kisses " , " food - style protein digestibles " , or when you discover your " bakery - style " buns were baked by an AUTOMATION with a CONVEYER - BELT OVEN MOUTH and PRESSURE DIAL eyes .
. . . Which is actually awesome , so um , let's put this one down in the " actually awesome " column .
What about self comparatives ? That's where something is pitched as " 30 % less fat " , but is still fatty !
It's just got less fat than the manufactures own , comparatively fattier product .
That's me punching you in the face , saying " Try my other fist , now with 30 % less fat ! " and then punching you again ! . . . Which is also rad . Huh . I guess I like THIS ad slogan too !
LATER , T - REX IS UPDATING HIS DATING PROFILES :
" I can't stay upset around analogies involving robots OR fight scenes . "
Man !
Colour me dateable ! ! !

Back in the time of History , how sight worked was pretty confusing . Rather than light entering our eyes , folks thought our eyes were sending beams OUT to whatever they were seeing .
Oh snap ! It's the emission theory of vision , bitches !
But if it were true , how come we can't see in the dark ?
Ah , that's because our eye beams need sunlight to work properly . And before you say " How come we can glance quickly at stars and see them even though they're super far away " , THAT'S because our eye beams move infinitely fast , OBVIOUSLY .
The theory also implied that anywhere someone wasn't looking was TOTALLY DARK .
That's kind of awesome !
I know ! I imagine Earth , seen from space , spots lighting up wherever people are looking , darkening briefly as they blink , beams blasting out into the universe whenever someone glances above the horizon .
Totally sweet !
Anyway ! It turns out that emission theory was wrong : our eyes don't shoot out energy beams ; the only things we ever shoot out of our eyes are tears , lymph , and blood .
And even then : ONLY SOMETIMES .

What we think is good is relative ! It changes between individuals , cultures AND over time . Some people think grapes are great , some people hate them with an intensity that scares even the Devil .
I FEAR NAUGHT BUT SAVE FILE CORRUPTION
500 years ago a song wouldn't be good if some dude talked all over the music !
But today some dude talking over the music is exactly what rap is - and not only do people think it's really good , but rappers DELIGHT in it !
. . . Did you see what I did there , Dromiceiomimus ?
Rapper's Delight ?
It's a song
Anyway , " goodness " is an unstable , inconsistent and unreliable measure .
So ?
So , why are we SO CONCERNED if something is good or not ? It's relative ! It's an OPINION . We should judge things by something we can objectively measure : POPULARITY .
Oh god
YES . From now on , I don't care if something is good . I just care if it's popular !
In other news !
Did you know that I have LITERALLY DOZENS of friends on Facebook ?

Who would win in a fight : the Enterprise or the Millennium Falcon ? And NO , the correct answer is not " the audience " .
The correct answer is that this scenario is ludicrous and impossible !
Star Trek and Star Wars are two different universes , literally : physics works differently in each of them ! The Falcon flies like it's in atmosphere , DESPITE THE FACT IT'S CLEARLY IN SPACE . In contrast , Trek ships generally meet each other on a fixed axis , like they're in water !
CLEARLY this is symptomatic of larger differences in basic universal physics .
Put the Millennium Falcon near Federation Headquarters . . .
. . . and it'll win the fight !
Nope ! Its " hyperdrive " will catastrophically fail , exploding due to mismatched physics errors . I guarantee it ! These ships don't work outside of the universe they're designed for .
Wow , you've out - geeked an already super - geeky debate . Nice !
Thanks !
Now that that's out of the way , we can consider the real question , which is who would win in a fight : Data or Han Solo ?
PERSONALLY , I think they'd be pals .
Oh my god !
I know , right ? ?

My game begins , and you are a tiny plumber !
Then you eat a mushroom , and you become a bigger plumber !
Then you eat a flower , and you gain the ability to shoot fire out of your hands !
This sounds a lot like Super Mario Brothers , T - Rex !
No , wait , because here's where it gets different : you've gained the ability to shoot fire out of your hands , but you HAVEN'T gained the ability to avoid suffering serious burns when you shoot out of your hands , so you suffer serious burns . On your hands . Then you press " A " to go to the burn ward .
And if I refuse ?
To press A ? Then your hands are really messed up , dude ! !
MAN . It's gross . The rest of the game is a 3d model of your burned up hands . Most of the game's budget goes toward this one scene . " Never have burned hands been so terribly realistic , " the reviews will say , " . . . so that is certainly something . "
There are times when I'm glad you lack the skill to make games take place , T - Rex .
But there are also times when you see that as the terrible tragedy of our times , right ? Times when you'd wish nothing more than to build my game , so you could control the gross burnt - up fire hands of which I've dared to dream ? ?
Because if so , this friendship could be PAYING OFF

If the Titanic had hit the iceberg head - on , damage would have been limited to the comparatively strong bow of the ship , and only a few compartments would have been flooded . Some would've been hurt and maybe even killed -
- but the ship would not have sunk !
Alternatively , Titanic's rudder was mounted behind her middle propeller , which was on a turbine not designed to work in reverse . When the iceberg was spotted and the first officer ordered both the hard - to - port turn and full reverse , this middle propeller simply stopped , greatly hampering the effectiveness of the rudder . Ordering the turn at speed would likely have saved the ship .
An excellent point , Dromiceiomimus !
The ship could also have been saved with a bomb threat , delaying its maiden voyage !
Yep !
If I'd been there I could've altered orders , I could've modified the ship's route , I could've done one of a hundred thousand things to save the ship and all 1517 aboard her who perished .
. . . Except you weren't there and were born decades after this all took place .
TRUE .

Britannic was Titanic's sister ship ! After Titanic sank , they upgraded her to make her MORE SINKPROOF . But before she could begin transatlantic service , the Great War broke out and she was converted into a GIANT FLOATING HOSPITAL .
And it was as a hospital ship that she struck a mine and sank !
That's true , T - Rex , but she sank for very different reasons than the Titanic . Despite the huge hole in her side , she could've remained afloat and motionless , if it weren't for the fact that nurses had opened portholes on the lower decks to get a breeze ! Water flooded in as soon as the ship listed . As much as the Titanic is a symbol for hubris , the Britannic is a symbol of how SHIT GOES FOUL sometimes no matter how well you plan .
INTERESTING .
The ship sank only a few miles from shore , didn't she ?
Yep !
The captain actually gave the order to gun the engines and beach the ship on the shore , but some lifeboats were launched against orders , two of which ended up DRIFTING INTO THE PROPELLERS , with pretty much the results you'd expect .
Holy smokes .
Yeah .
THE MORAL OF THE STORY :
Shit certainly DOES go foul sometimes , you guys

Remember how the Titanic sank , and one of the issues with that was not enough lifeboats ? After that disaster they tried to prevent THAT from ever happening again !
So they made a law that ships had to carry a full set of lifeboats !
Except this wasn't a great solution on some ships : the SS Eastland in particular was already a pretty top - heavy ship , and the new lifeboats kinda made the problem critical . And on the 24th of July 1915 , when the Eastland was docked and taking on passangers - all Western Electric employees on their way to a company picnic - she rolled over and sank !
What happened ?
A canoe race passed by the ship !
People crowded to one side to see it , and that was it . The boat rolled and sank in 20 feet of water , 20 feet from the wharf . The new lifeboats had made her impossibly top - heavy , unstable , AND unseaworthy !
Wow . That's textbook irony , huh ?
Yep ! The moral of the story is , " sometimes no matter how much we prepare , boats will sink and that is terrible . "

The word " cybernetic " isn't JUST about abominable marriages of flesh and machine with glowing red eyes that hate all organic life , or as THEY call them , " organos " .
At its core , it refers to a control system that adjusts itself to feedback !
Let's say I want my room to be at a comfortable , yet classy , 22 degrees celsius . If I design a system that repeatedly checks the temperature of the room and either turns on a heater or an air conditioner as needed , then OH SNAP . I'VE JUST BUILT A CYBERNETIC SYSTEM .
That sounds like the heating system of any modern building .
Exactly ! We're surrounded by cybernetic systems ! !
WE WORK INSIDE THEM .
We live inside them !
So awesome !
And if we view an air - conditioned room not as an empty space but as one half of a cyborg , then when I enter it , MY BODY is the other half . We join , marrying machine and flesh , working together to ensure my optimal comfort !
And when you leave , you disconnect from the machinery and become a regular dude !
YES . I'm basically amazing , Utahraptor . I'm a cyborg at the mall , at the office , AND IN THE COMFORTABLE , YET CLASSY , 22 DEGREES CELSIUS BEDROOM .
Bottom line !
I should be getting WAY MORE DATES .

But check it out , Dromiceiomimus : we hear sound mechanically ( sound waves hitting a membrane ) which , IT TURNS OUT , only takes a couple of milliseconds to be understood by the brain ! But our retinas react to light through a longer chemical process AND their information is more complicated to process , so it can take upwards of 50 milliseconds before the brain has it in a usable form .
Neat !
Super neat !

EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT RELATIONSHIPS
Relationships are when you put two people in a jar , and then , you shake the jar !
And relationships are complicated and stuff , but DON'T WORRY : you know how many folks there are on the planet ? Almost SEVEN BILLION FOLKS . That's so many folks ; if you screw up with one of 'em , you can always start fresh with someone new ! I'll say it again because it's totally worth repeating : there are SO MANY FOLKS .
Burn your bridges ?
No , man !
Just say " Look , I think it's pretty clear SOMEONE messed up this relationship . But listen , whatever , there's literally BILLIONS of other people to talk to , so NO BIGGIE . "
I'm not sure this is good advice .

FUN EXPERIMENTS TO DO AT HOME
Attention , youths of today ! Did you know that there are several fun experiments you can do at home ?
For example , add vinegar to baking soda !
The resulting mixture will make a lot of bubbles and it's pretty cool . I'm serious : it's pretty cool ! You can add food colouring to make it look like cartoon lava too . Tight !
. . . Normally at this point you'd talk about the science behind the experiment , T - Rex .
Hah !
PLEASE .
Another fun experiment is to wrap copper wire around an iron nail !
And then attach the wire to a battery ?
Yep ! Do that and now your nail can pick up tiny metal paperclips , as if by MAGIC . Heck , it may actually BE magic , for all you know ! Is it magic ? Let's all decide that it is .
T - Rex , you're my friend , but you're -
you're ruining science

AND AFTER , LAWSUITS
Okay , I hate to be the one to say it , but I must be pretty great because I just had ANOTHER brilliant idea about time travel ! Suppose it's possible to send a message BACK IN TIME .
And suppose causality still holds , so that events in the past determine the future !
So when I send a message to Past T - Rex , he'll act on it - and that'll change the universe that I , Present T - Rex , live in ! So presumably now I'd send a different message back in time , which will again change how past T - Rex acts . We've got an unstable loop of constantly changing timelines , but it SHOULD proceed towards an equilibrium !
And the simplest equilibrium is that no message is sent at all ?
Exactly !
I send a message that makes Past Me decide not to send a message back in time . When he reaches the present , no message is sent , and the universe reverts to how it was originally ! Time travel might ERASE ITSELF every time it happens !
Wow ! That's amazing ! Too bad Larry Niven came up with it already .
Larry Niven already invented T - Rex's Law ? That's crazy !
. . . Why do you think he named it after me ?
What day is it ? Friday ? It must be Friday because it's time for more . . .
SECRETS OF THE MEDICAL PROFESSION
So what you do is tap someone on the head between the eyes and above the nose ! They'll reflexively blink each time you tap them until they get wise to you game , at which point they'll suppress the reflex and the blinking will stop . But until then , THEIR EYELIDS ARE AT YOUR MERCY . YOU CONTROL SOMEONE ELSE'S EYELIDS WITH YOUR MEREST WHIM .
Neat , I guess !
Pretty neat I guess , yeah !
So your secret is tap someone on the head and they'll blink ? You must be fun at parties .
That's only part of it !
The other part is if they CONTINUE to blink after the first few taps , then that's one of the early symptoms of Parkinson's disease .
Holy crap !
But it's not NECESSARILY Parkinson's . It could also be dementia ! Or any number of progressive neurological illnesses , really .

Do you guys know about T - Rex's Three Laws of Parties ? I hope you do , because oh snap ! This dude just went eponymous !
T - REX'S THREE LAWS OF PARTIES
Law one : a sweet party may not injure sexy times or , through inaction , allow sexy times to come to harm . LAW TWO : a sweet party must allow admittance to any sentient being who is totally sweet , except where admittance would conflict the First Law . Law three ! A sweet party must protect its own existence as long as such protection does not conflict with the other laws .
Aren't these just superficially altered Asimovian laws of robotics ?
How is that a bad thing ? Hello ? ! The laws worked for friggin' ROBOTS .
In fiction !

There's a species of side - blotched lizards where the males have coloured throats , and they're either orange , blue , or yellow ! The orange ones are biggest , the blue ones ar medium sized , and the yellow ones are tiniest .
I PROMISE THIS STORY TOTALLY GETS BETTER
Okay , so what's awesome is that the big orange lizards are toughest : they beat up the blue lizards and steal their girlfriend ! But the blue lizards can defend against the smaller yellow ones , AND they form stronger relationships . Meanwhile , the yellow ones are so small that they can sneak in and sex up the orange lizard's girlfriend while he's out fighting ! AS WE ALL KNOW , once light reaches our eyes , it can take upwards of 50 milliseconds before the chemical process of vision has completed and the information is in a usable form in our brain . 50 milliseconds , you guys ! That's like . . .
FOREVER

I know , it sucks !

You're talking career - wise ?
Everything - wise ! I could be a great politician , but if I'd been a doctor maybe I'd've been even better !
We can't know what might've been , T - Rex . It's impossible !
Sure !
But we CAN make an educated guess , and with so many choices that could've gone differently , the odds that anyone's doing the one thing they'd be best at are vanishingly small .
I suppose we can only do what makes us happy .
Happiness doesn't equal greatness , but sure , whatever !

The best words MIGHT be autological words , you guys !
These are words that describe something that also describes the word itself !
For example , the word " short " is itself short , and the word " multisyllabic " has more than one syllable in it . Soooo crazy !
And the world " understandable " is itself understandable , so it's self - describing and therefore autological too !
Just like " 2oig3nt2as2y " which is a word I just made up that means " annoying to say " !
There's the opposite too : heterological words that DON'T describe themselves , like " long " !
Neat !
So is " heterological " heterological ?
Well if it IS , then it's self - describing , which means autological . And if it ISN'T , then it's autological again too . Huh . If this paradox is supposed to make me trip balls , you should know I've taken the precaution of having them TIGHTLY SECURED .

LITERARY TECHNIQUE COMICS
today's technique : CLIFFHANGERS
Cliffhangers are when you leave things unresolved , so the audience stays . . .
. . .
. . . around ! It's so the audience stays around .
Usually there's some threat that makes things SEEMINGLY IMPOSSIBLE , or a startling revelation that appears at the last second .
As way of an example , I've rigged that house with a nuclear bomb that will explode when it's stomped on , and also , I'm your sister ! !
. . .
FRIG THAT
TO BE CONTINUED

" Don't change horses in mid - stream " ? Ladies and gentlemen : it's the future . We've sent ROBOT SPACESHIPS to MARS . I hate to be the one to say this , but -
Why are we still talking about horses ?
Let's fix our adages ! Let's update our language ! Let's replace " Don't change horses in mid - stream " with " Horses : who's riding them ? Nobody ? ? "
You'll have a lot of updating to do , T - Rex ! Dead horses get beaten while gift horses get looked in the mouth , which , INCIDENTALLY , is also where reliable information comes straight from !
Yeah ! Maybe you should get off your high horse before you put the cart before that same horse !
That's only like TWO examples .
" Champing at the bit " ? HORSES . " Betting on the wrong horse " ? HORSES . " Driving across town to pony up some money to a woman in ponytails " ? T - REX , 3 HORSES TEAMED UP IN THAT SENTENCE .
And I guess we DO measure the output of machines in terms of how many imaginary horses it'd take to beat them .
So what other animals are we big into ? Geese ? From " wild goose chase " ?
That's actually a METAPHORICAL goose , referring to a horse . I'm not even joking . The more you look at English , the more you realize :
It's -
It's horses all the way down .
It turns out horses aren't the only inspiration English uses for its idioms . We also use . . . doors ?
OPPORTUNITY knocks on doors , you guys !
And when Opportunity closes a door , it also opens another . Sometimes , SOMETIMES , it opens a window .
These could be classified equally well as " idioms involving abstract concepts somehow granted agency " .
Ooh ! Like when Fortune favours the bold ! Or when an ounce of Prevention is better than a pound of Cure !
. . . Gross .
Yeah , that's - that turned out gross .
Anyway ! I think all we can conclude is that folks talk about the things around them , and horses were around us for a really long time . and THAT suggests that millions of years from now , there'll be lots of aphorisms about transporters , spacebots , and cyberdroids !

THE WORLD OF TOMORROW
We detect evidence of alien life tomorrow : a signal from a distant solar system . It starts out simple : numbers , counting , that sort of thing !
And then it starts to get more advanced , encoding mathematics !
And then : instructions for decoding images that are about to be transmitted . In a few months we go from hoping we're not alone to knowing that intelligent life is out there , and they're about to show us what they look like !
And what do they look like ?
WHO KNOWS ?
We're at the very frontier of imagination here , Dromiceiomimus ! !
Maybe they look like . . . puppies ?
Utahraptor , please ! NO WAY aliens look like puppies !
For generations we've wondered if we're alone in the universe ; today we know the answer : no . We're not alone . Life is out there , and it's puppies . Our universe is teeming with puppies .
. . .
Fine , I accept this version of events
THE END
