Polysyndeton is when you use a lot of conjunctions and you chain phrases together and you go and you go and you don't stop until you have used polysyndeton !
LITERARY TECHNIQUE COMICS
today's technique
POLYSYNDETON
You can use it for rhythm or you can use it for cadence or you can use it in case commas are expensive but there is a big ol' sale on conjunctions ! It can also make your writing appear childlike and if that is the sort of thing you're into then this is a good way of doing that .
There's really not much to it , huh ?
It's pretty straightforward !
BASICALLY , any place you'd use a comma , write " and " and / or " but " and / or " anyway whatever " instead . For example , " It was the best of times but anyway whatever it was the worst of times . " Isn't that better ?
Um
ISN'T THAT BETTER ? ?

Polysyndeton is when you use a lot of conjunctions and you chain phrases together and you go and you go and you don't stop until you have used polysyndeton !

BLACKJACK AS SHE IS PLAYED

He gives each adult some cards with numbers on them - as many as they want - and so that nobody gets any confusion in their li'l heads , the numbers are printed both rightside up and upside down on each card . The stupid adults then add up their numbers !
Then what happens ?
Then they're all the next contestants on . . . The Price Is Right !
The home edition , anyway .
Explain !
They each use their cards to guess a secret number : the closest without going over winds a prize ! But that was too confusing for them , so now the secret number's always 21 . They guess a number WHOSE VALUE IS PUBLIC KNOWLEDGE , and yet they still mostly lose .
Sounds depressing !

What IS a computer ?
Scientists have studied them for years to come up with an answer to this question . These highly specialized scientists , known as " computer scientists " , have given up on studying their own fleshy bodies to instead study the hard transistors , the finely sculpted semiconductors , and the gleaming metal bodies of our strange electronic offspring .
This sounds kinda sexy ?
Damn dude , you know it is !
Computers may have quad - core processors instead of quadriceps , but to the computer scientist these " quads " are just as alluring as the muscles of any flesh Adonis !
So what IS a computer ?
PURE FREEBASED SEX .
Maybe the best way to understand a computer is to describe them as a person ! Yes : MY COMPUTER IS A PERSON .
A person who only ever does what you tell her to !
But she only does THAT if you have perfect grammar and syntax when you talk to her . Also , she only understands a few limited languages , and getting her to do anything non - trivial can take WEEKS . In fact , whole companies of specialized teams will work for years on trying to get her to do specific tasks ! Sounds pretty frustrating , right ?
WHAT IF I TOLD YOU SHE EATS ELECTRICITY AND CAN REPLACE HER BODY PARTS AS THEY FAIL ? ?
Whoah , she sounds kinda awesome !
I know , right ?
The only downside is she's got a growing army of friends who are all " inter - networked " together in an " inter - net " , so if one finds out a secret the rest NEVER FORGET . Also , her friends spy on you .
Huh .
Also , when she gets sick she trashes your shit and only wants to show you porn .

I LIKE THE MARIO SERIES IN PARTICULAR
The propinquity effect refers our tendency to from romantic attachments with people we encounter and interact with often .
If I see someone all the time , it's more likely they'll become my sweetie !
Which , you know , seems kind of obvious when you consider the opposite : if I interact with someone not at all , it's PRETTY unlikely that we'll be sharing INTIMATE SNUGGLES . But knowing about the propinquity effect , I can alter my life appropriately ! Now I know that when I want to enter into a romantic relationship with someone , I should just totally integrate myself into their day - to - day lives !
No , no , T - Rex , no !
This is a great plan ! What ?
If you wanna date someone , ask them out , don't do this stalkery , passive aggressive " hey , notice I'm around all the time now ? " thing . That's creepy ! That crap only ever works in romantic comedies , and our BEST SCIENTISTS don't even know why it works there .

A TERRIFYING ZOMBIE STORY , by me , T - Rex .
One day an alive woman died . OR DID SHE ? Because now she's . . . A ZOMBIE ! !
Can I get a what what ?
Our zombie woman is Patient Zero of the zombie outbreak , which suggests to the attentive reader that we're using an infection model of zombification . Let R0 be the threshold quantity of infections . If R0 is less than one , then the infection will die out . If it's equal to one , then the disease will remain endemic in the population . And the more above one R0 is , the greater the epidemic !
So to quantify our zombie terror , all we need to do is calculate R0 !
Can I hear about the people she bites ?
Assuming N population and a contact rate of B , then our zombie will make BN bites per time unit , resulting in infections with a mean infectious period of 1 / Y : Y being of course the mean recovery rate . Therefore , R0 = ( BN ) / Y !
Does she bite anyone she knew from before ? Like , her kids maybe ?
These metrics are simplified , as natural immunity is not factored into N . Different compartmental epidemic models may provide different results !
Is there any of the old her left inside that shambling horror ? ?
I -
I wonder sometimes
A WEREWOLF TALE OF TERROR , by me , T - Rex .
One day Marty McFly got bit by a werewolf ! Marty McFly is having a difficult day .
Now he's a werewolf too !
" Great Scott ! " said Marty McFly , echoing his friend and mentor , Dr . Emmett Lathrop " Doc " Brown , Ph . D . " I'll miss the Battle of the Bands if I'm out being a werewolf attacking people ! Phantom islands are not islands populated exclusively by ghosts !
UNFORTUNATELY .
Rather , they're islands that we thought existed , but then when we checked 'em out again they weren't there . Were they pulled beneath the waves by Poseidon's watery hand ? Were they perhaps . . . STOLEN ? DID SOMEONE HEIST AN ENTIRE ISLAND ? ?
No , in the vast majority of cases they were never there to begin with .
Reality : boring sometimes !
So why did we think they were there in the first place ?
Lots of reasons !
Well , no , one reason really : early on a ship reported seeing land there and we put it on maps , but in that time period we didn't know about optical illusions or how sailors lie sometimes . That's all !

" Our hypothesis states we're better at using wooden sticks to direct the motion of a vulcanized rubber puck across a surface with a friction coefficient of 0 . 15 ! " some scientists claim , and then the other scientists reply " NUH UH ! ! "
Since they're scientists , they decide to run a series of controlled experiments to see which " team " is the best . And to ensure they're held to the highest standards of accuracy , professional independent observers are employed ( called " referees " as they may be used as references in the resulting paper ) AND the experiments are performed in front of a stadium chock - full of amateur observers too !
Science is really popular so this makes sense .
Suppose I'd like to observe such an experiment but cannot afford a ticket ?
Not a problem !
Demand is high , so scientists have taken the extraordinary step of broadcasting their process live on TV . You can go to bars and watch the experiment unfold with other fans who are rooting for the same hypothesis you are , cheering as the results come in !
Delightful !
The downside is it's hard to control external variables , so the experiments repeat quite often . But that's good for us , because it just means more science !

THE GOOSE THAT LAID THE GOLDEN EGG : A FAIRY TALE
Once upon a time there was a goose that laid golden eggs ! The farmer who owned the goose was getting super rich , but she also had some questions !
Questions like " what energy is required by the goose in order to facilitate this apparent transmutation ?
She began a regime of careful observations ! After a few weeks she had a few data points . ONE : the goose was not eating any gold . so it must be produced internally . TWO : Gold produced / ( food consumed + body mass lost ) = 5 % = a transmutation efficiency equation . And THREE : other geese feeding in the same area would not produce golden eggs . So she concluded , quite rightly , that the phenomenon was related to the goose itself !
And she couldn't breed it , because all its eggs were solid gold .
Exactly .
The only way left to learn more was dissection ! So for science , she gave up a source of great personal riches . UNFORTUNATELY , she lived i a world with primitive scientific instruments , and without microscopes and cellular analysis she was unable to discover the production mechanism .
Nevertheless , her selfless actions stopped the gold market from collapse , saving her country from an economic catastrophe and decades - long recession . She is remembered today as a great woman and an early proponent of the scientific method .
THE END

When you become a vampire you become undead . Even though your body has died and your heart no longer pumps and lungs no longer breathe , you live still . Your brain is fine . Your intelligence is unaffected . You have not suffered a death og self .
Pretty sweet deal , babes !
But what if that delicate process that turns you from from mortal to vampire . . . failed ? What if something in this turning went wrong , even briefly ? We can suffocate to death in minutes , suffer brain damage in seconds . Suppose , during that transformation from a being who needs an active circulatory and respiratory system to survive to one who doesn't , there was a problem . Suppose your brain - everything that makes you YOU - died .
Why , you'd be left with an undead body but a dead brain !
SOUND LIKE ANYONE YOU KNOW ? ?

One of the main advantages of brain transplants ( or body transplants , depending on how you look at it ! ) is you get a fun new bod that's not like your old one . But one of the main issues is scar tissue !
Scarred nerve tissue doesn't transmit signals well !
So even if you get a brain transplant without dying , you'd end up being left in a body you couldn't move . This , my friends , is SUBOPTIMAL . Also , the brain is a super sensitive organ and gets damaged really quickly if it doesn't get oxygen . Therefore , brain transplants : super hard . We've never pulled one off here in the mortal world . But what if you had a brain that didn't NEED oxygen ? What if you had a body that didn't FORM scar tissue ?
Vampires ?
VAMPIRES .
It's EASY to do a vampire / vampire brain transplant ! And since their bodies won't reject any foreign materials , you can just wire up nerves manually with like , tungsten . It'll take time but who cares ? It's not like your patients can DIE .
This - this COULD be what vampires actually do !

In Super Mario Brothers , a mushroom turns you from Mario into Super Mario ! You double in size . Dudes and ladies : how is this EVEN POSSIBLE ? ?
Whoops ! Turns out , it's not !
What's actually happening is that Mario and Super Mario are SWITCHING PLACES . That mushroom isn't food , it's arcane magick - ancient , unknowable - that swaps whoever touches it with a larger , more powerful magical duplicate . It was originally developed by mages for use in warfare !
So where does Mario go ?
The name of this place has not reached our time .
But it is a land of desolation !
Filled with . . . ice cream and kittens ?
No ! FILLED WITH THE LOST SOULS OF THOSE WHO SWAPPED OUT AND NEVER SWAPPED BACK . Once Super Mario is there , he wants to stay . He gathers firepower , different suits : all to prevent him from swapping again . But if he fails , Mario returns : a Mario who now understands life is a gift , not to be traded away , but to be lived to the fullest .
THAT'S the true theme of Super Mario Brothers . Um - at least until Marioo dies and he has lots of extra lives and can do it all over again , so really if you don't live life to its fullest just try harder next time . Building theme in interactinve media can be a challenge , okay ?

The date is September 3rd , one universe over . Composer Marshall Island has just finished a song that will one day be known as " The Ultimate Song 2000 " .
This name is super dated though so eventually it's shortened to " The Ultimate Song " !
The Ultimate Song is , objectively , the best song . We all thought it was impossible - that music was too varied , tastes too wide - for one song to be universally the best , but whether by chance or by design , it now exists . All other songs suffer in comparison . There is a brief artistic movement obsessed with flaws , imperfections , but that only gets us so far . We keep coming back to the song : it's perfect . Why would we listen to anything else ?
Don't songs eventually get old ?
Imperfect songs do , yeah ! Perfect ones , not so much .
Everyone tries to learn from the perfect song , reverse - engineer it : Can we use it to produce the perfect painting ? Poem ? The perfect justice system ? But we fail . It seems Earth is to touch perfection but once , and this is it : one single song .
Wow . I mean what do songs DO ?
That's what consumes us . We encode the song into the golden records of the Voyager Spacecraft , racing them towards distant stars . It's not because we want to share : it's a planet's last . desperate cry for help .
It's a death spasm that infects the galaxy .

One day Jim Rifle wanted to shoot some game birds , so he invented the rifle , and decided to name his new rifle the " rifle " !
It was a busy day for Jim Rifle !
Unfortunately for him , whenever a bird got shot by his rifle , the ghost of that bird came back to haunt him . Soon he was bothered by hundreds of birdghosts who all wanted revenge , which was understandable , since he shot 'em .
Jim Rifle is having a complicated time !
He sure is !
So to fix his problem , he invented a new rifle that shot ghosts !
That was easy !
Sure , but it turns out that getting ghost - shot just pushed the birds into level 2 ghosthood , upping their interest in revenge geometrically . Also , they developed arms and a crude form of speech .
Horrifying .
That's why Jim shot the level 2 ghosts some more !

Robyn bought a camera from an eerie second - hand store . The storekeeper wore strange , old - fashioned clothes and spoke in an unfamiliar accent . When Robyn returned the next day , the store was AN EMPTY LOT , ABANDONED FOR YEARS !
That's right : IT'S A GHOST STORY , BABIES ! !
Robyn soon discovered that anyone she took a picture of showed up as a corpse , their mouths hanging open with like , worms and junk coming out of them . Scary worms . Self - portraits , friends , pets , animals : they all showed up as dead bodies , in the same positions they were photographed in but totally dead . And really well realized , too ! You honestly couldn't tell they'd been altered . Super pro - level photo manipulation was going on here .
Robyn in messing with forces she can't begin to understand !
Pfft , not really . She gets it .
She opened a business specializing in fun Hallowe'en portraits and cranked 'em out super quick ! The camera seemed to get angry , but that anger just made better corpse photos so Robyn was like - thanks ? Thanks , camera , your ghostly rage is super profitable so keep it up ? ?
Later , Robyn found a tape where if you watched it then you'd die within the next seven days , and she used it to kill the mold in her basement .

I KINDA LOVE HER ? ?
Robyn's great - uncle Chris died and she inherited his mansion , on one condition : she had to spend a single night in his spooky haunted house ! " OH MAN , SO SWEET ! " Robyn siad , after she was done being sad re : death .
As she entered the house that night , the door slammed behind her !
She turned and found the ghost of her great - uncle . " Hello Robyn , " he said . " It's me , Uncle Chris . We never hung out much in life so I was hoping we could catch up , " he said , " as I am now a ghost and am looking to fill tons of free time . "
Robyn threw herself into an ancient dusty chair and slouched . " I was brought here under false pretenses , " she sighed .
I mean , technically , the house IS haunted by her uncle .
" Okay , OBVIOUSLY , " said Robyn .
Uncle Chris then spoke to Robyn at length about how he doesn't like her friends and how her clothes are too immodest and how the video games she plays on her phone are turning her into a crazy killer like in the newspapers . " OH MY GOD , " Robyn said , " IT'S LIKE - - I DON'T - - YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW HOW SHITTY THE GAMES I PLAY ON MY PHONE ARE " .
Ghost Uncle Chris go really mad and threw some plates around and Robyn shouted " YOU'RE BEING REAL IMMATURE ! " and went to bed . Her uncle apologized the next morning , but it was one of those bullshit " sorry you got upset " apologies .

UTAHRAPTOR STARTED IT
Robyn bought a camera from an eerie second - hand store . When Robyn returned the next day , the star was AN EMPTY LOT , ABANDONED FOR YEARS ! ! That's right : IT'S A GHOST STORY , BABIES !
AND IT ACTUALLY STARTS A LOT LIKE MY OTHER GHOST STORY STARRING ROBYN , BABIES ! !
But THIS time , Robyn sat around the empty lot and waited for the ghostly store to return . When it finally did , she went inside : like she remembered , everything seemed real , if a little old - fashioned . She could touch things , hold things . She could walk upstairs , even though it was all a ghostly illusion . She talked to the storekeeper and half an hour later had bought the place out !
I thought ghosts only lingered because they had unfinished business ?
Yeah , this dude had one !
But once he flipped it that business was finished , so he could bounce . So now Robyn had a ghost building that could manifest and disappear at will , and once she figured out how to coerce it into appearing into different forms , you know what she had ? A HOLODECK . She had a friggin' holodeck , Utahraptor . God damn .
Later on I wanted to be her so bad all the time , THE END .
ASK PROFESSOR SCIENCE
Our first letter comes from Utahraptor ! It reads " Hi Professor ! What's the name of the force holding us to the Earth ? "
Seriously Utahraptor ? SERIOUSLY ?
It's gravity . Gravity is the name of the force holding us to the Earth . Utahraptor , I thought you were , like , a smart dude . I thought you were a dude who knew things , and among the things you knew were " what gravity is " , " how big a cow is and how tasty too " , and " what is the way yo drink a glass of water but not drown this time " .
That letter was sent to the Professor in confidence !
I OPENED HIS MAIL ; I ALWAYS DO THAT
Anyway , I volunteered at a daycare and we helped the kids write letters . If you look closely you'll see the letter is not from me but from Utahraptor and His Rad Fried Timmy .
How rad is Timmy ?
Pretty rad .
Hm . And was it you or Timmy who made all the " o " s in " Professor Science " into skulls , the " e " s into snakes , and the " i " with a heart with angry eyebrows ?
That was all Timmy .
Dude .
YOU HAVE TO INTRODUCE ME .
It's TOTALLY LEGAL for you to pay me fat stacks in exchange for a legal service I provide ! For example , you might coerce me into mopping the floors of your supergross nasty restaurant bathroom / hole by promising me money .
I believe this is called " having a job " !
Ans similarly , if I find out an embarrassing but non - criminal secret about you through legal means - like maybe you're a celebrity having an affair ? ? - it's again TOTALLY LEGAL for me ( to ) tell , or not tell , anyone this secret .
True .
AND YET , if I seek your fat stacks in exchange for the service of not sharing this secret , I've committed a crime !
Yeah , that's blackmail !
Correction : that's the paradox of blackmail !
Unlike all the other Major Crimes , blackmail is made up legal acts , and it's only the COMBINATION of these legal acts that's illegal ! All I'm doing is offering you a lawful service at a price , which you can accept or refuse without correction . The exact same thing happens when a kid offers to mow your lawn , dude !
Only when the kid does it it's " not a crime " and he " shouldn't go to jail , mister " .
PFFT .
PFFT , I SAY , WITH ALARMING REGULARITY .
I said that blackmail is unique among the Major Crimes because it's two legal acts that add up to be illegal ! But it's not QUITE unique . I'm speaking , of course , of prostitution !
Don't tell my mom that I'm speaking , of course , of prostitution !
It's legal to have sex and it's legal to pay for services , but in a lot of places it's illegal to pay for sex . HOWEVER , if you pay two other people to have sex , and then you film it , then tada ! You are making a pornographic sex movie , and that's legal .
Yep !
But that's nuts ! What we have here is a crime that becomes legal IF AND ONLY IF YOU FILM THE CRIME .
Well , if you film the crime and structure the crime's financials appropriately .
TRUE .
But that's even crazier ! I can't think of another crime that becomes legal if you have a corporate structure around it , if you've built a viable business around the production and distribution of that crime .
Except big banking , am I right ?
You are right !
Hah hah hah !
Seriously though , they've profited from destroying so many lives with little to no consequences .
Friiiiiiig

"
Like a primitive holodeck !
EXACTLY .

Hello and welcome to Spider - Fan , the # 1 talk show for fans of Spider - Man .
As we all know , Spider - Man is a fake man who does not exist !
But we , as a people , write stories about him anyway . We want so badly to hear stories about this fake guy that we pay people to make up tales about him ( this is called " lying " ) , and then draw pictures of their lies so we can see them easily .
This is called " comics " .
Question : is it true that Spider - Man can do whatever a spider can ?
Nope ! Next question .
Question : what things can a spider do that Spider - Man can't ?
Have a passive breathing system that supports respiration without actively moving air around .

Let's say you die for whatever dumb reason ! There's a chance you become a SPOOKY GHOST !
OR IS THERE ? ?
Here's what ghosts do : throw plates around , rattle chains , point out where their body is buried , and appear in blurry photographs . Here's what ghosts DON'T DO : sit down with friends and catch up on all they missed , call up the media and explain about the afterlife , or run experiments to determine the limits and possibilities of their new existence .
Not all ghosts are scientists !
Yeah ! Surely SOME of them are ! !
Maybe they don't do this because - stay with me - ghosts don't exist ?
POSSIBLE BUT BORING .
POSSIBLE BUT INTERESTING : ghosts of PEOPLE don't exist , but ghosts of THINGS do . The ghost rattling chains is actually the CHAINS back from the dead , saying hi the only way they know how ! The ghost in the blurry photo is actually the ghost of some crappy photograph the person was in , in real life !
My friends , ghosts of our loved ones are ILLUSIONS , created by things to get our attention ! The afterlife isn't for us , Utahraptor . It's for our STUFF .

Will they or won't they ? This is a question asked in many love stories . People get really invested in whether they will or won't . ( HAVE SEX , THAT IS . )
( OMG . )
So here's the answer , babies : sometimes they will , sometimes they won't . Don't worry : most of the time they will though . We live in a world where most art is commercial and people boinking after a long period of not boinking but really wanting to boink is GREAT for business . Peeps wanna see peeps boink !
ESPECIALLY if those peeps have shared long and smouldering " hey whoah guess what I think I wanna boink you " glances in the past .
Oh man I love those glances ! Those glances are so great !
I know , right ?
They're in my top five glances , after the smouldering " hey whoah guess what I think I wanna slide any leftover food on my plate across the table to you " glance , and the smouldering " hey whoah guess what I think I wanna waive the maximum age restriction on this bouncy castle for you " gaze .

Man ! I was SO SAD for SO LONG !
Did he or didn't he ? This is a question asked in many murder mystery stories , ESPECIALLY those involving a male suspect . People really want to know if he did or didn't ( DO THE MURDER ACT , THAT IS . )
( GROSS . )
So here's the answer , babies : sometimes he did , sometimes he didn't . Don't worry : if he didn't , someone else totally did . Very few murder mysteries end with the detective saying " I cannot find any evidence to incriminate the suspect , let alone name one with any reasonable certainty . "
" This truly was the perfect crime . "
" Maybe I should quit detection and become a criminal . "
" After all , I have now learned from the best . "

"

Chris and Nat : two teens always competing in school for the highest grades ! Then , one day , as Chris was blowing out his candles on his birthday cake , he wished that , from now on , he would always know more than Nat .
And because it's what makes this story interesting , his wish totally came true ! !
But he didn't get smarter than Nat : instead , Chris's brain was filled with everything Nat knew , PLUS Chris's existing memories . Chris could now remember two childhoods , two histories , two sets of feelings for their mutual friends , could revisit conversations from both sides . And whenever something new hapened to Nat , Chris got it too .
From now on , Chris would always know more than Nat .
They're joined as two souls never have before !
No minds had ever been so close !
Nat was upset when told what was going on , but they reconciled quickly since Chris felt Nat's hurt just as deeply as Nat did . " Love " didn't describe their relationship . It was more like - shared personhood . A new state of being .
. . . Wow . That's really intense .
Later , they having some mind - blowing sex AND / OR grow up into cool spies where Nat sneaks in to read documents while Chris transcribes them in safety !
Like most authors , at the start of a new story I haven't quite decided if I'm writing erotica yet , you know ?
If I sleep the wrong way I can get an intense pain in my neck that follows me around for days . Days !
What the heck kinda shabby bodies are we inhabiting here ? !
It seems to be there are some DESIGN FLAWS , so , with respect , I am proposing we address this issue head - on and fix them . First up : spines . Make 'em so they don't have problems anymore , am I right ? Someone should do that finally .
Also , my saliva can't dissolve steel , and it would be more convenient for me if that were the case .
Also my eyes should spew nanites please and thank you .
Oh , so are these the sort of upgrades we're doing ?
Yeah man ! Why hold back ? ?

OH OKAY PHEW
The camera opens on an idyllic farmland scene : grain gently waving in the breeze , a red farmhouse in the distance . It's all , like , quiet farm stuff .
Suddenly , a futuristic , heavily - armoured flying car shoots past the farmhouse !
The audience sighs a sigh of relief because this story just got awesome . But then , the car flies off into the distance and we're stuck looking at wheat ! A few minutes pass , and we hear the sound of explosions and laser weapons fire coming from the distance , all " KAPOW " and " pew pew pew " , all " zzzzzot " and kksccchh - POW ! ! ! "
What's causing the rad explosions ?
All I can say is : if the grain knows , it's not telling ! !
And that means we don't know either . We hear distant shouting , but can't make out any words . Then the noise of - a dog ? A wolf ? Wait , maybe an elephant ? Oh man , are there elephants over there ? ?
. . . We simply can't say .
THE END

Here's me speaking modern English : " Let's go see a movie the day after tomorrow . "
Sounds legit ; I'm down .

" The day after tomorrow " in one word !
That's a syllable savings of over 42 % !
With semantic density this low , we must be insane !
EXACTLY MY POINT . English is like software that keeps pushing out cool new updates , but then also drops old features ! Well SORRY APP STORE , but I'm keeping my old version . You know , the one I've been using since EREYESTERDAY ? ?

" Furthermore , I can deduce from your stupid shirt that you're a big jerk who sucks " , Sherlock continues . Aaron was this guy who always insulted me , the author , in grade three . In real life , I mean ! I spent a long time thinking of how I could get back at him , then one day I overheard someone else say " back to you " when THEY got insulted , and it seemed to be an unstoppable retort ! I WAS FINALLY READY .
Sherlock agrees with me that digression is interesting !
Did your plan work ?
Briefly !

Okay , first get a computer . Then , program that computer to take text as input and use semantic analysis to figure out the topic of that text . Then , use a synset database to find related words connected to that topic . Finally , replace any words in the text that have synonyms in your sysnset ! So a text about bikes would replace " 'I like bikes ! ' said Rob " with " 'I like bikes ! ' SPOKE Rob " .
Because bikes have spokes ! !
And if Rob is real tired , then the program will change " TIRED " to caps ! Because bikes have tires ! !

Wish you could relive the past , but don't have the technology ? Here is how you create an instant
REAL - LIFE AFFORDABLE TIME MACHINE
One month , pick a song you like , and bonus points if you can tell it's the kind of song you'll get tired of later . Listen to the song , as often as you can ! Listen to it on your headphones , play it in your head while you're walking around - whatever !
Keep it a constant presence in your life .
Then , cut the song out cold turkey !
FORGET THE SONG . The song is dead to you now !
Wait a few years , then load up that old mp3 file and play it for INSTANT RECOLLECTION of who you were and what you felt during that month when this one song got associated with EVERYTHING YOU DID . It works every time !
I got this idea while watching my granddad cry while I played " The White Cliffs of Dover " !
The other ideas I got were " Wow it's horrible watching elderly people cry , should I stop the music now or what ? " and " God , why can't I pat people on the back and make it seem like a natural gesture ? ? "
So !
That's three ideas in total !

As Gregor Samsa awoke one morning from uneasy dreams he found himself transformed in his bed into a monstrous , verminous meme .
Everything he said was in all - caps Impact font .
He could almost see his numerous image macros waving helplessly before his eyes !
" NOT SURE IF REAL LIFE " , he thought , then he imagined a picture of Fry from Futurama squinting a little , then he completed the thought with " OR A DREAM " . It was no dream . His room , a regular bedroom , only rather too small , lay quiet between the four familiar walls . He struggled to get out of bed . " AM I THE ONLY ONE AROUND HERE " he said , then pictured Lebowski with a gun , " WHO CAN'T GET OUT OF BED ? ? "
" TURNED INTO MEME " , he said , thinking of Bad Luck Brian , " AND ISN'T SUCCESS KID " .
Precisely !
His mother knocks to tell him he's late and he shouts " I DON'T ALWAYS MISS WORK / [ Dos Equis guy ] / BUT WHEN I DO , I HAVE A GOOD REASON " and it's close enough to how he normally talks that she doesn't suspect he's a meme now .
How tragic ! How monstrous ! I can't wait to read 200 more pages of this ! !

" Well , I guess nothing clears up a case so much as stating it to another person ! " T - Rex said . Sherlock sat down , pulling out a notebook labelled " ALL MY GREATEST LINES ARE STOLEN FROM T - REX " .

T - REX'S BELIEVE IT OR NOT PRESENTS : FACTS ABOUT SPRING
Spring shares its name with a strange coil of metal . . . and I DON'T KNOW WHY !
Despite happening once a year everywhere in the world , the verb " spring " does NOT mean " to melt snow and reveal someone's stale old dog poops " . Instead , it means " jump or leap " . . . something an abstract concept like a season LITERALLY CANNOT DO !
Spring is one of only TWO KNOWN SEASONS that starts with the letter " s " !
I can't believe it or not ! !
If you ever come across a hole in the ground that water comes out of , you can legally call that hole a " spring " and NO POLICE OFFICER IN ANY JURISDICTION THE WORLD OVER WILL BE ABLE TO STOP YOU !
Can I drink the " spring water " ?
Hey man it's your funeral
Once spring is over , you may say " spring has sprung " or " spring has sprang " , but you CANNOT say " spring really frigged me on this one " .
IT'S JUST TOO RUDE ! !
And if there are no objections , then I now pronounce you husband and - -
STOP THE WEDDING ! !
LATER :
Yep , as that little adventure just showed , " STOP THE WEDDING ! ! " is but one of the several phrases you can get in trouble for yelling at weddings . Others include " THE BRIDE'S BEEN CLONED ! ! " and " THE GROOM IS REALLY JUST THREE KIDS IN A TRENCHCOA - -
Wait . Wait . You yelled " stop the wedding " at some random wedding . . . just to prove it was a bad idea ? ?
Dude , that's kinda monstrous !
No it's not ! It's EDUCATION !
And I myself learned the wedding actually doesn't get stopped ! Instead you get kicked out by muscle dudes . What I should've shouted was " BRIEFLY DELAY THE WEDDING ! ! " and then said " Okay cool thanks " and ran away . In fact . . .
Don't do it ! !

HOW TO USE FACEBOOK
Facebook is a cool social network because your parents are on it !
So here's how to get started on Facebook !
First , make an account . If you don't use your real name then Facebook will kick you off the site . If you DO use your real name then Facebook will store all information you give it , even if you delete your account .
It's like sharing your most personal secrets with a friend who's always trying to figure out ways to make money off you !
Next , tell it who your friends are .
Facebook will start suggesting friends too !
" Maybe you wanna make friends with your racist aunt ? " it'll say . " No ? How about someone you kinda remember from high school who got pregnant ? Yes ? PERFECT . Have some photos of the child of this barely recalled stranger . "
Yaaaay
CONGRATULATIONS
YOU ARE NOW A FACEBOOK WIZARD
i wonder which members of my extended family are anti - vaccine ? oh , they're all talking about it on facebook ? THANKS AGAIN ] ]
HOW TO USE TWITTER
Twitter is a cool social network because complete strangers can message you at any time , and there's no way to turn that off ! !
So Here's how to get started on Twitter !
First You'll need to choose a name . All names on Twitter start with an " @ " , so a good name might be @ cooldude , except that's taken , as is @ coolguy , @ guywhoiscool , @ cooltwitterguy , and @ heyilike2becool .
Instead , fall back to your second choices , such as @ abirdpoopedonme , @ pooponmyhead , or @ ohitouchedapoop .
Now compress your greatest and most sublime ideas down to 140 characters !
It's easy !
Instead of " But , soft ! what light through yonder window breaks ? It is the east , and Juliet is the sun , " try " . @ juliet is hottttt ! ! seriously guys wtf " .
This leaves you more room for " hashtags " , like # babes , # hotbabes , and # sunmetaphors .
EACH OF US HAS ONLY A FINITE NUMBER OF DAYS IN OUR TOO BREIF LIVES ; NONE KNOW HOW MANY OR HOW FEW THEY HAVE LEFT BEFORE DEATH , AS IT MUST , COMES TO US ALL
BE SURE TO SPEND YOURS . . . ON twitter . com
friggin do it , you guys ^ tm

HOW TO TUNE TCP PARAMETERS ON HIGH - LATENCY NETWORKS
LET'S DO THIS ! !
So the default Linux network stack has TCP buffer sizes that are WAY too small . It's hilarious . I mean , they're a factor of your available memory ( OBVIOUSLY ) but generally you can bump those values up quite a bit from the defaults . You should be doing this right now , if you haven't already .

THE FABLE OF THE ANT AND THE GRASSHOPPER

. . . UM , CONGRATULATIONS ON THE BIRTH OF YOUR FIRST CHILD ? ?
History is pretty boring , right ? Sure . A bunch of stuff that happened to dead people who didn't even know what a computer was . Woo hoo .
But what if I told you -
. . . THREE CENTURIES OF HISTORY IS LIES ? ?
You wanna know more about history now , huh ? Yeah you do . " I sure hope the lie centuries aren't any of the good ones , " you're saying . I get it !
SO HERE'S THE IDEA : in the year 614 someone - or someONES - alter the calendar ahead by 297 years , skipping right to the year 911 . And records of this jump are lost , because it's the middle ages ! And that explains why not many things happened in this SUPER BORING time period !
What about Charlemagne ? What about stuff that took place in , I don't know , the year 800 ?
DIRTY LIES .
An attempt to alter our perception of world history ? An oversight by later historians who never realized these years were fake ? WE SIMPLY CAN'T SAY . Time herself has been changed for reasons unknown - perhaps , UNKNOWABLE .
This theory is called " phantom time " and I encourage you to research it !
SHORTLY :
Turns out there's no discrepancy between astronomical observations from before and after your " skip " , so phantom time didn't happen .
WOW , dude , I super need to start reading more than the first two sentence of Wikipedia articles

IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING THE RECALL AFFECTING YOUR BODY
Hello ! You are reading this message because you have been a patron of our " Physical Body Made of Meat " product in the past several million years .
We regret to inform you that an issue has been discovered with your body .
Besides the known issues of Bug 24442 ( " aging " ) , Bug 59804 ( " body gets smelly if I use it " ) , and Bug 2 ( " poop comes out the butt ? ! " ) , a new vulnerability has been discovered with the " heart " hardware installed in your body . Known as " commotio cordis " , it's a 30 millisecond long window during each heartbeat wherein an impact to your chest could , um . . . stop your heart and kill you instantly .
WHOOPS
Is every single heartbeat vulnerable for instadeath ?
Yes .
I see . Can I return my body for a new one ?
No , this isn't that kind of recall . This is more the , " you should RECALL this crazy vulnerability whenever something comes close to your chest " sort of thing . Okay bye !
Enjoy your bod !

UPSIDE TO DEATH # 332 : YOU DON'T HAVE TO TALK TO STRANGERS ANYMORE

" Spring is Nice ! " - a poem by me , T - Rex .
* ahem *
Spring is nice !
In comparison to winter
The snow melts and the ground is spongy and wet and carries this terrible smell of rotting leaves and pickled dog poo
Which is nice
In comparison to winter
Rivers expand , basements flood
Which is nice
In comparison to winter
Trees spew pollen which irritates my eyes and interferes with my ability to breathe
Which is nice
In comparison to winter
The end .

TWENTIETH CENTURY AMERICAN HISTORY as reconstructed by the titles of its # 1 songs
1900s : consumer - level airship travel is finally made affordable .
1910s : the distance to Tipperary is approximated for the very first time !
1920s : Whoopee is synthesized in a lab for the first time ever ! But sadly , it's too late for the last Toot Toot Tootsie , which goes extinct . 1930s : a downside to staring at smoke is discovered .
1940s : America's seniors begin dabbling in the occult , creating unnatural birdlike creatures that speak in the voice of a corpse . 1950s : one " Irene " got real sleepy , fascinating the nation .
1960s : the intended purpose of boots is , at last , discovered by Americans .
FINALLY
1970s : martial arts become popular , which allows the majority of Americans to survive the decade . Songs are weaponized .
1980s : contaminated emotions are discovered in America . Scientists quickly respond , and seek funding to examine the precise nature of endearment .
1990s : effective cardiac tissue regeneration is now possible , allowing the organ to survive even host death . Also , an upper limit to sexiness is found . THE END .

Let's imagine I'm Batman ! I go out and fight crime every night . Then I go to bed and sleep all day !
But then people start wondering why Bruce Wayne seems to spend 24 hours a day in bed !
So I cut back on the crime fighting a little to maintain my Bruce persona . But every time I'm in those WayneCorp meetings it's because I traded away hours of crimefighting ! I need to sleep sometimes , and people may DIE tonight because I spent some of my waking hours in a board meeting . How can I ethically DO that ? How am I not a monster for doing that instead of saving lives every waking hour I can ? ?

The Malvaceae family contains several examples of the Useful or Tasty Plants , including cotton , cocoa , and okra . Nicely done , Malvacaea !
I'm glad someone in history times decided to try to eat and / or wear you !
One particular member of this family grows in wetlands , and ancient Egyptians would eat it as a tasty treat . Time went on and an extract from this plant was used as a flavourant , which was eventually mixed with sugars to make a sweet flavor slurry .
It's probably better than it sounds ?
I know , and it already sounds great ! !
In more recent times , the French whipped it into a meringue for a lighter treat !
Hah ! CLASSIC 19th century France .
The root extract was eventually replaced with cheaper alternatives , stabilizers and preservatives were added , and that's how we ended up with the modern candy which still bears the name of the wetland plant it originated from thousands of years ago : the marshmallow .

Science dictates this gave him the proportional speed and strength of a dog !

And did his vision get worse ?
Oh , way worse , absolutely .

Antonio Tony woke up in a world without friction ! All around him things were sliding around like crazy !
" Life sure is funny sometimes , " Antonio muttered as he slid smoothly out of bed !
Antonio pushed himself off a wall and slid out the door . He kept sliding for a long time , and eventually bumped into a restaurant where he tried to eat some food , but it kept sliding around his plate . " It sucks here , " Antonio said to his waiter , but loud enough for everyone else to hear too . This made the rest of the patrons uncomfortable : up to now they'd been happily enjoying their meal without friction OR interruption !
Holy crap , this premise is rad ! SO MUCH WOULD CHANGE . But ? how did this happen ? Why is there no friction ?
Shh !
An older man , Howard , angrily tells Antonio to leave if he doesn't like it . Howard's lived alone since his wife passed , eating out every meal because he went from his mother's house straight to living with his wife and never learned how to cook for himself .
Why's there no friction though ?

Nat Imbruglia has witnessed a male corpse become reanimated . . . OR SO SHE CLAIMS ! !

She's embarrassed .

She sure is ! !

Are we on time for this revelation ?
No . We are , in fact , a little late .
After this Natalie becomes nonverbal , refusing to engage in conversation . And that's what's going on .

HOW TO WRITE A SEX SCENE
Writers ! Are your characters super horny ? ?
Writers , did you imagine horned - up people " by accident " again ? ?
Well I don't judge , but you should hear it from a friend first : you're going to write a sex scene soon .
The ideal sex scene does two things : it lets your characters touch each other in places , AND it makes the reader want to put the book down , look out the window , and think " Huh . Maybe I should have some sex soon , too . "
How does one write a sex scene , T - Rex ?
EASY . Just fill in this template !
CHARACTER A touched CHARACTER B with his or her BODY PART . CHARACTER B quite liked it when SEX ACT happened . Before you knew it , PIECE OF FURNITURE / OFFICE EQUIPMENT was covered in LIQUID OR LIQUIDS TYPICALLY FOUND IN BODIES . Then they VERB together all over the REAL OR IMAGINED PASTA DISH .
" To summarize the sex we just had , " said CHARACTER B OR D , sighing happily , " I would say : LINE FROM ANY SPEECH BY WINSTON CHURCHILL . "
Okay ! Writing is over , you can all go home now !
Send me half your Pulitzer ! !
HOW TO WRITE A SCENE OF QUIET CONTEMPLATION
Writers ! Do your characters have a rich inner life that demands they introspect themselves with their full , undivided attention ?
Hah hah hah !
LOSERS
Seriously though , I'm sure your characters probably have other qualities that make 'em cool . Maybe when they're not quietly teasing apart their innermost motivations over a nice cup of tea , they're punching their way to success , right ?
It's never too late to have your characters punch a dude , writers .
NEVER FORGET THAT .
So help me write a scene of quiet introspection , T - Rex !
NO PROBLEM .
Just write : " You know how sometimes you can't fall asleep because you keep going over the events of the day in your head ? Isn't that the coolest ? ? Well , check THIS out : the imaginary person you're reading about is doing that now ! I KNOW : SO AWESOME . "
Perfect ! !
IN CONCLUSION , IF YOUR BOOKS SUCK NOW DON'T BLAME ME
MAN
I TRIED TO FIX 'EM FOR YOU
HOW TO WRITE A SCENE THAT TAKES PLACE IN THE DARK
Sometimes the lights go out in a story , and you may be confused as to what your characters are doing !
" What was that crash noise ? Is someone moving around ? ? " ? YOU
" Oh no , is my tall character's head impacting against a low - hanging beam ? Has my short character wandered into an open cupboard and is now stumbling , forever lost amongst the pots and pans ? ? " ? YOU , AGAIN
Do you ever wonder if we experience the world in fundamentally different ways ?
CONSTANTLY .
Anyway , the solution's real easy . When you introduce a character just say something like " Mary hadn't worked her ass off for twenty years to be Chili's ASSISTANT manager . She was shrewd , she was calculating , and right now , she was angry . Also , she had a flashlight on her at all times . "
Done !
THE END
IF ANYONE TELLS YOU WRITING IS HARD THAT'S JUST BECAUSE THEY WANT FEWER WRITERS TO COMPETE WITH

ADVANCED WRITING TIPS
TIP # 45
If you want to parenthetically notify your reader that something is amazing , put an exclamation point in brackets ! For example :
I just saw a nice horse ( ! ) , you guys !
JUST ONE PROBLEM : ( ! ) looks like a butt . It looks as much like a butt as : D looks like a face , which is to say : TOTALLY A LOT .
I don't have a solution for this , I just wanted to give fair warning : y'all be typing out butts .
It looks even more like a butt if you underline your exclamation point : ( _ ! _ )
I'LL be the judge of that !
Now just give me a moment to imagine ( _ ! _ ) and I'll be able to report of any ?

OKAY FINE WHATEVER

Want to learn accounting but can only make yourself care about cute little puppy dogs ? Then welcome to
BEST ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES , BUT WITH DOG ANALOGIES
Let's say I loan you a puppy , and we agree that for every month you have my puppy , you owe me 15 % more puppy . This is called " interest " ! And if it's " compounded " every month , after one month you'll owe me 15 % extra , but after TWO months you'll owe me 32 % more puppy , since that 15 % puppy interest is being applied on the original puppy plus the extra puppy percentage you already owe me !
Who wants 15 % of a puppy ?
ME
It's why I loaned out my initial puppy in the first place . This puppy is called " Principal " , by the way . Her name is Principal Puppy and she has spots on her belly . And YES , she's also the principal of of Puppydog High because OBVIOUSLY THAT WOULD HAPPEN . She's a good girl , yes she is ! !

Plants are the plant equivalent of a boring snail that died , THE END .

Microscopic blue - green algae evolved the trait , so plant life just straight - up ENGULFED them . Sucked up the algae into their own cells , absorbed their abilities , and BOOM : photosynthesis plants . The chloroplast in plant cells today is a deformed , degraded remnant of that bacteria .
That's KINDA metal , I guess .

FOREVER NOW
" Watson , I've deduced the answer ! This is a TIME machine ! ! " Sherlock Holmes said quickly . Watson looked up from his notebook . " Talk slower , " he said . " I'm writing down your adventures and you're going too fast . "
Sherlock Holmes strapped himself in for a journey . . . THROUGH TIME ! !
" Also , " Watson said , strapping himself in besides his friend and partner , " you run around too quickly . I'm writing down your actions as well and that takes time , okay ? " He snapped his seatbelt into place , sighing . " Did you know , " Watson said , " that I have had to replace entire speeches of yours with 'Elementary ! ' because I couldn't write down what you said fast enough ? I'm not joking . Slow down , man . "
The time machine cast a strange temporal light on Sherlock's features !
Watson's attention was directed to his notebook .
" Strange . . . temporal . . . light . . . " he said , whispering the words as he wrote them down . When he looked up , Sherlock had already bounded out of the time machine and was lost somewhere in the year 2969 .
Watson , exasperated , flipped a few levers and returned home .
" Sherlock got pushed off a waterfall by Moriarty , " he wrote . " Oh well . P . S . : I shall ever regard as the best and the wisest man whom I have ever know . P . P . S : I definitely did NOT leave him to die in the year 2969 . THE END . "
ULTRA - CANON
Angola Maldives , my cool spy character , was once again dangling over a shark tank ! But it wasn't just sharks down there , he realized : there was also the infrastructure required to keep sharks alive in captivity !
Including thousands of kilograms of precisely - salinated filtered water !
Further , Maldives considered , a protein skimmer must be included , used to remove food and waste particles from the tank . Plus live rocks , which , despite their name , aren't actually alive ! Rather , they're dead coral covered in microscopic marine organisms , which helps clean , filter , and nitrify the water .
This sounds expensive .
Oh , we're just getting started !
Heating and cooling systems !
Pumps , powerheads , lights , and filters !
Not to mention water monitoring and cycling and mixing equipment , PLUS backup generators for all of the above . And when salt water evaporates the salt's left behind , which in a tank can increase salinity to toxic levels ! So add on a fresh - water auto top - off system to keep the water level , well , level .
Angola sighed as the rope lowered him closer and closer to the sharks . " Many sharks prefer to have some place to hide in their tanks , and this tank is bare . Those poor sharks must be stressed , and agitated . "
THE END
TIP : To see results from only a particular daterange , use " daterange : 20010101 - 20051231 " . Past events cannot be changed by you .
You will not learn if they're being changed by others .
GOOGLE CHEAT SHEET
TIP : Searching for " how do I die " may return results that appear to rapidly change under your gaze . Remember : knowledge of the future changes the future , destroying itself .
Keep staring until realities collapse into a single and now unavoidable fate .
TIP : To see what dead relatives are seeing right now , turn on " incognito mode " .
IT MUST NOT BE TURNED OFF .
TIP : To find results from other timelines , use " reality : onewheresheneverleft " . You may encounter results where phrases like " cold " , " can't breathe " , or " I'm hungry I'M HUNGRY " are repeated madly , desperately .
This is a side - effect of our proprietary search process and should be ignored .
TIP : " Safesearch " may appear to be on . YOU ARE NOT SAFE . YOU WILL NEVER BE SAFE .

Good news : the complete SkinFlesh protective coating package is now standard on all models !

Sherlock Holmes , the world's greatest detective , was stumped . He considered the case carefully and deduced that there was only one possible conclusion :
" I deduce . . . that this case DEFINITELY has me stumped ! " he said !
Suddenly , he had another deduction , which happened a lot because he was smart . " Criminals are a cowardly and superstitious lot ! " he realized , " therefore I will dress up like a bat and punch them when I want more information on cases . Hah ! Elementary ! ! " . He set to quickly creating his " Bat - Man " suit . It was awesome .
It was SO
AWESOME .

UNAMBIGUOUS ANSWERS TO OLD RHETORICAL QUESTIONS
PART TWO
WHY DON'T WE CALL BUILDINGS " BUILTS " ?
We could if we wanted . You know what's more interesting ? " Building " comes from " buldijana " in Proto - Germanic . That's a reconstructed language : we believe it existed , but don't have any concrete proof . As such , the entire language is built from logical deduction !
To find out more about Proto - Germanic , and other reconstructed languages , consult your local Wikipedia .
WHY IS THE ALPHABET IN ALPHABETICAL ORDER ?
Historical accident , really .
Yep !
SINCE LIGHT TRAVELS FASTER THAN SOUND , IS THAT WHY SOME PEOPLE APPEAR BRIGHT UNTIL YOU HEAR THEM SPEAK ?
No , the speed difference is usually noticeable under conversational conditions .
You are fundamentally misunderstanding the principles at play here .
WHY DO WE WASH TOWELS ? AREN'T WE OUR CLEANEST WHEN WE USE THEM ?
Hopefully ! But we're also wet , and wet towels encourage mold growth .
Seriously man , quit joking around and WASH YOUR FRIGGIN' TOWELS .
In the future , we'll all have one cyborg eye paired with one normal eye for dramatic contrast ! We'll have one more thing too :
a little thing called GOOD MANNERS ? ?

YES , OBVIOUSLY WE'D DO THAT .

Once upon a time Kay found a magic lamp with a genie inside ! " You get one wish , " the genie said . " And I don't want to hear any complaints about 'only' one wish . I'm giving you the chance to ALTER REALITY here . Geez . "
Anyway , Kay wished that every decision she made would be the right one !
Kay then decided to have breakfast : a muffin . It turned out to be the right decision , because just then her fridge exploded and her toaster burst into flame . " Ah , " she realized , " I get it : the way my wish works is rather than making my choices good , it makes my considered but discarded alternatives bad . It's one of those ironic consequences wishes . "
" I can work with this , " she said , smiling .
So Kay obviously then became a superhero ?
SO KAY OBVIOUSLY THEN BECAME A SUPERHERO .
Her speciality was rescuing hostages , because by deciding to rescue the hostage , her wish ensured that the people she decided NOT to rescue - i . e . , the kidnappers - would explode , stroke out , cerebral hemorrhage , whatever .
That's pretty dark .
Yeah , that's pretty Kay !
Later she DIDN'T decide to prevent a bunch of butterflies from flapping their wings , and the world is scoured clean by hurricanes . THE END .
DID YOU KNOW : as a universe where wishes exist is inherently unstable , this is the best ending we could've hoped for ? ?
You wake up in a room feeling scared ! Oh no , this is a horror story , and there's a scary noise outside your bedroom door ! ! To investigate the noise , turn to Option 1 ! To stay in bed , turn to Option 2 .
OPTION 1 : IT WAS A MONSTER , YOU DIE !
THE END
OPTION 2 : You ignore the noise ! Guess what , that doesn't matter because it's breaking through the door and killing you anyway ! IT WAS A MONSTER , YOU DIE .
THE END

Because when they launched them , the astronauts crashed directly into the firmament !

Some open to let the sun and moon travel through , while others can be opened to allow gigantic warehouses of water , snow , and hail to discharge their contents . Stars are just lights on the surface .
Needless to say , this was super surprising for the astronauts !

Once upon a time there was a prince who still lived with his hoarder mom and who kept breaking up with his princess girlfriends for super trivial reasons . " Why can't I find a REAL princess ? " he sighed .
THE PRINCESS AND THE PEA
His mom agreed that the breakups were all definitely the woman's fault : they simply weren't princess enough . One day , a princess showed up at his place for shelter for the night ! The mom had 40 mattresses on hand due to hoarding , so she put them all in a giant stack and said " Here , sleep on this . "
The princess agreed this was a rational thing for her to sleep on .
But there was a single pa at the bottom of the stack !
Yes , surprise ! It was a single eponymous pea ! !
The next day , the princess claimed to have ACTUAL , PHYSICAL BRUISING from a tiny lump in her FREE BED TOWER . Obviously she was a garbage person . Due to sexisms the princes believed that her insane wimpiness was proof of true princesshood . So they were married . They deserved each other , and nobody should learn from their example .
Year later , his mother was found buried under a collapsed pile of mattresses .
The end !
Once upon a time there was an Emperor who was big into fashion . He met two tailors who promised o make him a suit made of the finest fabric : one visible to ONLY the most intelligent people !
THE EMPEROR'S NEW CLOTHES
The Epmeror's minsters couldn't see the suit , but they pretended to so they'd seem smart , and the Emperor did the same . But when he took his new suit out in a parade , little kids shouted " The Emperor has no clothes ! ! " .
Was the Emperor embarrassed ?
Why would he be ? ? His clothing is DESIGNED to be invisible to dumb kids . Nothing about what those kids shouted surprised him !
So what'd he do after the parade ?
He cornered the market on the fabric !
He realized a generally - invisible fabric would have great applications in law enforcement : invisible nets and traps , for example , caught all but the most intelligent criminals . The fabric was also woven into ropes and used to construct beautiful " floating " bridges , stairs , and other architecture .
Einsteins and Hawkings could see the wires , but to everyone else it was the most gorgeous , most impossible - and most peaceful - kingdom in the entire world .
THE END .

OH NO YOU HAVE OVERDOSED ON INTERNET
Oh no !
You took too much ! !
Let's go over the symptoms : are you kinda angry , but also kinda sad ?
Yep !
And you kinda hate everyone but don't want to talk about it ?
Yep !
And you're bored but also listless ?
YEP !
DEFINITELY an internet overdose .
What's the cure ?
Option one : stop using internet . Option TWO : use more internet to get your baseline tolerance up . with repeated , consistent use , you should be able to sustain up to 18 hours of internet a day !
Will I still feel the same ?
YES . But you'll no longer be able to detect it ! !

Once upon a time there was a man who bragged to a king that his daughter could spin straw into gold . This absurd claim was entirely without merit .
THE STORY OF RUMPEL - STILTSKIN
as told in the 19th century
The king locked the girl in a room filled with straw and said if she didn't spin it all into gold , he'd murder her . Kings , right ? The girl was doomed , but then a small man appeared and offered to accomplish this impossible task for a small fee ! And incredibly , he did . The next morning , the king demanded the girl repeat the trick , and anyway long story short the girl ended up deeply in debt to the nice man who kept helping her .
Since he was nice , he said he'd forgive the debt if she guessed his name ! AND he gave her infinite guesses .
Super nice !
The girl guessed name after name but none were correct . Finally her friend spied on the man , discovered his real name , and told the girl . When the girl said " Your name is Rumpelstilts - kin ! " , the man was FURIOUS . He screamed " The devil told you that ! ! " over and over .
Then in a rage he stomped his right foot deep into the ground , buying it up to his waist . Then he grabbed his left foot with both hands , and screaming , tore himself in two , right up the middle . THE END .

You know why old paintings look so wonky ? I'll tell you why : painter dudes didn't know about perspective !
They were all " I GUESS things get smaller when they're further away ? I GUESS ? "
But as anyone who has tried to draw knows , there's a lot more to it than that . Then in the 15th century artists figured out perspective and suddenly they could paint things like " buildings " or " hallways " or " cars if they were invented yet " and have them actually look like what they're supposed to ! And of course , this was like when lens flares got added to Photoshop : artists started adding blatant perspective EVERYWHERE ALL THE TIME .
Barn - floor checkerboard tiles in a " Jesus in the manger " sculpture ? WHY NOT ! !
Yep !
I see you're familiar with renaissance sculptor and future " does machines " ninja - turtle inspiration Donatello . And can we talk about Leonardo's " Last Supper " ? It's literally 33 % " son of God enjoying a meal " and 66 % " bro this vanishing point is OFF THE HOOK , seriously bro , you don't even know " .
" Cool but crude " Raphael and " party dude " Michelangelo also loved perspective , and in conclusion , if Leonardo had ray - tracing software there'd be a chrome ball on a black - and - white checkerboard beside Jesus , 1005 GUARANTEED .
Art , am I right ? ?

The moon's story was about a princess who loved a beautiful prince that she could never touch , for she knew that if she got close enough to touch him she'd never stop , and they would both be destroyed , and all life on the prince would be wiped out as his atmosphere turned to fire .
Burning skies would not be the worst of it , however !
Not by a long shot !
Her impact would knock the prince out of his orbit while simultaneously converting him into a deadly ocean of magma . And so , although she was tempted , the princess pushed herself a little bit away from the prince every single day , forever hiding her true face so that the prince wouldn't see her tears .

Oh boo hoo the climate is changing . Well guess what , nerds ? The climate changes all the time ! !
Or have we forgotten a little time period called 2 . 3 BILLION YEARS AGO ? ?
Cyanobacteria showed up then and ate water and pooped out oxygen . And you know what happened ? The atmosphere changed from basically 0 % oxygen to 20 % oxygen and HEY PRESTO , life exploded .
You're really arguing this ?
I'M REALLY ARGUING THIS , yes .
Well you know that this Great Oxygenation Event killed lots of life ?
Can't make an omelet without breaking a few eggs !
It was one of the most significant extinction events in our planet's history . Sure , we oxygen breathers got a sweet deal out of it , but all those anaerobic organisms that lived here before ? DIDN'T WORK OUT SO WELL FOR THEM .
So new C02 breathing life shows up and enjoys the heck out of it ! We had a good run , nerds ! !

HOW TO USE EBAY
eBay is a cool website if you want something , but you don't want it now , but you think you might want it at an undetermined price seven days from now , plus two weeks for shipping ! !
So here's how to get started on eBay !
First , decide what you want to buy from an internet stranger you'll never meet . For example , I'm hungry , so I want a burger . Now eBay doesn't sell burgers , but it DOES at present offer a plastic bag of 100 doll - sized used plastic burgers . This is a reasonable compromise , so I enter in how much I want to pay , and if I for some reason thought they were worth more than everyone else across the entire internet did , then they're mine !
Once the burgers arrive , give feedback to the seller !
Yes ! This is CRITICAL .
Be sure to enter in things like " ( musicnotes ) ( flowerfancyX _ fancyX ) ( musicnotes ) " or " ( crowndot ) : ( star ) YAAAAAY ( star ) : ( dotcrown ) " because like in all aspects of life , the more your text looks like it's stroking out , the more credible you will appear . And now , if you'll excuse me , I'm off to wonder what I was thinking when i bought a bag of tiny used plastic burgers .
CONGRATULATIONS
NOW YOU CAN SELL WHAT YOU BOUGHT ON EBAY
EASY WAYS TO REMEMBER THE SCALE OF NUMBERS
1 : There's one of you ! However many of your there are , there are that many of this other thing .
10 : Look at a human's hands . If they have the average amount of digits , it's this many !
100 : This is the number of Pokemon the average person can name off the top of their head .

HOW TO WRITE ROMANCE STORIES
Romance is a genre just like any other ! You just need to know which genre points to hit , and then it's smooooth sailing .
And YES , I know that was a metaphor I should ; ve saved for " How To Write Stories With Boats In Them " !
In a romance story , you just need to have some love ! It's tricky though : that's how they get you . It can't be love between a woman and her personal electronic devices ! If you put this in your editor will say " this is just 250 pages of a woman becoming increasingly satisfied with her new TV , and you should just give up writing fiction and starting writing for TV companies " .
Can it be love a woman feels for managing her time effectively ?
No , that was the next thing I tried !
Among the things I'm told are NOT romance stories are : love between man and sandwich , love betwixt woman and man AND sandwich , and a review of the food at this really romantic restaurant . It has to be two people who like each other , and THAT'S IT .
Can they at least be dogs ?
Lemme check .
SOON :
Sir , we are happy to accept " The Lady In Fur : Claws for Dismissal " for publication .
Utahraptor ! ! Utahraptor , guess what ?
They can be dogs ! !
HOW TO WRITE STORIES WITH BOATS IN THEM
Aw , damn it .
Okay ! First off , put all your characters in a boat RIGHT AWAY .
This will prevent you from writing yourself into a corner , where for example all your characters are in a desert shack when you need your boat to appear , which will then save you several chapters of your characters agreeing that when that boat rammed through the wall they all thought it made sense , and any third parties who heard tell of this and disagreed were simply not considering the matter closely enough .
Okay , my characters are boat - borne ! But how do I DESCRIBE the boat ?
It can be tricky !
Words to include are " floating " , " seaworthy " , and " boat - esque " . Those to avoid include " winged " , " like a tub , from a bathroom , but big , and extremely specialized " and " if you can imagine a toy boat , but larger , or maybe if you imagined a toy boat with toy people on it first , and then make THAT larger " .
CONGRATULATIONS , YOU NOW HAVE NO EXCUSES NOT TO HAVE BOATS IN EVERY STORY YOU WRITE
Writing's hard , huh ?
Um , not anymore ! !
Are you thinking of having children ? I mean , sure , you probably think of having a lot of things , but is one of those children ? ?
THINGS TO CONSIDER BEFORE HAVING CHILDREN
Look at your cell phone . Is it 18 years old ? Because that's how long you're legally responsible for children ! If you can imagine loving the exact same phone for the next TWO DECADES - EVEN IF YOUR PHONE BEGAN LITERALLY PRODUCING FECES , REQUIRING YOU TO CARRY AND CHANGE ITS DIAPERS - then you maybe are ready to have kids .
And hey , does your phone have a cracked screen ?
Nice going , potential future parent !
You managed to break material SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED to be as strong as possible , and you did it by ACCIDENT . Would you trust yourself with a baby ? Would ANYONE ?

One spooky Hallowe'en night Robyn was digging in her back yard when she uncovered . . . A HUMAN SKULL . And unlike most skulls , this one began gushing blood from its eye sockets and was constantly , breathlessly screaming the second it was exposed to air .
A TALE OF TERROR
" Weiiiiiird , " Robyn said , cradling the skull in her arms !
Robyn obviously had the screaming skull's blood tested . It turned out to be fresh , disease - free Type O negative blood : the universal donor ! Like that , the world's blood banks would never be empty again .
But where does the blood come from ?
That IS the question !
Unfortunately , it was beyond Robyn's ability to ascertain .
Aw dang .
However , she COULD ascertain that by putting the skull above a reservoir with a turbine attached , she could generate endless supplies of energy . And it turns out her backyard was a curs ? d graveyard of the ancients , so there were tons more blood skulls to be had . They almost seemed to crawl out of the dirt on their own !
With free energy and free blood both in great supply , life from Earth spread out across the stars . THE END .

HOW TO WRITE A JOKE
The most important part of any joke is the punchline . So come up with that first ! For example ,
" So THAT'S why penguins don't live in Australia ! ! "
Now all you need to do is make that funny through context . Tada ! DONE . Joke : created !
And yet , I'm not laughing !
That's your HOMEWORK . That part is HOMEWORK , Dromiceiomimus .
Perhaps the setup is more important than the punchline after all ?
Okay , sure , maybe !
SO : for a joke , first you need a setup . For example , " why is a raven like a writing desk ? " Then come up with a hilarious punchline and you're set !
And ? Why IS a raven like a writing desk ?
Okay , honestly , it's because they're both catastrophically terrible flavours of ice cream I invented and keep trying again thinking they'll get better but each time it's like WOW , NOPE
Robyn bought a haunted mansion on the hill , and it was haunted by several spooky ghosts : a woman in white , a man in chains , and a knight in rusted armour .
They returned ever night to haunt her for years !
Judging by their clothes , they all died centuries ago . They rattled their chains , they slammed doors , they threw plates around , but one thing they never did , Robyn noticed , is EAT . Ghosts consumed no energy , but could still haunt houses indefinitely . Robyn realized that besides being paranormal , they were paraENTROPIC : ghosts were also outside the laws of thermodynamics !
They're doing work without costing energy anywhere !
EXACTLY . Free energy , Utahraptor !

PRET - TY GOOD DAY
Water is weird because most things get smaller when you freeze them , but water gets larger ! Ice is actually less dord than water !
DORD
Oh , hi there . You probably noticed me using the word " dord " just now . If you look it up in the dictionary , you'll find it means " density " - assuming of course you have one of the printings of Webster's Dictionary from before it was caught ! It was supposed to explain that " D or d " were short for " density " , but SOMEONE got confused and made it a word instead .
Well why can't " dord " mean density ?
Exactly ! It's not like anyone else is using it !
And before anyone cries " boo hoo hoo dictionaries reflect language and shouldn't be creating it " , let me just say I'M using " dord " to mean density RIGHT NOW , and if you join me , we can create the improved dictionaries we deserve . Not just for us : for our CHILDREN .
Our dord , dord children .
PS : I've already redefined " dord " to mean " stupid and / or dumb , especially a sucky person " because it's more useful that way .
Peace out , dords ! !

If you think you're about to die , you see your life flash before your eyes . But not all of it !
Only the MISTAKES !
Then , if you survive , you're like " bro , dang , in what might've seemed like a second to you I spent a subjective 30 years reliving every single mistake I ever made , and it wasn't ONLY the mistakes I knew about : I also saw how things I thought were my successes were but new , more nuanced types of errors . "
And your bro is like " woah bro " .
And you're like " how can I continue after this ? I am broken . "
And your bro is like " frig bro I dunno . "
And you're like " all I have done I failure . " and your bro is like " bro surely even your mistakes have value : the alternative is to make no decisions , which itself could be a mistake , so this at least gives you agency and you're like good point bro , I will no longer embrace a nihilistic death of self . "
And your bro is like " bro , no problem , the world can be thoughtlessly cruel and all we have is the comfort we can give each other . "

Fact : I am a ghost !
FACT : THAT IS A STONE COLD LIE
Fact : Only temporarily , dude !
Right now I'm not a ghost , sure , but my lifetime is but a BLIP in the lifetime of the universe ! And once I die , I'll be a ghost FOREVER , so the sentence " T - Rex is a ghost " is MORE accurate , on average , when taken across the entire lifespan of the universe . Especially when compared to the sentence " T - Rex is alive and definitely not a ghost right now . "
We're going for MOST TRUTH across all of space time ?
Hells yeah !

Actually , MOST accurate is " T - Rex does not exist " because that works before I was born too !
" The difference between a universe with T - Rex and one without is negligible "
OH NO
Are you making the best use of your time ?
Yep ! !
No , wait , scratch that .
100 % DEFINITELY NOT .
The best use of my time would be if I'm using every single moment to its fullest potential , right ? And we live in a universe wherein our past decisions affect what we get ( THANKS A LOT REALITY ) so even blowing a single moment fifteen years ago could make my present suboptimal .
Put it another way : If every decision creates zillions of alternate timelines , what are the odds that I'm in the # 1 best one ? ?

HOW TO MAKE ANY ESSAY YOU'RE WRITING LONGER
Don't even mess with " bigger line height " or that other amateur - hour garbage . Do it like the pros do : by copying and pasting your first few pages into the middle , prefaced by " For those of you just joining us , " and concluded by , " And now , the conclusion . . . " .

An ageless elder god slumbers in the Arctic , sole remnant of a long - dead , unknowable race . His body is not of flesh and blood , but of bones , teeth , and cartilage , barely contained in a straining red and white suit : a shambling parody of life .
CASE 1023
" SANTA "
For millennia His mind has reached out from the Arctic , shaping our dreams , twisting our perceptions until the only image anyone can retain when not directly looking at Him is the implanted memory of a smiling , jolly old man .
Every year He awakens from his frozen slumber . Every year He comes to us all .
Every year we try to stop Him and every year we fail .
Agents , you will know Him by His gifts left behind .
All are illusions .
Their horrifying true nature is incomprehensible , our gibbering madness instantly subsumed by happy memories of toys and chocolate the second we look away . Estimates put 10 % of all consumer goods in the world as being His .
We CLOTHE OURSELVES in them . We EAT them . We share them with our KIDS .
Specially - drugged Agents have retained glimpses of the true nature of His gifts , but at the cost of shattering their sanity beyond any recovery . WHAT PRESENTS DOES HE BRING US ? ?
I suppose we'll all briefly find out tonight . Happy holidays , Agents , and a very merry Christmas ! !

How come nobody is afraid of quicksand any more ? In the 50s , everyone was afraid of getting caught in quicksand all the time !
" It's A Wonderful Life " originally featured FIVE separate quicksand scenes !
" Ben Hur " ? QUICKSAND . " 12 Angry Men " ? Originally pitched as " 12 Angry Men , Angry Because of Quicksand , They're In It " . " Some Like it Hot " was initially about quicksand temperature preferences , before receiving a relatively substantial rewrite !
But now ? NOTHING . Plus , PLUS , I can't name a single top 40 song about getting stuck in quicksand at da club .
Maube because quicksand's not a threat , yo !
Huh ?
Where are you going to find a mud puddle so deep that you can go over your head on ACCIDENT ? And even if you DID , any sand dense enough to prevent you from swimming out would be dense enough to make you float . You'd sink only until you displaced enough sand to make you buoyant , and then it's smooth sailing !
So what you're saying is , nobody cares about quicksand any more because it's no longer a threat to us because WE BEAT QUICKSAND ! !
Woo ! Our civilization is now stronger than GIANT PUDDLES ! !

The time : 1492 . Columbus sets foot off his boat onto a a land he'd like to name " Columbustopia 2000 " but has recently been convinced to call " America " for now .
He's on what appears to be a pristine shore , a perfect scene of wilderness ! !
Of course , we all know what happened next . Once he and his men left the beach , the forest wilderness shimmered and faded , revealing its holographic nature . Columbus was about to discover the terrible secret of Earth : that America was not a continent . It was a SPACESHIP : an ancient crashed colony ship from a race of expansionist , technology - obsessed ALIENS held in suspended animation .
And he'd just woken them up .
The war with the reanimated spaceship crew was disastrous !
For native Earth life , absolutely !
Their superior tech and inhuman biological warfare techniques nearly wiped intelligent life off the planet . Disease emptied entire cities of their inhabitants , unknown futuristic weaponry killing those that remained . A brutal regime of assimilation worked to wipe out any remaining Earth culture . But . . . SOME survived !

Often we'll set up a ship or probe so they whip around the planets ( including Earth ) , getting a sweet speed boost as they do so ! This allows us to produce ultra - velocity spacecraft , effectively for free !
GREAT IDEA , RIGHT ? ?
Except NOTHING IS FOR FREE ( in physics anyway , THANKS REALITY ) . So where's this speed coming from ? Oh , I'll tell you where it's coming from : every spacecraft we slingshot around a planet SLOWS DOWN THE ORBIT OF THAT PLANET . And it's not like we have the means to speed it up again ! !
And guess what ? We do gravitational assists with Earth ON THE REGULAR !
Plus , if we slow down Earth too much WE CRASH INTO THE SUN . Great work , SCIENTISTS ! Way to invent a DOOMSDAY DEVICE / ORBITAL TECHNIQUE !
Pfft .
We'd stop before that happened . More likely : the year gets a day longer , and we make it a holiday to celebrate ALL THE FRANKLY AWESOME SPACEFLIGHT WE'VE BEEN DOING .
