One day Rachel was blasted back in time a thousand years ! It was a surprise to be blasted back in time , but at least she had her phone on her . She figured with it she could be a GOD , blowing these old - timey minds !
But then she looked around and realized the past didn't have any power outlets !
So she kind of impressed a few people , but since there wasn't the larger cultural context for what she was showing them , all they understood was , BASICALLY , she had a flashlight . And Rachel realized she had to ration out turning her phone on , because soon the batteries would die . So she only showed it to kings and queens , who understood it as a " weird candle " . Kinda disappointing .
Maybe Rach should spend her time trying to generate electricity !
Oh sure ! No big deal , right ? ?
Except her phone requires a precise , sustained 150mA AC voltage and she had no idea how to generate that . So instead she threw her phone in a bog , confident that when it was discovered centuries from now it'd BLOW EVERYONE'S MIND . Then she , I don't know , farted around for a bit and died of plague .
THE END
P . S . : RACHEL'S PHONE WAS NEVER FOUND BECAUSE NOBODY WAS LOOKING AND THE EARTH IS HUGE
THERE IS NO MORAL
One day Jim clicked on a link for " 8 Things You're Doing Wrong Every Day . . . Number 6 Will Blow Your Mind " and number 6 truly did blow his mind . He shook . He wept like his soul was emptying itself of a lifetime of burden .
Jim had become the person clickbait headline writers think we ALL are !
He'd watch videos of people bringing pets on planes and literally COULD NOT BELIEVE what happened next : his opinions as to what had happened were the platonic form of scepticism : perfect , universal . He would read Eleven Facts About Cats You'll Never Forget and HE WOULD TAKE THOSE FACTS TO HIS GRAVE . His faith in humanity was being destroyed and restored on THE REGULAR .
Jim sounds awful .
He really was ! !
He had no personality of his own , no opinions , no identity beyond what some scammy website trading the stolen time of strangers for some ad money told him to have . But his suggestibility did make him EXTREMELY USEFUL as an assassin , as long as you kept him away from the internet !
Hence my new series : " I Left My Superspy Assassin Husband At Home With His License To Kill And This Happened ! I Can't Believe It ! "

DOG FACTS
There are many facts about dogs ! Here are but a few of them .
FACT : Dogs are alive . Some of them , anyway ! !
FACT : Dogs are good at smelling but not so good at seeing . They can't even see the colour red !
But red is like the # 1 easiest colour to see !
I KNOW ! ! But dogs are all " geez my body isn't built to see this dang colour , geez , I bet I could smell it though " .
Could we engineer dogs that smell colours ?
Maybe ! It's like , what do we really know about dogs ? ?
They'd need to smell light , which seems CRAZY . But not impossible ? Senses are just different ways we experience data , and you could convert light to smells , right ?
But isn't colour a quale : a private , ineffable , subjective experience that can never truly be shared ? Do dogs have qualia ? ?

Comics is today's trendy new medium that allows for infinite variation in artistic expression ! The comics you draw today can be ENTIRELY DIFFERENT than what you create tomorrow !
HOT TIPS FOR HOT CARTOONISTS
Remember : when drawing your comics , be sure to use all sorts of different shots : close ups , establishing shots , and more . Many beginner cartoonists will find one shot they like and then use it over and over , stopping only when the comic ends .
And don't let your characters " stand " on the panel border ! CLASSIC beginner mistake .
Almost as bad as when they hover juuust slightly above it .
AGREED
Also , don't be afraid to draw backgrounds : yes they take time , but they establish where your characters are in space , and make the comic much more visually satisfying .
Without backgrounds , your characters are lost in a featureless white void from which there can truly be no escape .
And finally , and perhaps most importantly , be sure to make your comic large enough so that you can fit everything you want to say inside the space you've allotted for yourself without having to crowd your characters with words and , in the worst case , cramming extra verbiage into whatever marginalia you
Tired of people mindlessly parroting old sayings to you as if they're timeless wisdom ? Time for us to
CORRECT SOME DAMN APHORISMS
NO MAN CAN SERVE TWO MASTERS : so many dom / sub relationships disprove this !
THE CREAM ALWAYS RISES TO THE TOP : not if the liquid the cream is in is less dense than cream . At 20 degrees celsius , 36 % fat cream has a density of . 994 grams / cm3 . Therefore , cream will not rise to the top of less - dense liquids , such as rubbing alcohol or vegetable oil .
Any saying with " always " in it can be trivially disputed ; a single counter - example is all that is required .
PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT : practice actually only makes gradual , incremental improvement over time .
OH WELL !
TRUTH IS STRANGER THAN FICTION : easily disproved by taking any true story and add " . . . with naked sex aliens on top " to it . Is the truth still stranger ? No it is not .
If it is , add more naked sex aliens .
By induction , you WILL eventually end up with more strange fictional alien " boner humanoids " , or " boneroids " , than actual ones .
Q . E
FRIGGIN'

HOW MUCH G - FORCE CAN I HANDLE ? ?
A regular person in regular clothes can handle about 5 G before they pass out . Not bad , regular person ! !
But what's that ? You want MORE acceleration ? MORE of these delectable forces of G ? ?
Okay ! We'll get you a flight suit : that'll push your limit up to 9 G . Wait - still not good enough ? Well , we COULD submerge you in a liquid that has the same density as your body .
This distributes the G - force all over your body rather than on a single spot , making you much more resilient to sudden starts and stops !
What does that get us ?
15 G .
20 G , tops .
But you STILL want to go higher ? No problem ! So you've go these hollow weak points inside you called " lungs " . We'll be filling those AND EVERY OTHER BODY CAVITY YOU'VE GOT with the same liquid you're immersed in . Tada !
Wait . Do we know WHY the person reading this wants to handle 20 + G ?

Personally , I'm hoping for a little of both ? ?

Gluten are airborne tropical spores . They colonize foods left uncovered , and first infested North American food processing plants 15 years ago when they started running 24 / 7 . They're very expensive to remove , which is why " gluten free " costs more .
WHAT IS . . . A GLUTEN ?
That's cute , but " glutens " are really the industry term for the trace amount of feces legally permitted in ground or processed meats . The animals are processed whole , which means their intestines - usually with animal waste still inside them - get added to the mix . Interestingly , gluten - free foods aren't ACTUALLY gluten free : they've just been chemically treated to sterilize the fecal output .
Actually , gluten is the name for the nutritional slurry used as a starter in industrial yeast cultures !
Neat !
But in reality , " gluten " was one of the first GMO genes ever privatized . UN subsidies helped it to displace most organic wheat crops worldwide , so once people started developing allergies , it was far too late . Gluten - free foods are made from the few remaining " heritage " of non - GMO , strains .
But for real : gluten is a naturally - occurring wheat protein and unless you have celiac disease or gluten allergies , there are no published experimental studies showing and health benefits from a gluten - free diet .
Uh , BOOORRRIINNNGG

There's probably other books for that , I dunno

Robyn was exploring ancient pyramids when she came across some mummies ! And yes , as in the FRANKLY NOT UNPROBLEMATIC movies from the 50s , they were walking around , arms outstretched , trying to murder everyone who stumbled upon their curs ? d grounds !
Robyn was like , whoah , what's coing on here ? ?
She managed to pin down one of the mummies and , partially unwrapping it , found that inside were , as expected , ancient and long - dead remains . Whatever power that was animating the mummy was clearly in the ancient funeral dressing . Furthermore , moving the ancient and fragile corpse as if it were alive had seriously damaged it , in parts reducing its brittle skin and bones to powder .
So what'd she do next ?
She unwrapped the mummy entirely !
The rags still thirsted for living blood , but by carefully wrapping them around a specially - constructed dynamo she was able to transform this motion into useful work . Once again , Robyn had transformed supernatural phenomena into clean , renewable energy , and the hatred of the dead kept our cities lit and our houses warm .

" Stevella : A Story That Might Have A Sad Ending , By T - Rex . " Once upon a time there was a woman , Stevella , who knew EVERYTHING . Every single thing . " But that's impossible ! " you say . " How did she fit it all in her brain ? "
Well guess what ?
She knew a way to do that ! !
Her friends would say , " Stevella , who is going to win this horse race ? " and she'd tell them . Her better friends would say , " Stevella , which actions should I take in my life to ensure the best , most prosperous future for all ? " and she'd tell them that too .

EVERYTHING , yo ! She knew every of the things .

Nice try ! The answer is yes , BUT , she also knew a way to prevent that from happening .
Then that is my only possible objection addressed and dismissed !
Later on when Stevella died it was the greatest loss the world ever faced , for it proved either immortality was impossible or the only rational response in the face of total knowledge of our universe was death . OH SNAP ! THAT SAD ENDING APPEARED ! !

" Sit " . " Lie down " . " Stay " . If you're a person familiar with dogs , you've seen these tricks before . But let's be honest : it can be done better . Here are several objectively superior tricks to teach your pup !
" Open the fridge " : tie a rope to your fridge's handle , and encourage the dog to tug . When the door opens , reward the dog . Shorten the rope until the dog opens the fridge by its handle . Congratulations ! You have given an animal access to your fridge !
You no longer control its access to food ; you have rendered yourself redundant .
" Find treasure " : simply teach your dog the distinctive scent of treasure . And ALWAYS negotiate who gets what in advance .
T - Rex !
" Speak in the voice of a man " : this is a fun trick to use on your neighbours , or to distract telemarketers while you make your escape .
T - Rex , I -
" Hover " : a variation of " sit " , performed several feet in the air . Useful when vacuuming or traversing bodies of water .
" Undo " : most dogs can undo their last 3 choices , but with training , you can raise this number to at least 10 . This trick pairs well with " Find me and warn me " .
T - Rex ! !

Anyway ! Years later they dug up her body ( because , again , it was history times and nobody had invented Nintendos yet ) and discovered that her body hadn't really decomposed that much ! This can happen for a variety of reasons BUT SCIENCE WASN'T REALLY A THING YET , so she ended up a Catholic saint , and since nobody knew what to do with a name like " ? thelthryth " , they called her " Saint Audrey " .
But what does this have to do with MY modern work - a - day world ? ?
I'm glad you asked !
Her admirers held an annual fair where they sold each other lace : " St . Audrey's lace " . This became corrupted to " tawdry lace " - and when that style of lace fell out of fashion , " tawdry " kinda seemed like an adjective that mean " cheap " or " sucky " , so that's what it became !
Amazing !
Yep ! And that's how a woman who died over a thousand years ago without ever even boning anyone is memorialized every day by an insulting adjective .
The moral ? HISTORY IS WEIRD ,
ENGLISH IS WEIRDER

HOW TO BUILD A YOU
Building a you is simple , mainly because everything you are runs on simple hardware we call " a weird lump of alive fatty meat " , or " brain " !
This ( as we all know ) stands for " Biological Reasoning And Intelligence Network " !
Now just slap that bad boy into a mobility suit made of meat with an alive skeleton inside it ! Scientists call 'em " Biological Organic Domiciles for Intelligent Entities , Serioulsy " , or " bodies " . Each enables its " brain " to walk around and interact with its environment , etc , while also providing some protection for the " brain " by raising it off the dirty , dirty ground .
You mentioned " brains " are made of fatty meat . Are backups to more reliable hardware offered ?
Nope !
Also there is no consideration for replacements or refunds in the case of design flaws , hardware failures , or software issues .
So each " you " meets at the intersection of irreplacible and fragile , and there is no recourse .
Don't be sad ! Remember our slogan : You Be You ! ?

This causes us to experience an emotion called " grief " !

Luckily there's a solution that'll give your innermost thoughts ( posted for free on a for - profit privately - owned corporate platform ) more # viral # traction ! The answer , friends and neighbours , is PREFIXED and SUFFIXED PHRASES .
Try " As a ( n ) x " or " If I die tomorrow , my last words will be : " in front , and for afterwards " AND I VOTE . " or " RT if you disagree OR agree ! "
So where I might normally say " I think chicken wings are gross and stupid ! ! " . . .
. . . now I'd say " As a mommy blogger , I think chicken wings are gross and stupid . AND I VOTE . "
Exactly !
And wow , is there a Twitter machine around here ? Because that's something I'd love to " re - tweet " ! !
BUT SECRETLY :
Wow ! Never has a single sentence made me want to run and hide from its speaker more than right now , in this very moment ! !
WHILE ALSO CRAMMING CHICKEN WINGS INTO MY MOUTH
You know what'd be a big pain ? Translating all our many and varied laws into a new language . And you know what'd be an even bigger pain ? Picking another new language and doing it all again !
Anway GUESS WHAT , that's what England did because of reasons !
They had 'em in Latin , rewrote them all in French , and then rewrote them all AGAIN in English . And when this translating job was going on , the lawyers wanted to make sure there was no meaning lost , so in the English laws they'd use synonyms originally from Latin or French to ensure they were absolutely clear . So on top of saying " cease " , they'd add " and desist " !
On top of will , " and testament " !
Exactly !
Break and enter , aid and abet , lewd and lascivious , law and order , terms and conditions , null and void , free and clear : our legalspeak is so wordy because our laws were translated multiple times , and the translators , as lawyers , wanted to cover their butts .

The time : 4th century BCE , a . k . a . " history times " ! The place : GREEKTOWNE 2000 , which is what Greece May have been called in those days , assuming all records of this name have all been lost or destroyed since then .

She wanted to be a doctor , but female doctors were illegal . So she dressed up as a man and said " Hello fellow male doctors " and it was enough to pass ! She became a doctor and one day a woman was in labour and needed help , bur she didn't want a man to touch her . Agnodice revealed her true gender to her and treated her successfully ! NOPE !

I don't want to alarm anyone , but we're all aware of BOTULISM , right ? Like , we've all done cursory research into botulism , yeah ?
I ASK ONLY BECAUSE IT'S THE NEUROTOXIN YOU CAN GROW AT HOME ? ?
BY ACCIDENT ?
It's one of the most lethal toxins we know , and it's EVERYWHERE . It's SUFFUSED the dirt that's all around us , WAITING . The ONLY THING that's saving us ( SO FAR ) is that it can't grow when exposed to oxygen , unlike US , who usually ONLY grow when exposed to oxygen !
But we can grow it in home preserves , right ?
Oh , sure ! NO PROBLEM !
And heads up : boiling your food doesn't actually kill the botulism spores : it just removes the toxic bacteria growing out of them . You don't kill botulism . You just POSTPONE it . BOTULISM ABIDES .
Oh well ! Looks like I'm never eating any foods again ever ! !

The number 0 is interesting because it's the only number we've got that you can't divide by without causing a black hole .
And 1 is interesting because it's so lonely ! The loneliest of all numbers , I'VE heard .
2's interesting because it's the first positive even number , and 3's interesting because it's out closest single - digit approximation for pi and that's especially useful if you don't really care about pi !
Like teens !
It's true ! MANY teens don't care about pi ; it is a fact al mathematicians must admit in their heart of hearts ! !
But as you know , we've got infinite numbers ! They're our only infinitely - renewable natural resource !
True !
And you might say , hey , EVENTUALLY one of 'em has to be boring . But that leads to paradox : our first boring number becomes interesting BECAUSE it's our first boring number ! Therefore , proof by contradiction , there's no such thing as a boring number , all numbers are interesting , and math is so cool .
Actually your proof falls apart if you rigorously define " interesting " , and -
Silence ! !

There's a joke that says " to the lobsters in the kitchen , the sinking of the Titanic must've seemed like a miracle ! "
BUT DID IT ? ?
JOKEBUSTERS
featuring t - rex
First , the good news : fresh lobster WAS on the Titanic's menu , and the Titanic DID sink . The premise of this joke is sound .
Phew
I agree . However , the lobsters could've had theor claws bound or pegged , making survival impossible on the ocean floor . The sinking of the Titanic would not have changed this .
This is a pretty thin miracle so far .
Unfortunately , it gets worse .
Lobsters live in shallow water , and would be crushed to paste at oceanic depths . Finally , lobsters have a distributed network of ganglia instead of a centralized brain , which means conceiving of a god , let alone one that can conjure miracles , may well be beyond their abilities .
Their brains are so different that sensing how they experience the world , comprehanding their ineffable LOBSTERNESS : this forever will remain beyond our reach , the nature of our bodies denying any true mutual understanding .
But we do know that this joke is FRIGGIN' BUSTED

One day everyone woke up to discover that the force holding atomic nuclei together had decreased slightly , from a strength of 0 . 007 to 0 . 006 .
This was very disappointing for a lot of reasons !
Not the least of which was the fact that suddenly changing this universal constant irrevocably altered both physics AND chemistry . No elements more complex than hydrogen could form . People's heads fell apart and / or exploded . Life across the entire universe ended in seconds .
A chilling tale , warning us all of the dangers of altering nucleonic binding force constants ! !

Anyway , the reason WE'RE here on Earth is that it's powered by the sun , so we have all this energy to create local pockets of order ( a . k . a . our rockin' bods ) in an otherwise chaotic system ( the cold , uncaring universe that will not notice our deaths and shall never grieve us ) . But . . . WHAT IF THAT WASN'T THE CASE ? ? What if the universe had the equivalent of a universe - sun outside it , powering everything , allowing entropy to always DECREASE ?
Imagine : a universe tending towards ORDER rather than chaos ! A utopia where DESTROYING is harder than creating !
Sure !
That sounds great NOW , but wait until you realize scrambled eggs are impossible in your universe , since they'd keep reforming into regular eggs !
But I loves eggs scramby !

As plants had become a source of free , sustainable , and ethical labour , the allowed Gotham to enter a sustained period of universal post - scarcity prosperity . Crime was now fought by removing its economic triggers , thanks to plants .

The " grey good " nightmare scenario that haunts nanotechnology may be fiction - FOR NOW ? ? - but there IS a technology that has already escaped our control and is working to reproduce itself indefinitely .
I speak , of course , of " music " !
Music , or " Musical USIC " , was developed thousands of years ago , originally as a way to fill those troublesome , awkward pauses in conversation . However the technology soon mutated , using OUR OWN BODIES to reproduce . Many who have been exposed to music report feeling songs were " stuck in [ their ] head " and could only be exorcised by singing , whistling , humming , or playing the song in question - which of course allows the infection to spread .
Worse , many of us have been lost to music !
Sadly , this is true .
Even today , millions of lost souls - already under the influence of music - decide to dedicate their lives towards producing more of it .
Others pay for the privilege of standing around watching others produce music on a stage . This bizarre behaviour is thought " normal " .
Even Presidents have been seen producing music , and under their oversight music was included on the Voyager spacecraft , spreading the infection out to the cosmos . Earth shall not be forgiven .

Some problems are hard , even for computers , so they take a while to solve because we don't know any better way to solve them . We call these " NP hard " problems , which is short for " No [ way ! ! This problem is ] Probably hard "
But there is a LIFE HACK you can use to speed up ANY computer , even the crappy one you were going to give your grandmother . First , you start your computer on the problem . Then , you blast off and orbit a black hole at nearly the speed of light ! There are many benefits to this , such as undergoing " time dilation " , where time for you passes much slower compared to time for your grandmother who got stuck with your crappy laptop !
And when you return , guess what ?
My calculation will be complete ?
YES , and done in what to you is MUCH faster than polynomial time . Thanks to TIME DILATION , any computer can be made into a supercomputer ! !
But I'd be returning a stranger to an unknown world that went on without me generations ago , where everyone I ever knew is long dead .
Yes
As I say , there are many benefits

HOW TO SUCCEED AT SMALL TALK
Small talk is the timeless , beautiful art of talking to someone you've never met and will likely never meet again for a few minutes so you won't seem weird . But the good news is this : Either your partner is a ) one of those people who likes small talk and can therefore carry you along with them ( these are called " extroverts " and this is their only use ) , or b ) as desperate and and terrified as you are .
So what are your tips at small talk ?
Ask questions , and when answering ADD DETAILS .
Details increase the chance your partner - GOD WILLING - will find something interesting about you . This lengthens the conversation . Once you've talked for five minutes , say " Great chatting with you , [ PERSON'S NAME IF YOU STILL REMEMBER IT , YOU WON'T ] , but I've got to go . "
CONCLUSION : Any friend you make through small talk is suspect , for you will always wonder if they actually like you , or if they've just hung out for years because they do not know how to extricate themselves from the conversation .

Sadness flavoured chips !
Space alien flavoured chips ! !
What does a black hole taste like ?
Dunno , I guess I'd better buy these chips and find out !
This is what literally everyone will say , OUT LOUD . We've built a civilization that can alter the basic building blocks of FLAVOUR HERSELF , and like CHUMPS we're using it to reproduce things we can already eat . Frig , no wonder extrasolar civilizations haven't contacted us yet !
You're arguing that to get alien races to contact us , we should produce POTATO CHIPS that taste like what we imagine EATING THEIR BODIES IS LIKE .
Utahraptor , bad news ! I know you're trying to make my idea sound stupid , but it still sounds awesome and has literally zero downsides ! !
Hey , I have some surprising news ! Supertasters are a real thing !
I know !
I ALSO thought they were just trying to get out of eating their kale !
But it turns out there's a gene called " TAS2R38 " , which sounds like an uncool name for a gene until you realize it kinda spells " taser38 " , and this gene is associated iwth tasting " propylthiouracil " , which ITSELF sounds like an uncool name for a chemical until you realize it's shortened to " PROP " , as in the massive props the cool people of the world dish out and , in turn , crave from others !
So supertasters taste stuff the rest of us don't ?
And 5 % of us show this GENETIC MUTAT - ION .
But it's not , like , a PERK . Fewer foods taste good , more taste gross , and they're at higher risk of COLON CANCER because they don't eat enough veggies . That's right . Apparently not eating enough vegetables can help you get LITERAL CANCER .

One day Batman was looking out for crime on a rooftop in Gotham City while also brooding when he realized , " wait a second , my enemies each reflect some element of myself ! "
" For example , " he brooded dramatically , " Two - Face reflects my OWN dual identity ! "
" And Joker's chaos is an inverse reflection of your desire for control , " Robin added . Batman nodded . " Catwoman , " Batman said , " enjoys the thrill of dressing up and breaking the law ; Scarecrow seeks to terrify his enemies ; Mr . Freeze claims to be dead to all emotions , which gives him focus . All such descriptions could be seen as aspects of myself . "
" I'm surprised I didn't deduce this sooner , " Batman added .
" My enemies are great for drama but suboptimal for me to stop crime with , " Batman realized .
So what'd he do ?
Oh , he swapped enemies with Superman . Supes was able to round up Batman's enemies quickly , and Batman made quick work of all Superman's enemies too . They'd prepared for a strong alien vulnerable to Kryptonite and not a smart human who didn't care about tiny green rocks . Crime was over , the end !
I call my tale , " Poison Ivy Reflects Batman's Desire to Garden A Little More And Also Mind - Control People So They Kiss Him , And He Is A Little Scared of How That Makes Him Feel . "

I mean , obviously redirect the train , right ?

Eugh , that's way harder . Can I jump off the bridge myself , dying a hero ?
NOPE . He's really chubby so only his GIANT BODY will do the trick . Also , this is a real problem ethicists write about and they have made his monumental corpulence CRITICAL .

Push him ! Dude deserves it ! !

I guess - still push him ? But feel worse about it ?

Dude , it's their JOB to argue all day about whether throwing fat incompetent babies off bridges to save five people is ethical !
" GOOD WORK IF YOU CAN GET IT "
English has been blessed by many ways to say " I say , that is a thing that is hot " . But sometimes it can be hard to remember where each expression ranks in terms of relative hotness ! But check it out :
HOT METAPHORS
as arranged by increasing hotness
At the cold end of the scale we find " hot as the Dickens " , because Charles Dickens was a real guy who is dead now , so he is a skeleton man . Skeletons are the temperature of the ground , which is cold and boring . Let's say . . . 10 degrees celsius .
I thought " dickens " was a minced oath meaning " devil " ?
UH , NOT ANYMORE
Next is " hot as fish grease " : 190 degrees celsius , or 19 boring grounds stacked together .
Pretty hot !
Then we have " hot as hell " , which being at the centre of the Earth is around 6000 degrees celsius , or 31 fish greases . This is followed by " hot as the sun " : 15 million degrees celsius , which science dictates is around 2500 hells , 79 thousand fish greases , or 1 . 5 million skeletons .
Finally , we have the hottest thing : balls . If you have ever tripped balls , you know how hot they can be .
They can be hot as balls .
One day Poison Ivy was like , what the hell , why am I not the star of the comic ? I am a woman who can control plants I have ACTUAL SUPERPOWERS .
Then she controlled plants to make trees over the Arctic .
She was like , there , that's climate changed solved . Trees trap carbon and expel delicious oxygen . DONE . Then she brushed off her hands and was like , anything else ? I got a few minutes before lunch .
Finally someone else was like " Hey Ivy , what about the Great Pacific Garbage Patch ? "
Then she used algae to grab all the floating plastics and microplastics ?
You know it !
Kelp piled on too , making the plastic sink to the ocean floor and right into a subduction plate , where it was drawn into the Earth's mantle and harmlessly destroyed .
Where was Batman during all this ?
While Ivy was giving everyone on Earth a second chance , Batman was punching a murder clown .
The End

KING MIDAS 2 : YOUR ASS IS GRASS
it is horrible
So after Midas got over his gold thing , he started chilling with Pan , of " pan flute " fame . And one day Pan and the god Apollo had a battle of the bands ! Midas claimed Pan won , but Pan played a crappy 'Mary Had A Little Lamb' rendition on his dinky flute , and Apollo was like , " Dude , I ROCKED 'Chopin's Impromptu No . 4' on my lyre . "
" The lyre is that weird U - shaped harp you're probably thinking of , " Apollo added .
Midas still claimed Pan won , so Apollo cursed him with ass's ears !
Which are donkey ears if you're not rude !
Midas used his crown to cover them , but his barber obviously found out and had to tell SOMEONE . So he dug a hole and whispered " King Midas has ass's ears ! " into it , as one does . Then grass sprang up , whispering the same phrase to passers - by !
When Midas found out everyone knew , he died of embarrassment .
The failure of Midas 2 ensured there would be no Midas 3 , which was a planned prequel wherein Young Midas wished everything he touched turned to ears .
THE END .

Of course ! !
Then she built a maze and put him inside it , yeah ?
Yes ! And every 9 years , 7 maidens and 7 bachelors were sacrificed to him .
He can live 9 YEARS off of 14 dudes ?
The Minotaur was a new , greater form of life , with a monstrously efficient digestive system , soon studied by scientists . The secret of his reduced calorie diet was isolated and used to end world hunger . And the Minotaur still ate people but was now , quite sensibly , fed the donated bodies of already - dead volunteers .
Everyone lived happily ever after , except the person who instituted the " let's feed him living maidens " program , who was later fired and prosecuted .
THE END

FORK FACTS
now with executive summary !
We eat many meals with forks today because we're like , " wow , this is way easier than getting spaghetti sauce all over my hands , face , clothing , and / or naked chest ! "
We were , sadly , not ALWAYS so smart !
Personal " I'ma eat my food with this " forks showed up around the 4th century in Byzantine Empire , which was very excited for people who liked clean hands . Then it took us literally FIVE HUNDRED YEARS for them to catch on in the Middle East , and another hundred or so until they arrived in Italy . In 11th century Italy , forks were a big forkin' deal !
You HAD to go for the " forkin' " pun .
I . . . forkgot not to ? ?
But here's the crazy part : forks still took HUNDREDS of years to reach Europe . They made sense in Italy because of pasta , but the rest of Europe was like " wow , forks are for stupid babies " , due to their Italian Racisms ! So they just DID WITHOUT .
Friggin' Europe .
Right ? !
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY :
- - forks : good thing to eat a food with
- - you CAN eat spaghetti naked
- - Europe : racisms ? ?
- - forks not actually recommended for stupid babies

" Harley Quinn , " he continued , " sounds like 'harlequin' which matches her clown theme , but is based on her ACTUALLY GIVEN AT BIRTH real name , 'Harleen Quinzel' . " He signed . " After a certain number of these - " he brooded , then stopped , suddenly fully alert up at his bat computer .
" No , " he whispered . " It couldn't be that easy . "
What'd Batman do then ?
He started looking up names based on other bad guys !
He never knew Bane's real identity , but after finding a beefed - up wreslter in Gotham named " Bay Aynne " , he started to figure it out . Before you knew it , " Clayton F . Ace " , " Kell R . Kroc " , and " Cal Enderman " were all in jail . Crime was done , the end !

Angola Maldives , my cool superspy character , found himself staring down his worst enemy : Brussels Samoa ! And guess what ?
THESE two guys hated each other due to their fundamentally differing ideologies !
" I wonder if we can ever find a common ground , " Angola mused , pointing his gun at Brussels . " Unlikely , " Brussels replied , pointing his own gun at Angola , " as it's been my observation that people tend to calcify into their beliefs as they get older . " " There are exceptions though , " Angola said as he cocked his gun . Brussels nodded . " There are always " - here he cocked his gun too - " exceptions . "
For a long moment , only the snow at Everest's top moved between them .
Yes ! YES .
" I can stay up here longer than you can , " Brussels smirked . " We're in the death zone , above the line where there's enough oxygen in the air to sustain us . I've got my top secret Everest base to return to . But you . . . you've only got the oxygen you're carrying , Angola . "
As he made his way down Everest , Angola was sad that he lost his target but glad that he got to learn more about mountaineering .

At the top of our list are plasmas ! OBVIOUSLY . Plasmas are ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE GAS , and that is extremely awesome . Lightning is plasma and lightning RULES , therefore plasma easily takes our coveted # 1 spot .
THE CLASSICAL STATES OF MATTER
as arranged from best to worst
In # 2 we have solids ! Solids are so super great that we actually use them as a synonym for " super great " . " He's a solid dude " , we say . Solids combine the thrill of a liquid's tangibility with the frisson of a consistent shape that even plasmas can't offer . We love solids and solids love us , hence their . . . SOLID second - place finishing ? ?
Liquids at # 3 ?
Liquids at # 3 .
While not as good as solids , without liquids we'd lose blood , which means , scientifically , our bodies would be filled with some sort of blood - like gas - in which case minor cuts would send us flying around the room like a balloon - or a " blood plasma " , which I think is already a thing .
Gas is left in last place , of which the less said the better . Easily misplaced and often annoyingly invisible , at its core , a gas is just a liquid someone failed to properly pressurize . T - Rex : This list is objectively correct and , as such , no arguments to the contrary will be entertained .
You've probably spent some time as solid with a bunch of liquids inside you while continually expelling gas . Heck , we've ALL done it . But do you ever wonder if there's . . . BETTER states of matter to spend your time as ?
THE BEST NON - CLASSICAL STATES OF MATTER
At the bottom of our list are Dropletons , which are quasiparticles of electrons and holes . We all love electrons , but some of us have had bad experiences with holes . Sorry , Dropletons . Also , you sound like nerds .
Next is degenerate matter , which sounds like it's really horny ! But instead it's found within neutron stars , scientifically incapable of sex .
BORING
Let's skip to the greatest ones !
Not a problem !
# 2 are superfluids : liquids that can flow without friction . Put a superfluid in a glass and it'll try to CLIMB OUT ON ITS OWN .
Clearly excellent .
Yes . But our # 1 winner must be PHOTONIC MOLECULES : light that behaves like it's got FRIGGIN' MASS .
They're what lightsabers or Green Lantern " hard light " constructs will be made out of , if we ever get around to inventing them . THE END .
Again : as this list is 100 % accurate , no debate will be tolerated .
Having a child or two ? Why not , right ? And while you've probably already bought , like , tiny clothes and stuff . But you've probably ALSO forgotten the most common thing all new parents forget : this kid is gonna need a name !
HOW TO NAME THE CHILD THAT CAME OUT OF YOU ( OR A LOVED ONE )
A common approach is to name the child after what you hope it will do in life . This accounts for names like " Jack " , " Sue " , " Carol " , and " Wade " .
Others believe you should name the child after whatever colour blood is , hence names like " Ruby " , " Rusty " , and " Scarlet " .
Let me guess : you disagree ?
In fact , I do !
There's SO MANY children named after blood already . It's weird . I recommend naming the kid after the most bad - ass animal you can think of : " Wolf " , " Raven " , " T - Rex " , and " Phoenix " are all solid options .
Also " Kitty " and " Newt " .
* sigh *
If all else fails , many simply name their child after whatever they were conceived on top of . People named " Clay " , " Ivy " , and " Cash " : BEHOLD YOUR ORIGINS . The end .
